90a8(mdo sde): mi mthong ba ni gnas med pa'o// yid kyi bar du yongs su shes pa ni bzung ba med pa'o// chos mi dmigs pa ni gnas med pa ste/ de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin
90b1(mdo sde): po la bsam gtan sbyor ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pas dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pas de la shes rab kyi gtam ston to// gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ byang chub
90b2(mdo sde): kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad la yang bya'o// sems can gang nyan thos kyi dbang po la rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la sbyor ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu shes te/
90b3(mdo sde): srog gcod pa spangs pa dang / ma byin par len pa spangs pa dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa spangs pa dang / brdzun du smra ba spangs pa dang / phra ma spangs pa dang / tshig
90b4(mdo sde): rtsub spangs pa dang / tshig thun tshags spangs pa dang / chags sems spangs pa dang / gnod sems spangs pa dang / yang dag par lta ba ste/ 'di yang snga ma bzhin te/ lam
90b5(mdo sde): de ni 'byung ba'o// 'di ltar shA ri'i bu ji tsam byang chub kyi phyogs kyi dge ba tshul khrims kyi phung po dang ldan pa 'am/ ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang ldan pa 'am/ shes rab kyi
90b6(mdo sde): phung po dang ldan pa 'am/ rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang ldan pa 'am/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po dang ldan pa 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa dang ldan
90b7(mdo sde): pa de dag kyang 'byung ba'i lam zhes bya'o// gzhan yang gang yang dag par bsgrub pa ni 'byung ba zhes bya'o// gang yang dag par bsgrub pa de la ni/ sogs pa 'am
90b8(mdo sde): mi sogs pa'am/ bra ba'am/ dor ba'am/ bzung ba'am/ spang ba'i chos gang yang med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yang dag par bsgrub pa la zhugs pa ni/
85a1(mdo sde): gnyis la blo mi 'jug ste/ chos thams cad gnyis su med par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ye shes mthong ba ni 'byung
85a2(mdo sde): ba'i lam mo// de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams 'byung ba'i lam yang dag par rab tu ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa de yang 'khor
85a3(mdo sde): thams cad shes par byed pa dang / 'khor thams cad tshim par byed pa dang / 'khor thams cad kyi lus sim par byed pa dang / 'khor thams cad mgu ba bskyed
85a4(mdo sde): pa dang / 'khor thams cad dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / dad pa bskyed pa dang / snying rje chen pos sposbyong ba dang / de bzhin nyid dang / de kho na dang / de bzhin
85a5(mdo sde): kho na dang / gzhan ma yin pa kho na dang / mi 'gyur ba kho na dang / 'gyur ba med pa kho na dang / 'byung ba med pa kho na dang / 'bral ba med pa kho na dang / rtsod pa med pa
85a6(mdo sde): kho nar mnyam ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa la rtsod pa gang yang med do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa ni rtsod pa med pa 'thab pa med pa'o// /
85a7(mdo sde): de nyid dang mnyam/ chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams ma lus pa thams cad la thogs pa med do// de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa
85a8(mdo sde): tshad med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du med/ dpag tu med/ brjod du med pa'i chos dang ldan zhing snying rje chen pos kun tu non pa'i sems kyis sems
85b1(mdo sde): gshegs pas bzung ba med pa dang / gnas med par byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ mig mi 'dzin pa
85b2(mdo sde): dang / gnas med pas rnam par shes pa mi gnas so// yid kyi bar du mi 'dzin cing chos gnas med pas rnam par shes pa mi gnas so// de rnam par shes pa gan
85b3(mdo sde): med par sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi gnas shes so// ji ltar shes she na/ sems can rnams kyi gnas ni bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ gzugs
85b4(mdo sde): ni sems kyi gnas so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed ni sems can rnams kyi sems kyi gnas te/ 'di bzhi ni sems can rnams kyi sems kyi gnas so// /
85b5(mdo sde): gnas de yang gnas med par de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen te/ gnas med pa'i mtha' 'di sems can rnams kyis khong du ma chud pas/ de khong du chud par bya'o zhes de
85b6(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams la snying rje chen po 'jug go// shA ri'i bu byang chub ces bya ba ni/ stong pa nyid kyi tshig bla dgas so// stong pa nyid gang gis byang chub
85b7(mdo sde): stong pa/ stong pa nyid des chos thams cad stong ste/ de dag ji ltar spong ba nyid de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mngon par sangs rgyas mod kyi/ stong pa nyid kyis
85b8(mdo sde): stong pa nyid mngon par sangs rgyas pa ni ma yin pas/ ye shes 'di ni stong pa nyid dang byang chub tshul cig pa ste/ de la gang gnyis kyis stong pa nyid dang byang chub gnyis su
91a1(mdo sde): dbye ba'i gnyis cung zad kyang med do// chos de ni mi gnyis pa gnyis lta bur bya ba ma yin te/ ming med pa/ mtshan ma med pa/ 'jug
91a2(mdo sde): ba med pa/ rab tu rgyu ba med pa/ spyod pa med pa'o// gang stong pa zhes bya ba ni mngon par chags pa dang / 'dzin pa dang bral ba'o// don dam par chos gang yang mi
91a3(mdo sde): dmigs te/ stong pa gang yin pa de stong pa zhes bya'o// ji ltar nam mkha' la nam mkha' zhes kyang bya la/ nam mkha' ni brjod par bya ba'ang ma yin no// de bzhin
91a4(mdo sde): du stong pa la stong pa zhes kyang bya la/ stong pa nyid brjod par bya ba ma yin no// chos thams cad la 'jug pa 'di ni/ 'di lta ste/ ming du tha snyad btags pa tsam ste/
91a5(mdo sde): ming de yang yul na yang mi gnas/ phyogs na yang mi gnas so// ji ltar ming yul na mi gnas/ phyogs na mi gnas pa de bzhin du chos gang mig gi spyod pa'i chos
91a6(mdo sde): de yang yul na mi gnas/ phyogs na mi gnas te/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mkhyen to// thos nas ma skyes ma byung bar de ltar mkhyen pas/
91a7(mdo sde): de ltar rnam par grol te/ bcings pa yang med grol ba yang med na/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis khong du ma chud pas/ de khong du chud par bya'o zhes de bzhin gabye
91a8(mdo sde): pas sems can rnams la snying rje chen po 'jug go// shA ri'i bu byang chub ni nam mkha' dang mnyam ste/ nam mkha' ni mnyam pa'ang ma yin/ mi mnyam pa'ang ma
91b1(mdo sde): yin no// byang chub kyang mnyam pa'ang ma yin/ mi mnyam pa yang ma yin te/ ji ltar chos rnams yang dag par yongs su grub pa de mjam pa 'am/ mi mnyam
91b2(mdo sde): pa zhes brjod pa ma yin no// de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mnyam pa yang ma yin mi mnyam pa yang ma yin par mngon par rdzogs par
91b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas so// ji ltar chos phra rab tsam yang mnyam par byas pa yang ma yin/ mi mnyam par byas pa yang ma yin par de ltar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//
91b4(mdo sde): chos ji snyed pa de dag yang dag pa'i ye shes kyis shes so// yang dag pa'i ye shes gang zhe na/ chos ma byung ba rnams 'byung ba dang / byung nas 'jig par 'gyur ba de dag
91b5(mdo sde): ni bdag po med par 'byung / bdag po med par 'jig ste/ rkyen gyis 'byung ba dang 'jig par 'gyur te/ 'di la 'byung ba'am ldog pa gang yang med de/ lam gcad pa'i
91b6(mdo sde): phyir de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston to// // byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod//
91b7(mdo sde): / bam po bdun pa// / yang shA ri'i bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
91b8(mdo sde): chos ma 'dres pa la mngon par dang / yid ces/ rab tu rtog pa nas/ ngo mtshar dang smad kyi bar du 'du shes skyed ce na/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos
92a1(mdo sde): ma 'dres pa ni bco brgyad po 'di dag ste/ chos 'di dag dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi nang du gshegs nas seng ge'i sgra
92a2(mdo sde): yang dag par sgrog cing khyu mchog gi gnas su dam 'cha' ste/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang 'thun par ma skor ba
92a3(mdo sde): tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di la shA ri'i bu gang gi phyir las 'khrul pas/ byis pa 'am/ mkhas pa dang
92a4(mdo sde): chos dang 'thun pa'i brtson par 'gyur ba de bzhin gshegs pa la med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi las 'khrul pa med de/ de bzhin
92a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa ni spyod lam mdzes pa ste/ kun lta ba dang / rnam par lta ba dang / bskum pa dang / sbyang ba dang / chos gos sbyar ma dang / lhung bzed la mngon par 'gro ba
92a6(mdo sde): dang / slar 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / 'chag pa dang / 'greng ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal ba dang / grong dang / grong khyer du 'jug pa dang / 'byung ba na
92a7(mdo sde): rkang 'thil sa la mi reg ste/ 'khor lo'i brtsibs stong pa sa la mi 'byung zhing dri yid du 'ong ba'i pad+mo mngon par 'byung ste/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rkang pa 'jog go//
92a8(mdo sde): de la gang byol song gi skye gnas su song ba'i sems can dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa rkang pa reg na de dag zhag bdun du rab tu bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur/ shi 'phos
92b1(mdo sde): nas kyang bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i lus la chos gos sor bzhi tsam gyis mi reg mod kyi/ rdzi lung yug pas kyang
92b2(mdo sde): bzlog par mi nus so// lus kyi 'od kyis mnar med pa'i bar gyi sems can bde ba 'tsho ba myong bar 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i lus la 'khrul pa med ces
92b3(mdo sde): bya'o// yang shA ri'i bu gang gi phyir/ ngag 'khrul pas byis pa 'am/ mkhas pa chos dang 'thun pa'i rtsod par 'gyur ba'i 'khrul pa de bzhin gshegs pa la med do// de
92b4(mdo sde): ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni dus su smra ba yang dag par smra ba/ bden par smra ba/ tshigs su smra ba/ ji ltar smras pa de bzhin du byed pa'o// shin
92b5(mdo sde): tu nges pa'i tshig go// sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa'i tshig go// mi bzlos pa'i tshig go// don dang yi ges shin tu brgyan pa'i tshig go// skad cig brjod
92b6(mdo sde): pas sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa tshim par byed pa ste/ de'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ngag gi las 'khrul pa med ces bya'o// yang shA ri'i bu
92b7(mdo sde): gang gi phyir sems 'khrul pas byis pa 'am mkhas pa chos dang 'thun pa'i rtsod par 'gyur ba'i 'khrul pa de bzhin gshegs pa la med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di la shA
92b8(mdo sde): ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni mnyam par gzhag pa'i dngos po mi 'dor zhing / sangs rgyas kyi bya ba thams cad byed kyang sems der mi gtong zhing chos thams cad
93a1(mdo sde): la de chags pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la sems 'khrul pa med ces bya/ ji ltar de'i
93a2(mdo sde): sems 'khrul pa med pa de ltar sems can rnams kyi sems 'khrul pa spang ba'i phyir chos ston te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang po'o// gzhan yang
93a3(mdo sde): shA ri'i bu ca co gang las bdud dam/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu 'am/ gzhan mu stegs can dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la ca co yod zhes skabs mi rnyed do//
93a4(mdo sde): yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa la ca co 'am rjes su ca co med de/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni tshigs pa dang khong khro ba dang bral ba ste/ de sems can thams cad kyis bkur sti
93a5(mdo sde): byas kyang thos par mi sems/ sems can thams cad kyis bkur sti ma byas kyang 'khrug pa med do// de bzhin gshegs pa la bya ba'i mchog mthar ma phyin pa cung zad kyang
93a6(mdo sde): med pas/ de gang la yang 'gyod pa'i ca co mi 'byung ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'jig rten dang rtsod pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la ca co med do// de bzhin
93a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa ni nyon mongs pa med pa la gnas te/ nga'i ba med/ 'dzin pa med/ len pa med/ mdud pa thams cad dang bral ba ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la
93a8(mdo sde): caco med do// de ltar de la ca co med pa de ltar sems can thams cad kyi ca co thams cad spang ba'i phyir chos ston te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dres pa gnyis pa'o//
93b1(mdo sde): gzhan yang shA ri'i bu dran pa nyams pa gang las chos gang la yang rmongs par 'gyur ba'i dran pa rnams pa de bzhin gshegs pa la med do// bsam gtan dang rnam par
93b2(mdo sde): thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa la thogs pa med cing sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa dang g.yo ba la rnam par lta ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la
93b3(mdo sde): rmongs pa med do// so sor ci rigs par chos ston pa'i phyir kun tu nyams pa med do// 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da lnga la thogs pa med pa'i ye shes mthong
93b4(mdo sde): ba'i phyir/ don dang chos dang nges pa med pa'i tshig dang / spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa la kun tu nyams pa med do// ji ltar bdag tu nyams pa med cing 'das pa dang /
93b5(mdo sde): ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar thogs pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba de ltar sems can thams cad kyi dran pa nyams par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir chos ston to// 'di ni sangs rgyas
93b6(mdo sde): kyi chos ma 'dres pa gsum pa'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i mnyam par ma gzhag pa'i sems mi dmigs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'chag gam/ 'greng
93b7(mdo sde): ngam/ 'dug gam/ nyal lam/ za 'am/ smra 'am/ cang mi smra yang rung ste/ rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa/ ting nge 'dzin zab mo dam pa'i mchog thob pa/ sgrib pa med pa'i bsam
93b8(mdo sde): gtan la bsam gtan byed pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi brlabs ma gtogs pas/ sems can gyi ris na sems can gang mnyam par gzhag kyang rung mnyam par ma
94a1(mdo sde): bzhag kyang rung ste/ su yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems la lta bar nus pa med do// ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rtag tu mnyam
94a2(mdo sde): bar bzhag pa de ltar ting nge 'dzin la lta bas sems can rnams la chos ston te/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres ma bzhi pa'o// gzhan yang
94a3(mdo sde): shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa la sna tshogs kyi 'du shes med de/ gang gi phyir de la sna tshogs kyi 'du shes med pas dri ma med pa'i sems la yang dag par gnas so// de
94a4(mdo sde): ci'i phyir zhe na/ nam mkha' bzhin du zhing mi zad pa'i phyir zhing la de bzhin gshegs pa la sna tshogs kyi 'du shes med do// rang bzhin gyi tha dad pa med pa'i phyir de bzhin
94a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa sems can la sna tshogs kyi 'du shes med do// chos kyi dbyings dbyer med cing mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing la
94a6(mdo sde): sna tshogs kyi 'du shes med do// 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos nyid kyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa chos la sna tshogs kyi 'du shes med do// de bzhin gshegs pa tshul
94a7(mdo sde): khrims dang ldan pa sems can la byams pa med/ tshul khrims ngan pa la yang khong khro ba med/ phan par gyur pa la yang lan bya ba med/ gnod par gyur pa la yang gnod pa med/
94a8(mdo sde): 'dul bar 'os pa la yang mnyam pa nyid du ma yin/ log par nges pa'i sems can la yang smod pa ma yin gyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos thams cad la mnyam par gnas
94b1(mdo sde): / de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la sna tshogs kyi 'du shes med ces bya'o// ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la sna tshogs kyi 'du shes med pa de ltar sems can thams ca
94b2(mdo sde): kyi sna tshogs kyi 'du shes spang ba'i phyir chos ston te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa lnga pa'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa so sor ma brtags pa'i
94b3(mdo sde): btang snyoms med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i btang snyoms ni lam bsgoms pa ste/ lam ma bsgoms pa ma yin/ sems ma bsgoms pa ma yin//
94b4(mdo sde): tshul khrims ma bsgoms pa ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i btang snyoms ni shes rab bsgoms pa ste/ shes rab ma bsgoms pa ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
94b5(mdo sde): btang snyoms dang ldan gyi/ gti mug dang ldan pa ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i btang snyoms ni 'jig rten las 'das pa yin gyi/ 'jig rten gyi rnam par lhung ba ma
94b6(mdo sde): yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i btang snyoms ni 'phags pa'i 'byung ba yin gyi/ 'phags pa ma yin pa ma yin/ mi 'byung ba ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs
94b7(mdo sde): pa'i btang snyoms ni tshangs pa'i 'khor lo bskor ba ste/ sems can la snying rje dang bral ba ni ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i btang snyoms ni rang gi tshul gyis grub ste/
94b8(mdo sde): gnyen po rjes su song ba ni ma yin no// yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i btang snyoms de ni mtho ba pa yang ma yin/ dma' ba yang ma yin te/ mthon dman
95a1(mdo sde): med par gnas pa/ mi g.yo bar gyur pa/ gnyis dang bral ba/ rtog pa dang sel ba las shin tu 'das pa/ dus la lta ba/ dus
95a2(mdo sde): las ma yol ba mi g.yo ba mi sems pa rtog pa rnam par mi rtog pa/ ma bsgoms pa bstan tu med pa/ yang dag pa kho na de bzhin nyid/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid/ gzhan
95a3(mdo sde): ma yin pa de bzhin nyid de/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i de lta bu'i btang snyoms phun sum tshogs pa sems can thams cad btang snyoms yongs su rdzogs par
95a4(mdo sde): bya ba'i phyir chos ston to// shA ri'i bu 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa drug pa'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni mos pa bri ba med do// de la mos/
95a5(mdo sde): pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i chos la mos pa'o// de yang gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa la mos pa bri ba med do// snying rje chen po la mos pa bri ba med
95a6(mdo sde): do// chos ston pa la mos pa bri ba med do// sems can 'dul ba la mos pa bri ba med do// rab tu dben pa la mos pa bri ba med do// byang chub sems dpar yang dag
95a7(mdo sde): par 'dzud pa la mos pa bri ba med do// dkon mchog gsum rgyun mi gcod par mos pa bri ba med do// de bzhin gshegs pa ni mos par 'gro ba ma yin gyi/ ye shes sngon
95a8(mdo sde): du 'gro ba ste/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mos pa'o// sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i thams cad mkhyen par mos pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir chos ston
95b1(mdo sde): ste 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bdun pa'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i brtson 'grus brim med do// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i
95b2(mdo sde): brtson 'grus ni 'di lta ste/ 'dul ba'i sems can yal bar mi 'dor ba'i brtson 'grus dang / chos nyan pa la brnyas pa med ma'i brtson 'grus so// gal te de
95b3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi snod chos nyan pa gang bskal par nyan kyang skyo bar mi 'gyur ba rnyed na de bzhin gshegs pa yang chos ston cing / kha zas dang bral bar
95b4(mdo sde): bskal par yang mi ldang ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa sems can la lta bas tha na gang na sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can gcig gi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing
95b5(mdo sde): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'da' zhing 'gro ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la lus ngal ba 'am/ ngag ngal ba 'am/ sems ngal ba med do// de bzhin gshegs pa ni
95b6(mdo sde): lus dang sems shin tu byang ba'o// brtson 'grus brtsams pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi sngags pa smra ba ste/ brtson 'grus kyis yang dag par rab tu sbyor ba gang
95b7(mdo sde): gis sems can 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba thos par 'gyur ba'i brtson 'grus de sems can rnams la bsngags par byed pa ste/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin
95b8(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad pa'o// gzhan ya shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa zhi yong ye dran pa brib med cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i dran pa
96a1(mdo sde): rnams pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhes/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
96a2(mdo sde): bar sangs rgyas ma thag tu/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi sems can gyi rgyud la rnam par bltas kyang / de la de bzhin gshegs pa shin du dran pa nyams
96a3(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba med do// sems can gyi spyod pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes kyang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes phyir gtong ba med do// sems can gyi dbang po phung po gsu
96a4(mdo sde): du rnam par gnas pa la 'jug pa dang / sems can gyi bsam pa la 'jug pa dang / sems can gyi spyod pa la rnam par blta ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dran pa
96a5(mdo sde): yongs su nyams pa med do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dran pa ni dran par bya ba dang / bsam par bya ba dang / brtag par bya ba med kyang sems can rnams la chos ston
96a6(mdo sde): pa 'bri bar mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ji ltar yang de la dran pa bri ba med do// de ji ltar dran zhing bdag gi dran pa nyams pa med pa de ltar sems can rnams la chos ston
96a7(mdo sde): te/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dgu pa'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin bri ba med do// gang de bzhin
96a8(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin de ni chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid de/ chos thams cad mi mnyam pa ma yin no// chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin pa'o// de ci'i phyir de bzhin
96b1(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin bri bar mi 'gyur zhe na/ gang de bzhin nyid mnyam pa de ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa'o// gang ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam pa ste/
96b2(mdo sde): de mnyam pa nyid la zhugs pas de'i phyir mnyam pa zhes bya'o// gang 'dod chags kyi mtha' mnyam pa de 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mtha' mnyam pa'o// gang zhe na ngag gi
96b3(mdo sde): mtha' mnyam pa de zhe sdang med pa'i mtha' mnyam pa'o// gang gti mug gi mtha' mnyam pa de gti mug med pa'i mtha' mnyam pa'o// gang 'dus byas kyi mtha' mnyam pa
96b4(mdo sde): de 'dus ma byas kyi mtha' mnyam pa'o// gang 'khor ba'i mtha' mnyam pa de mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtha' mnyam pa ste/ de mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pas de'i phyir de bzhin
96b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin bri ba med ces bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mnyam pa nyid la bri ba med yongs su bri ba med do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin de yang mig dang /
96b6(mdo sde): ldan pa ma yin/ rna ba dang / sna dang lce dang / lus dang / yid dang ldan pa ma yin mod kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po ma tshang ba yang ma yin no// ting nge 'dzin 'di sa'i khams/
96b7(mdo sde): la mi gnas/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la mi gnas/ 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i khams la mi gnas/ 'jig rten
96b8(mdo sde): pha rol la mi gnas so// mi gnas pas na bri ba med do// de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin bri ba med do// sems can thams cad kyang de bzhin ga kye
97a1(mdo sde): pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnyed par bya ba'i phyir chos ston te/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu pa'o// /
97a2(mdo sde): gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab bri ba med do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab gang zhe na/ gang chos thams cad shes pa ste/ gzhan gyi dring
97a3(mdo sde): la mi 'jog pa'i ye shes so// sems can gzhan rnams dang gang zag gzhan dag chos rnyed par byed pa'i ye shes so// mi gnyis pa so so yang dag par rig pa la
97a4(mdo sde): mkhas pa'i ye shes so// gnas thams cad du dbye ba'i ye shes so// gnas cig la bzhugs pas bskal pa brgya stong du gnas shing ston pa'i ye shes so// ji ltar
97a5(mdo sde): ji 'dra zhes dris pa ji lta ba bzhin du the tshom gcod pa'i ye shes so// thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i ye shes so// theg pa gsum rnam par bzhag pa ston pa'i ye shes
97a6(mdo sde): so// sems can gyi sems kyi spyod pa brgyad khri bzhi stong yongs su shes pa'i ye shes so// chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong ji rigs par yang dag par rab tu ston pa'i
97a7(mdo sde): ye shes so// 'di ni shes rab mi bzad pa bstan pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab mtha' yas mu med zad mi shes pa'i ye shes so// gang gi phyir de bzhin
97a8(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i shes rab bri ba med pa de bzhin du/ sems can rnams kyi shes rwa kyang mi zad par bya ba'i phyir chos ston te/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs
97b1(mdo sde): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu gcig pa'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba bri ba med do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba
97b2(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ nyan thos kyi rnam par grol ba ni sgra rjes su 'gro ba/ rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam par grol ba ni rkyen khong du chud pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
97b3(mdo sde): rnams kyi rnam par grol ba ni chags pa dang gnyis su 'dzin pa thams cad dang bral bas rnam par grol ba zhes bya ste/ thog ma'i mthar yang ma bcings pa/ tha ma'i
97b4(mdo sde): mthar yang mi phod/ da ltar yang gnas med do// mig dang gzugs kyi 'dzin pa gnyis las rnam par grol ba'o// de bzhin du rna ba dang / sgra dang / sna dang / dri dang /
97b5(mdo sde): lce dang / ro dang / lus dang / reg bya'i 'dzin pa gnyis las rnam par grol te/ mi 'dzin mngon par mi chags par gnas pa'i rnam par grol ba'o// sems rang bzhin
97b6(mdo sde): gyis 'od gsal ba de bzhin du shes pas de'i phyir sems kyi skad cig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs
97b7(mdo sde): rgyas zhes bya'o// ji ltar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams la chos ston te/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs
97b8(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu gnyis pa'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i lus kyi las thams cad ni ye shes kyi sngon du 'gro ste/ ye
98a1(mdo sde): shes kyi rjes su 'jug go// lus kyi las de dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa lta bas kyang sems can 'dul/ smra bas kyang sems
98a2(mdo sde): can 'dul/ mi smra bas kyang sems can 'dul/ za bas kyang sems can 'dul/ spyod lam gyis kyang sems can 'dul/ mtshan gyis kyang sems can 'dul/ dpe
98a3(mdo sde): byad bzang pos sems can 'dul/ gtsug tor ltar mi snang ba dang / bltas pa tsam dang / 'od gtong ba dang / gom pa 'dor ba dang / 'jog pa dang / grong khyer du 'jug
98a4(mdo sde): pa dang / 'byung bas sems can 'dul te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyod lam gang gis kyang sems can 'dul bar mi 'gyur ba med do// de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs
98a5(mdo sde): pa'i lus kyi las thams cad ye shes kyi sngon du 'gro ste/ ye shes kyi rjes su 'jug pa zhes bya ste/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
98a6(mdo sde): 'dres pa bcu gsum pa'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngag gis las thams cad ni ye shes kyi sngon du 'gro ste/ ye shes kyi rjes su 'jug go/ de
98a7(mdo sde): ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'bras bu yod pa'i chos ston pa'o// lung mi ston pa mi zad pa'o// shin tu nges pa'i tshig smra ba'o// de
98a8(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i ngag de yang kun shes par byed pa/ rnam par shes par byed pa/ mi mtho ba/ mi dma' ba/ ma yo ba/ lngab ldib can ma yin pa/ gya gyu can
98b1(mdo sde): ma yin pa/ mi brlang ba/ mi rtsub pa/ 'jam pa gnyen pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ rang po ma yin pa/ mi 'chal ba/ mi 'tshe ba dang / mi myur ba/ rab myur ba ma yin pa/ shin
98b2(mdo sde): tu rnam par phye ba/ shin tu nges pa'i tshig rab tu gnyen pa/ shin tu gnyen pa/ rab tu gsal bar bsgrags pa/ byams par byed pa/ 'jam pa/ phan pa dang bcas pa/
98b3(mdo sde): dga' bar 'gyur ba/ mchod par 'gyur ba/ mdzes pa/ rdul med pa/ rdul dang bral ba/ tha ba med pa/ 'chal pa med pa/ ma slongs pa/ shin tu gsal ba/ thogs pa med
98b4(mdo sde): ba yang dag par zhugs pa/ 'od gsal ba/ drang ba ma 'jungs pa/ dum bu ma yin pa/ dig rig po ma yin pa/ bde ba bskyed pa/ lus sim par byed pa/ 'dod chags
98b5(mdo sde): zhi bar byed pa/ zhe sdang zhi bar byed pa/ gti mug sel ba/ bdud 'joms pa/ sdig pa sel ba/ rgod pa 'dul ba/ shes par byed pa/ rnga sgra mkhas pa/ dga' byed pa/
98b6(mdo sde): ka la ping ka'i sgra dbyangs/ dbang po'i sgra/ tshangs pa'i sgra/ rgya mtsho'i rlabs kyi sgra/ sprin gyi sgra/ sa'i sgra dbyangs/ khrung khrung gi sgra/ rma bya'i sgra/ kad ko ki la'i sgra/ 'dzi ban
98b7(mdo sde): 'dzi ba'i sgra/ ngang pa'i sgra skad/ ri dwags kyi rgyal po'i sgra/ khong du dang / byi bang dang / rnga ba na pa dang / dung dang / sil snyan rab tu bsgrags pa'i sgra kun shes par bya ba dang /
98b8(mdo sde): rnam par shes par bya ba/ zur phyin pa'i yid du 'ong ba/ mnyam par 'os pa/ zab pa/ lug lngar lkugs pa ma yin pa/ bde ba dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ tshig dang yi ge
99a1(mdo sde): mnyam pa/ shin tu nges par smra ba/ tshig dang yi ge dang / don dang tshig tu ldan pa/ chos kyi tshig dang ldan pa/ dus dang ldan pa/ tshod
99a2(mdo sde): dang ldan pa/ dus las mi 'da' ba/ dbang po rab dang tha ma shes shing ston/ sbyin pas brgyan pa/ tshul khrims sbyangs pa/ bzod pas bsgrubs pa/ brtson 'grus
99a3(mdo sde): 'bar ba/ bsam gtan gyis yid du 'ong bar byas pa/ shes rab las byung ba/ byams pa shin tu bsnams pa/ snying rjes mi skyo ba/ dga' ba'i 'od gsal ba/ btang
99a4(mdo sde): snyoms las 'byung ba/ theg pa gsum la rnam par 'jog pa/ dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi gcod pa/ phung po gsum du 'jog pa/ rnam par thar pa gsum
99a5(mdo sde): sbyong ba/ bden pa yongs su bsgoms pa/ ye shes yongs su bsgoms pa/ mkhas pas ma smad pa/ 'phags pas bstod pa/ nam mkha'i tshad du 'gro ba rnam pa'i
99a6(mdo sde): mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'o// shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngag ni de 'dra ste/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngag gi las thams cad ni ye shes kyi sngon du 'gro
99a7(mdo sde): ste/ ye shes kyi rjes su 'jug pa zhes bya ste/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu bzhi pa'o// gzhan yang sha ri'i bu de
99a8(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i yid kyi las thams cad ye shes kyi sngon du 'gro ste/ ye shes kyi rjes su 'jug go// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems
99b1(mdo sde): kyis brjod pa ma yin/ yid kyis ma yin/ rnam par shes pas ma yin gyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni ye shes kyis bskyed pa ste/ ye shes kyi bdag po'o//
99b2(mdo sde): gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes de yang sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rjes su song ba'o// sems can thams cad kyi yid kyi rjes su zhugs pa'o//
99b3(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi rnam par shes pa las rab tu dben pa'o// chos thams cad la nges par sems pa'o// ting nge 'dzin thams cad la gzhan gyi dring mi
99b4(mdo sde): 'jog pa'o// dmigs pa las shin tu 'das pa'o// rkyen las skye ba dang bral ba'o// srid pa gsum sel ba'o// nga rgyal gyi rnam pa thams cad las shin tu
99b5(mdo sde): 'das pa'o// bdud kyi las thams cad las nges par grol ba'o// rgyu dang g.yo thams cad dang bral ba'o// ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa dang bral ba'o//
99b6(mdo sde): ma rig pa dang gti mug gi ling tog med pa'o// lam gyi yan lag shin yongs su bsgoms pa'o// nam mkha' ltar rnam par mi rtog pa'o// chos kyi dbyings dang dbyer
99b7(mdo sde): med pa ste/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes sngon du 'gro ba'i yid kyi las so// shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
99b8(mdo sde): lnga pa'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu 'das pa'i dus la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes ma chags par mthong ba 'jug go// ji ltar 'jug ce na/ 'di la shA ri'i bu 'das
100a1(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing byung ba dang / ma byung ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bgrang ba'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par
100a2(mdo sde): shes so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed pa de'i rtswa dang shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags byung ba de dag thams cad rab tu shes so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed pa
100a3(mdo sde): de'i sems can gyi tshogs sems can du btags pa byung ba de dag thams cad rab tu shes so// de dag na sems can sna tshogs byung ba ji snyed pa gzugs tha dad pa
100a4(mdo sde): la sogs pa rgyas par bya ste/ sangs rgyas byung ba ji snyed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa re res chos bstan cing phye ma ji snyed pa de yang de bzhin du bsdu'o// sems
100a5(mdo sde): can ji snyed nyan thos kyi theg pas btul ba dang / ji snyed cig rang sangs rgyas kyi btul ba yang de bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par phye ba yang rab tu shes/ dge
100a6(mdo sde): slong gi dge 'dun rnam par phye ba dang tshe'i tshad rnam par phye ba yang rab tu shes so// chos gnas pa rnam par phye ba yang rab tu shes so// dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba yang rab tu shes
100a7(mdo sde): so// zas kyi mchog gi longs spyod kyang rab tu shes so// sems can thams cad kyi 'das pa'i rnam pa dang / 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu shes
100a8(mdo sde): so// dbang po sna tshogs dang / spyod pa sna tshogs dang / bsam pa sna tshogs kyang rab tu shes so// sems kyi rgyud kyang rab tu shes/ sems gang gi 'og tu sems gang 'byung
100b1(mdo sde): ba de dag thams cad 'grang ba'i tshul gyis mngon sum gyi shes pa dang / rjes su 'gro ba'i shes pas rab tu shes so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'das pa'i sems kyi rgyu/
100b2(mdo sde): gtong ba'ang mi dmigs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'di lta bu'i ye shes mi 'bri ba dang ldan pas sems can gyi bsam pa la chos ston te/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin
100b3(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu drug pa'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu ma 'ongs pa'i dus la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes ma thogs par mthong ba
100b4(mdo sde): 'jug go// ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa gang dag 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba de dag kyang shes so//
100b5(mdo sde): bskal pas tshig par 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang / chus bsdug par 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang / rlung gis sdud par 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gnas par 'gyur ba
100b6(mdo sde): ji snyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sa'i khams su 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang / rdul phra rab tu 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang / rtsa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang nag su 'gyur
100b7(mdo sde): ba ji snyed pa dang / skar ma'i gzugs su 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab 'byams re ren sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'byung bar 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang / rang
100b8(mdo sde): sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang / nyan thos 'byung bar 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'byung bar 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang / zas kyi longs spyod dang /
101a1(mdo sde): dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba dang / 'chag pa dang / 'dug pa dang spyod lam du 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rab 'byam
101a2(mdo sde): re re las nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis theg pas rnam par thar par 'gyur ba'i sems can ji snyed pa dang / sems can theg pa chen po'i rnam par thar par
101a3(mdo sde): 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang / de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu shes so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab 'byam re re sems can skye ba'i gnas su 'gyur ba ji snyed
101a4(mdo sde): pa dang / sems dang sems las byung ba skye ba dang skye bar 'gyur ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu shes so// de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa
101a5(mdo sde): rab tu shes kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ma 'ongs pa'i sems kyi rgyud bskal par 'gyur ba ma yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ma 'ongs pa la lta bas sems can rnams la chos ston
101a6(mdo sde): to// shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu bdun pa'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu da ltar gyi dus la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes
101a7(mdo sde): ma chags ma thogs par mthong ba 'jug go// ji ltar 'jug ce na/ 'di shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa da ltar gyi phyogs bcu'i sang+yas kyi zhing thams cad bgrang ba'i tshul rnam
101a8(mdo sde): pa gsum gyis rab tu shes so// da ltar gyi chos thams cad rab tu shes so// da ltar gyi byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / de bzhin du da ltar gyi nyan thos dang rang sangs
101b1(mdo sde): rgyas rnams rab tu shes so// da ltar gyi skar ma'i gzugs thams cad kyang rab tu shes so// da ltar gyi rtsa dang shing sel ba dang sman dang nags thams cad kyang rab tu shes//
101b2(mdo sde): da ltar gyi phyogs bcu'i sa'i khams rdul phra rab kyi rdul gyi char blags pa thams cad kyang rab tu shes so// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams skra'i rtse mos blangs pa'i thig
101b3(mdo sde): pa thams cad kyang bgrang ba'i tshul gyis rab tu shes so// phyogs bcu'i me'i khams kyi 'od 'phro ba skyes pa dang / 'gags pa thams cad kyang bgrang ba'i tshul gyis rab tu
101b4(mdo sde): shes so// phyogs bcu'i rlung gi khams thams cad kyang gzugs kyi khams sgrub pa bgrang ba'i tshul gyis rab tu shes so// phyogs bcu'i na mkha'i khams thams cad
101b5(mdo sde): kyang skra'i rtse mo'i mthas bgrang ba'i tshul gyis rab tu shes so// ji ltar gyi sems can gyi khams rnam pa gsum yang rab tu shes so// da ltar gyi sems can dmyal ba pa'i
101b6(mdo sde): sems can gyi khams kyang rab tu shes so// de'i skye ba'i rgyu yang rab tu shes so// ldang ba'i rgyu yang rab tu shes so// da ltar gyi byol song gi skye gnas su song ba'i sems can
101b7(mdo sde): gyi khams kyang rab tu shes so// de'i skye ba'i rgyu yang rab tu shes so// ldang ba'i rgyu yang rab tu shes so// da ltar gyi gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sems can gyi khams kyang
101b8(mdo sde): rab tu shes so// de'i skye ba'i rgyu yang rab tu shes so// ldang ba'i rgyu yang rab tu shes so// da ltar gyi mi'i sems can gyi khams kyang rab tu shes so// de'i skye ba'i rgyu
102a1(mdo sde): yang rab tu shes so// da ltar gyi lha'i sems can gyi khams kyang rab tu shes so// de'i skye ba'i rgyu yang rab shes so// da ltar gyi
102a2(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud kyang rab tu shes so// de dag gi nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa yang rab tu shes so// nyon mongs pa dang bral ba yang rab tu shes
102a3(mdo sde): da ltar gyi sems can thams cad kyi dul ba'i dbang po yang rab tu shes so// dul ba ma yin pa'i dbang po yang rab tu shes so// de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu shre
102a4(mdo sde): kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la gnyis kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i rnam par shes pa med de/ mi gnyis pa la bzhugs pa'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston te/ shA ri'i bu
102a5(mdo sde): 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad do// shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po de dag dang ldan pas de bzhin gshes
102a6(mdo sde): pa'i phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten rab 'byam ma lus pa thams cad du 'khor gyi nang du gshegs te gzi brjid dang grags pa dang / dpal dang / ngo mtshar dang / rmad du byung ba'i
102a7(mdo sde): chos nyid kyis 'khor rnams zil gyis mnan nas lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o// de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mtha'
102a8(mdo sde): yas mu med do// 'di lta ste/ shA ri'i bu nam mkha' mtha' yas mu med pa de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yang mtha' yas mu med do//
102b1(mdo sde): gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi mtha' 'dod pa de ni nam mkha'i mtha' 'dod pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i de bzhi
102b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag thos nas mngon par dang / yid ches/ rab tu rtog som nyi med/ the tsom mi za/ rab tu dga' mgu rangs pa rnyed nas/
102b3(mdo sde): nam mkha' lta bur bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ngo mtshar dang smad du 'du shes skyed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di bka' stsal nas/ bde bar gshegs pa ston
102b4(mdo sde): ba gang yang 'di skad gsung ngo // 'dren pa la ni 'khrul pa yong med de// lus dang ngag rnams dang ni sems kyi g.yo// da ltar srog chags rnams la chos ston te// de ni
102b5(mdo sde): rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// mtho ba med cing dma' ba dag kyang med// chags dang khong khro las ni mngon par log/ nyon mongs med pa gnas shing nyon mongs grol/
102b6(mdo sde): de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// 'dren pa la ni dran pa nyams pa med// rnam thar spyod yul chos ni mngon par shes// so so yang dag pa ni nyams med de// de ni
102b7(mdo sde): rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// 'dug dang za ba dag na mnyam gzhag cing // 'chag dang nyal ba na yang mnyam par gzhag/ g.yeng ba med cing sems can 'du shes med//
102b8(mdo sde): de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// rgyal ba dang ni zhing dang sems can la// sna tshogs 'du shes bde bar gshegs la med// bsam pa chen pos mnyam pa nyid la
103a1(mdo sde): gnas// de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// de dag la ni ma btags btang snyoms med// shin tu nges pa'i lam ni rab bsgom pas//
103a2(mdo sde): de la rtog dang rnam par rtog med de// de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// dge ba la ni mos pa bri ba med// ston pa rtag tu snying rje rab sbyor zhing // sems can rgya chen
103a3(mdo sde): dpag tu med pa 'dul// de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// brtson 'grus bri ba rgya lam yod ma yin// 'dul ba pha rol mtha' yas mthong nas su// lus dang ngag rnam
103a4(mdo sde): dang ni yid kyis 'dul// de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// byang chub snying por sangs rgyas byang chub par// de ni dran pa rnam par chud za med// gang chos rtogs pa de ni
103a5(mdo sde): rtogs bya min// de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// rtog pa med cing rnam par rtog med par// rab 'byung ting nge 'dzin la mnyam gnas te// thams cad chos la mi
103a6(mdo sde): me gnas bsam gtan byed// de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// 'dren pa'i shes rab kyi ni rab shes te// sems can kun gyi spyod pa rab tu shes// de dag gi ni bas/
103a7(mdo sde): bzhin chos 'chad de// de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// nyan thos rnams kyi rnam grol sbra phyir 'gro// rang rgyal gyi ni rkyen gyis 'du shes te// sangs rgyas kyi ni btang
103a8(mdo sde): snyoms bsam mi khyab// chags las rab 'das dri med nam mkha' bzhin// sems kyi rgyud 'di rang bzhin rnam grol te// sems ni sdod nas bcings par gyur pa med/
103b1(mdo sde): lha rnam grol de lha chos ston te// de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// 'dug dang 'gro dang grong khyer 'jug pa dang // spyod lam dag ni mthong na mig kyang 'brog/ sangs rgyas
103b2(mdo sde): rnams kyi dpe byad bzang po dang // mtshan dang 'od kun gyi ni gdul bar ldon// sems can snying po nam zhig 'od gtong tshe// srog chags bye ba mang po bder 'gyur te// 'od
103b3(mdo sde): kyis reg pa dag ni 'dul bar 'gro// de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// rang byung dag ni skad cig brjod pas na// sems can bsam pa bzhin du skad thos te/
103b4(mdo sde): brag cha bzhin du de yi skad thos so// de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// 'dren pa'i lam ni ye shes kyis bya ste// bde bar gshegs la sems las cung zad
103b5(mdo sde): me daHsems can bsam pa ye shes rjes su zhugs// de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// bsam gtan ting nge 'dzin dang rab ldan zhing // spros pa thams
103b6(mdo sde): cad la ni 'jug ste// nam mkha' lta bur mnyam pa nyid du gnas// de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// 'das pa'i dus la de yi ye shes 'gro// thams cad chos
103b7(mdo sde): la sgrib pa med pa 'jug/ shin tu rnam phye sna tshogs ye shes 'gro// de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// ma 'ongs dus na gang dag 'jig rten du// 'gyur bar
103b8(mdo sde): 'gyur dang 'byung bar mi 'gyur dang // sems can dang ni zhing dang rgyal ba dang // de dag thams cad sangs rgyas ma lus shes// ma 'ongs de la rjes su rab lta zhing
104a1(mdo sde): de ltar sems can rnams kyi chos shes kyang // de yi sems ni g.yeng bar mi 'gyur te// 'di ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos/
104a2(mdo sde): da ltar lam gang 'jug par 'gyur ba dang // thams cad rgyal bas thogs med rab tu shes// 'dren pa'i spyod yul nam mkha' lta bu ste// de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma
104a3(mdo sde): 'dres chos// de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos ni ma 'dres pa// bco brgyad gsungs pa bsam gyis mi khyab ste// de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' 'dra ba la//
104a4(mdo sde): dad cing mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang / shA ri'i bu 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad de/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag dang ldan
104a5(mdo sde): pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor gyi nang du gshegs nas/ seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog cing khyu mchog gi
104a6(mdo sde): gnas su dam 'cha' ste/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang 'thun par ma bskor ba tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu
104a7(mdo sde): bskor ro// de ltar shA ri'i bu dad pa de lta bu la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di bcus de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par dang / yid
104a8(mdo sde): sarabatu / sem gyi med/ btsas mi pa/ rab tu dga' mgu rangs pa rmed nas/ ngo mtshar dang slad du 'du shes bskyeng //
104b1(mdo sde): / byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod// bam po brgyad pa// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de ltar dad pa la
104b2(mdo sde): rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi snod du rig byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi snod du rig/
104b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du rig nas/ der song ste byang chub sems dpa'i lam yang dag par rab tu ston to// de'i phyir shA ri'i bu rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar
104b4(mdo sde): rig par bya ste/ 'di ltar dad pa la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi snod du rig byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos
104b5(mdo sde): kyi rnam grangs kyi snod du rig sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du rig nas der song ste/ byang chub kyi lam yang dag par ston to// shA ri'i bu sngon 'das pa'i dus na 'byung /
104b6(mdo sde): ba bskal pa grangs med pa shin tu grangs med pa yangs pa tshad med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa na de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
104b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas phung po chen po zhes bya ba rig pa dang rkang par ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams
104b8(mdo sde): kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/ gang 'di ltar bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / bdud du bcas pa dang / tshangs par bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang /
105a1(mdo sde): bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas
105a2(mdo sde): te/ bsgrub nas gnas so// de chos ston pa ni thog mar yang dge ba/ bar du dge tha mar yang dge don bzang po yi ge bzang po/ ma 'dres pa yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs
105a3(mdo sde): su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba/ tshangs par spyod pa yang dag par rab tu ston to// shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phung po chen po
105a4(mdo sde): nyan thos khrag khrig phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi nyan thos kyi tshogs chen po byung ste/ thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ sems can thams cad
105a5(mdo sde): kyi dbang dam pa'i pha rol tu bgrod par phyin pa sha stag go/ shA ri'i bu de'i dus na rgyal po'i tshe rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba chos can chos kyi rgyal po zhig byung ngo // yang shA ri'i bu rgyal po'i
105a6(mdo sde): tshe rnam par rgyal ba'i grong khyer rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba/ rgyal ba'i gnas 'byor pa mod pa/ bde ba lo legs pa/ dga' ba/ 'gro ba mang po dang mis gang ba zhig
105a7(mdo sde): yod de/ yang shA ri'i bu rgyal po de'i tshe rnam par rgyal ba'i khye'u gzhon nu brtson 'grus spyod pa zhes bya ba/ sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba spun pa/ sngon gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bya ba
105a8(mdo sde): byas pa/ sngon gyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'argya song la bzhin bkur byas pa/ gzugs padang pa mdzes pa lan mug pa/ mdog sachog tu babang dang rgyas pa dang ldan pa zhis byung/
105b1(mdo sde): yang shA ri'i bu de'i dus na gzhon nu brtson 'grus spyod slas dang lhan cig tu skyed tshal du song bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
105b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas phung po chen pos/ kye ma'o gzhon nu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi snod do// kye ma'o gzhon nu brtson 'grus spyod 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi
105b3(mdo sde): chos rnams kyi snod do// zhes de ltar rig nas skyed mos tshal gyi sa ga la ba dang / gzhon nu brtson 'grus spyod ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ steng gi nam mkha' la 'dug
105b4(mdo sde): ste/ gzhon nu brtson 'grus spyod la byang chub kyi lam yang dag par rab tu ston to// de la byang chub kyi lam gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la byams pa dang /
105b5(mdo sde): pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la rab tu brtson pa dang / sdu ba'i dngos po rnams kyi rjes su 'jug pa ste/ de ni byang chub kyi lam zhes bya'o// de la sems can thams cad la byams
105b6(mdo sde): ba gang zhe na/ 'di la gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can gyi khams ji tsam pa de tsam du byams pas khyab par byed do// sems can gyi khams ji tsam zhe na/ na mkha'i
105b7(mdo sde): khams ji tsam pa sems can gyi khams kyang de tsam mo// 'di lta ste/ gzhon nu nam mkha'i khams 'dis khyab par ma gyur pa gang yang med do// gzhon nu de bzhin du gang byang
105b8(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i byams pas sems can gyi ris na gang khyab par ma gyur pa'i sems can de dag gang yang med do// 'di lta ste/ gzhon nu sems can gyi khams dpag tu med pa
106a1(mdo sde): de bzhin du gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa'i byams pa sgom pa yang dpag tu med do// gzhon nu de ltar na nam mkha' mtha' yas pas sems
106a2(mdo sde): can mtha' yas/ sems can mtha' yas pas byams pa mtha' yas so// gzhon nu yang sems can gyi khams ni ches mang gi sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang /
106a3(mdo sde): me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams ni de lta ma yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang gzhon nu sems can gyi khams tshad med pa ci tsam pa de'i don shes par bya ba'i phyir/ dpe bstan to// gzhon
106a4(mdo sde): nu 'di lta ste yongs su rtog pa bzung ste/ shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / de bzhin du phyogs mtshams dang /
106a5(mdo sde): phyogs bcu kun tu 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang mnyam pa de thams cad chus yongs su gang ba'i rgya mtshor gyur pa'i rgya mtsho chen po cig tu gyur te/ de la sems
106a6(mdo sde): can gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'dus na/ brgyar btsal ba'i skra'i rtse mos chu'i thigs pa cig blangs gzhan yang sems can gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'dus nas brgyar btsal ba'i
106a7(mdo sde): skra'i rtse mos chu'i thigs pa gnyis blangs/ gzhan yang sems can gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'dus nas brgyar btsal ba'i skra'i rtse mos chu'i thigs pa gsum blangs na/ gzhon
106a8(mdo sde): nu yongs su rtog pa bzung ste/ de lta bu'i thabs kyis chu'i phung po de zad par gyur kyang / sems can gyi khams ni tshad dang mtha' med de/ gzhon nu sems can gyi khams de ltar
106b1(mdo sde): dpag tu med cing de ltar mtha' yas pa de thams cad la/ byang chub sems dpa'i byams pas khyab par byed do// gzhon nu de ji snyam du sems/ gang de ltar dpag tu med par
106b2(mdo sde): byams pa sgoms pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i tshad bzung bar nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ma lags so// bde bar gshegs pa de ma lags so// gzhon nu
106b3(mdo sde): de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byams pa chen po sgoms pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ni dpag tu med pa yin te/ gzhon nu de'i byams pa ni bdag srung ba yin/
106b4(mdo sde): gzhan la phan par gnas pa yin/ mchog tu gnod sems med pa/ khro ba dang gnod sems kyi tha ba dang bral ba/ nyes pa 'joms pa/ chags pa'i kun nas ldang ba dang bral ba/
106b5(mdo sde): dad pa kun tu ston pa/ 'khrul pa thams cad la nyes par lta ba/ yongs su gdung ba med pa/ lus dang ngag dang sems bde ba skyed pa/ gzhan gyis gnod par bya ba thams cad ma
106b6(mdo sde): lhung ba/ 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral ba/ 'phags pa'i lam dang 'thun pa/ gshe ba dang khros pa la dang bskyed pa/ g.yul thams cad las bsgrol ba/ dbyig pa dang
106b7(mdo sde): mtshon cha mi 'chang ba/ sems can rab tu thar bar bya ba la dga' ba/ khong khro ba thams cad dang bral ba/ tshul 'chos pa dang / kha gsag dang / 'drid pa dang / gzhog slongs thams
106b8(mdo sde): cad dang bral ba/ rang gi thob pa dang / bkur sti dang tshogs su bcad pas 'tsho ba/ brgya byin dang tshangs pas phyag byas pa/ rang gi gzi brjid kyis brgyan pa/ mkhas pas
107a1(mdo sde): bstod pa byis pa thams cad rjes su srung ba/ tshangs pa'i lam dang 'thun pa/ 'dod pa'i khams dang ma 'dres pa/ thar pa'i lam gyi thog mar
107a2(mdo sde): gyur pa/ theg pa thams cad kyis yang dag par bzung ba/ zang zing med pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags pa/ rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po thams cad kyi
107a3(mdo sde): zil gyis ma gnon pa/ mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang pos yang dag par brgyan pa/ dbang po nyams shing ma tshang ba thams cad spangs pa/ bde 'gro dang mya ngan las
107a4(mdo sde): 'da' ba'i lam thams cad du 'gro ba/ ngan song thams cad dang mi khom pa brgyad las bzlogs pa/ chos kyi dga' ba la dga' zhing mos pa/ 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad dang / dbang nge/
107a5(mdo sde): dang rgyal srid la mngon par mi dga' ba/ sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa rab tu sbyor ba/ tha dad pa'i 'du shes dang bral ba/ tshul khrims dang slab pa thams
107a6(mdo sde): cad kyi sgo// tshul khrims ngan pa thams cad kyi skyabs/ bzod pa'i stobs kun tu ston pa/ nga rgyal dang rgyags pa dang / dregs pa thams cad dang bral ba/ mi 'khrugs pa'i brtson 'grus
107a7(mdo sde): rtsom pa/ yang dag par sbyong ba'i bya ba sgrol ba/ bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i rtsa ba/ nyon mongs pa las byung ba/ sems nges
107a8(mdo sde): par rtog pa thos pa 'dzin pas shes rab kyi rgyu skyed pa'i byams pa/ bdag gi phyogs dang gzhan gyi phyogs 'joms pa/ bdud dang nyon mongs pa'i phyogs sel ba/ 'grogs na bde ba
107b1(mdo sde): ldang ba/ spong ba dang 'dug pa dang nyal ba'i spyod lam srung bar byed pa/ rgod pa'i rang bzhin yid la byed pa/ dri zhim pos byugs pa/ khrel dang 'dzem par byugs pa/ mi khom pa dang
107b2(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa dang / ngan 'gro thams cad sel ba'i byams pa/ 'gro ba thams cad skyobs pa'i byams pa chen po bdag gi bde ba btang ba/ sems can thams cad la bde ba rab tu sbyin
107b3(mdo sde): pa ste/ gzhon nu nyan thos rnams kyi byams pa ni bdag skyobs pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byams pa ni sems can thams cad la skyob pa'o// yang gzhon nu byang chub sems
107b4(mdo sde): dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa rnams kyi byams pa ni sems can la dmigs so// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la zhugs pa rnams kyi byams pa ni chos la dmigs pa'o// byang
107b5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' bzod pa rab tu thob pa rnams kyi byams pa ni dmigs pa med pa ste/ gzhon nu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byams pa zhes bya ste/
107b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' byams pa de la rab tu gnas nas sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed do// de la gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po gang zhe na/ gzhon
107b7(mdo sde): nu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod pa'i sngon du 'gro ba ni snying rje chen po'o// 'di lta ste/ gzhon nu skyes bu'i srog gi dbang po'i sngon du 'gro ba
107b8(mdo sde): ni dbugs phyir 'byung ba dang rngub pa'o// gzhon nu de bzhin du theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sngon du 'gro ba ni snying rje chen po'o// 'di lta ste/ gzhon
108a1(mdo sde): nu 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i rin po che thams cad kyi sngon du 'gro ba ni 'khor lo rin po che yin no// gzhon nu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
108a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi sngon du 'gro ba ni snying rje chen po yin te/ snying rje chen po de yang sems can thams cad rjes su mi gtong ba'o// gzhon nu byang
108a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po de sems can thams cad la ji ltar 'jug ce na/ gzhon nu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas 'jig tshogs la lta bas bcings shing lta bar gyur pa mang
108a4(mdo sde): bo la chags pa'i sems mthong na/ de dag gi 'jig tshogs la lta bas bcings pa spang ba'i phyir chos ston to zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams la snying rje chen po 'jug go//
108a5(mdo sde): gzhan yang gzhon nu byang chub sems dpas yang dag pa ma yin pa phyin ci log gi gnas la gnas te/ mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes pa dang / sdug bsngal ba la bde bar 'du shes
108a6(mdo sde): pa dang / bdag med pa la bdag tu 'du shes pa dang / mi sdug pa la sdug par 'du shes pa'i sems can mthong ba/ de dag gi yang ba ma yin pa'i phyin ci log spang ba'i phyir chos
108a7(mdo sde): ston to// byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams la snying rje chen po 'jug go/ gzhan yang gzhon nu byang chub sems dpas phyin ci log gi 'dod pa la zhen pa'i sems can de ma
108a8(mdo sde): la yang g.yem pa dang / sring mo la yang g.yem pa mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma'o 'jig rten gnas pa 'di dag ni 'phags pa ma yin pa 'dus pa
108b1(mdo sde): ste/ mu cor smra bas yongs su gang zhing 'dzem pa med pas yongs su gang / 'di ltar ma'i rum mngal gyi nang na 'dug pa las/ mngal gyi sgo nas byung ba de dang lhan cig tu 'dod
108b2(mdo sde): pa sten par byed pa lta ga la srid/ mngal gcig na lhan cig tu 'dug 'dug pa'i sring mo dang 'du zhing g.yem byed pa ga la srid de/ kye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni brlag go rnam par
108b3(mdo sde): brlag go// rab tu brlag go/ 'dod chags kyi nyen to// zhe sdang gi nyen to// gti mug gi nyen to// chos las nyams shing chos ma yin pa la gnas so// log pa'i chos la
108b4(mdo sde): rab tu spyod do// sems can dmyal ba pa la spyod yul pa'o// byol song gi skye gnas su spyod yul pa'o// gshin rje'i 'jig rten du spyod yul pa'o// log pa'i lam la spyod
108b5(mdo sde): pa'o// gzhon nu 'di lta ste/ wa dur khrod kyi mthar g.yang sa chen po dang nye ba zhig na mtshan mo khyis rtses nas g.yang sa chen po nas lhung ngo // gzhon nu de bzhin du sems can dag
108b6(mdo sde): kyang wa dang 'dra'o// gzhon nu 'di lta ste/ dmus long khyis rtses na g.yang sa chen po dang nye bar gyur pa de bzhin du/ kye ma'o gzhon nu sems can de dag kyang dmus long dang 'dra'o//
108b7(mdo sde): gzhon nu 'di lta ste/ phag gi zas ni mi gtsang ba ste/ mi gtsang ba za'o// gzhon nu kye ma'o de bzhin du sems can de dag kyang phag dang 'dra'o// de nyid ma yin de nyid sring mo yin
108b8(mdo sde): na/ de chung mar bya ba lta ga la srid sngam ste/ sems can de dag nyon mongs pas nyan pa dang / bdud kyi phyogs kyi spyod yul dang / bdud kyi zhags pas bcings pa dang / 'dod
109a1(mdo sde): pa'i 'dam du bying ba dag gi 'dod pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir chos bstan to zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams la snying rje chen
109a2(mdo sde): po 'jug go/ gzhon nu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas/ sgrib pa lngas bsgribs pa'i sems can 'dod pa'i zung rngus zug pa mthong na/ skye mched drug la chags shing
109a3(mdo sde): zhen pa/ mig gis gzugs mthong na mtshan mar 'dzin par 'gyur zhing dpe byad du 'dzin pa dang / rna bas sgra/ snas dri/ lces ro/ lus kyi reg pa la reg nas/ mtshan
109a4(mdo sde): mar 'dzin cing dpe byad du 'dzin par 'gyur te/ kye ma sems can 'di dag ni khong khro ba mang zhing phan tshun du mi mdza' ste/ de dag don rnyed pa'i phyir mdza' bor yang mi shes/ gnod
109a5(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba'i phyir gcig la gcig gsod do// kye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni gnyid dang rmugs pa mang ste/ zhan cing klang pa mi shes pa'i ling tog gis khebs shing mi
109a6(mdo sde): dge ba'o// kye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni 'gyod pas kun nas skor ba ste/ blo bur gyi nyon mongs pas sems can kun nas nyon mongs pa'o// kye ma'o sems can 'di
109a7(mdo sde): dag ni the tsom gyis yongs su dkris pa/ chos zab mo la gdon mi za ba ma thob pa ste/ de dag gi sgrib pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir chos ston to zhes byang chub sems dpa' sem
109a8(mdo sde): can rnams la snying rje chen po 'jug go// gzhon nu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems can nga rgyal gyis non pa/ che ba'i nga rgyal gyis non pa/ nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal
109b1(mdo sde): gyis non pa/ nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal gyis non pa/ mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis non pa/ chung ba'i nga rgyal gyis non pa/ log pa'i nga rgyal gyis non pa/ dma' babs bdag mtho ba sems
109b2(mdo sde): bas/ mtshungs pa bas bdag ches lhag par lta ba de dag gzugs la bdag ces khas len pa nas/ rnam par shes pa'i bar la bdag ces khas len khong du ma chud pas/ khong du
109b3(mdo sde): chud snyam du shes pa gus par smra bar 'os pa la/ gus par mi smra bar phyag bya bar 'os pa la phyag mi 'tshal ba/ rgan pa dang gzhon pa la mi 'dud pa/ bla ma la bsnyen bkur mi byed pa/
109b4(mdo sde): mkhas pa la dge ba gang mi dge ba gang / bsnyen par bya ba gang bsnyen par mi bya ba gang / bya ba gang mi bya ba gang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa gang / kha na ma tho ba med pa gang
109b5(mdo sde): lam gang / ting nge 'dzin gang / rnam par grol ba gang zhes 'dri ba dang / bdag nyid la bdag ni gtso bo// bdag ni mchog go snyam du sems pa'i sems can mthong na//
109b6(mdo sde): 'di ltar nga rgyal gyi rnam pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir chos ston to zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams la snying rje chen po 'jug go// gzhon nu gzhan yang byang chub sems
109b7(mdo sde): dpas srid pa'i bcings pa sred pas 'khol ba/ chung ma dang bu pho dang bu mo pa/ gnod pas zin pa/ don med pas zin pa/ 'khor ba'i gtam pas zin pa/ sems can dmyal
109b8(mdo sde): bdang / byol song kyi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam gyi zin pa/ sred pa'i bcings pas zin pa/ rang 'am med pa/ rang dbang med pa'i sems can de dag
110a1(mdo sde): mthong na de dag rang nyam dang / rang dbang dang / gang du dga' bar 'gro ba dang / mya ngan las 'das par 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir bya stan to zhes bya
110a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems can rnams la snying rje chen po 'jug go/ gzhon nu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral ba/ sdig pa'i grogs pos non
110a3(mdo sde): bde dag sdig pa'i grogs pos non pas/ mi dge ba'i las la chags pa 'di lta ste/ srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / rdzun
110a4(mdo sde): du smra ba dang / phra ma dang / tshig rtsub pa dang / tshig thun tshags dang / chags sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba'i sems can mthong na/ 'di ltar dge ba'i bshes
110a5(mdo sde): gnyen bsdu ba dang / mi dge ba'i las las ldog pa dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par bzung ste spyod par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnas
110a6(mdo sde): la snying rje chen po 'jug go/ gzhon nu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas gti mug gis bsgribs pa ma rig pa'i mun nag gi ling tog gis kun tu bsgribs pa/ bdag dang sems
110a7(mdo sde): can dang / srog dang / 'gro ba dang / shed can dang / shes las skyes pa dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzim
110a8(mdo sde): pa la mngon par chags pa'i sems can mthong na/ de dag 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi mig rnam par sbyang zhing la bar gyur pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir chos bstan to zhes byang chub sems
110b1(mdo sde): dpa' sems can rnams la snying rje chen po 'jug go/ gzhon nu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas 'khor ba mngon par dga' ba'i sems can mthong na/ de dag phung po lnga'i
110b2(mdo sde): gshed ma las rab tu thar bar bya ba dang / 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa las rab tu bzla ba dang / khams gsum thams cad las gdon pa'i phyir chos bstan to zhes byang chub
110b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems can rnams la snying rje chen po 'jug go// gzhon nu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems can 'khrugs par gyur pa/ rtsa mun dza dang / bal ba dza lta
110b4(mdo sde): bu mi drang ba yon po zhugs pa/ 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol tu/ 'jig rten pha rol nas 'jig rten 'dir kun tu rgyug cing / 'khor ba 'gro ba lngar 'gro ba la phyogs pa/ mya
110b5(mdo sde): ngan las 'das par 'gro ba la ma phyogs pa mthong na/ de dag gi mya ngan las 'da' ba'i sgo dbye ba'i chos ston to zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams la snying rje chen po
110b6(mdo sde): 'jug go// gzhon nu de ltar byang chub sems dpas sems can gyi khams mthong na/ rnam pa bcu po de dag gis snying rje chen po 'jug go// bsam pa las phyir de'i snying rje chen
110b7(mdo sde): bo de yang g.yo ba med par 'jug go// khrag pa'i bsam pa las byung ba'i phyir snying rje chen po de yang mnyam par 'jug go// lam las byung ba'i phyir snying rje chen po de yang drang po
110b8(mdo sde): g.yo med par 'jug go// sems gyakyagyu la mi gnas pa las byung ba'i phyir de'i snying rje chen po de yang gya gyu med par 'jug go// 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad 'dud pa dang
111a1(mdo sde): sde snod @#phyag 'tshal ba las rab tu byung ba'i phyir/ de'i snying rje chen po de yang bdag gi bde ba gtor bar 'jug go// 'di lta ste/ bdag gis sems yo
111a2(mdo sde): su dag pa las byung ba'i phyir/ de'i snying rje chen po de yang pha rol rjes su srung bar 'jug go// 'di lta ste/ g.yo zhing 'gul ba'i sems dang bral bar rab tu gnas pa'i sems las
111a3(mdo sde): byung ba'i phyir/ de'i snying rje chen po de yang shes rab brtan par 'jug go// 'di lta ste/ pha rol la bde bar sbyin pa las rab tu byung ba'i phyir/ de'i snying rje chen po de yang bde ba gtod
111a4(mdo sde): bar 'jug go// brtson 'grus brtan pa las rab tu byung ba'i phyir/ de'i snying rje chen po de yang sems can thams cad kyi khur khyer bar 'jug ste/ gzhon nu 'di ltar byang chub sems
111a5(mdo sde): dpa'i snying rje chen po ni rnam pa 'di dag dang / gzhan yang rnam pa bcu'i 'jug go// gzhon nu 'di ltar gang la la theg pa chen pos 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang rnam pa 'di dag gi
111a6(mdo sde): 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de'i phyir snying rje chen po zhes bya'o// sbyin pa byed pa dang / tshul khrims byed pa dang / bzod pa byed pa dang / brtson 'grus byed pa dang / bsam gtan
111a7(mdo sde): byed pa dang / shes rab byed pa ni snying rje chen po ste/ de'i phyir snying rje chen po zhes bya'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa byed pa dang / yang dag par spong bar byed pas snying rje
111a8(mdo sde): chen po'o// dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / rab tu dge ba'i rtsa ba'i las byed pa'i mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
111b1(mdo sde): dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang / gnas de dag thams cad kyang rgyas par bya ba ste/ snying rje chen po ni rang 'byung ba'i ye shes bsgrub par byed pas/ de'i phyir snying rje chen
111b2(mdo sde): po zhes bya'o// rang gi bya ba dang / legs par byed pa bya ba dang / mi 'gyur ba'i bya ba dang / sems can thams cad la bya ba ci yod snyam pa ste/ de'i snying rje chen po de yang
111b3(mdo sde): sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par byed pas/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i snying rje chen po zhes bya ste/ byang chub
111b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po de dang ldan pas sems can 'di 'dra ba'i gnas thob pa mthong na de dag la snying rtse ba dang / snying rje ba'i sems bskyed do// de
111b5(mdo sde): la byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba gang zhe na/ gang dge ba'i chos rnams dran pa dang / rjes su dran pa dang / dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / dge
111b6(mdo sde): ba'i chos la mi zhum pa dang / mi 'gong ba dang / yongs su mi skyo ba dang / mi dga' ba thams cad la dga' bar gnas pa dang / sems rab tu dga' ba dang / lus rab tu
111b7(mdo sde): tshim pa dang / blo rab tu dga' ba dang / yid rab tu mgu ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la mngon par dga' zhing mos pa dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po'i rgyan
111b8(mdo sde): kun tu tshol ba dang / chos nyan pas yongs su mi skyo zhing dga' ba dang / chos kyi phyir 'brang ba'i nan tan la rab tu dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba'i chos la mgu ba dang /
112a1(mdo sde): sde stod sems can rnams la khong khro ba med pa dang / byang chub la dga' ba dang / chos rgya chen po la mos pa dang / nyi tshe ba'i theg pa
112a2(mdo sde): sel bar sems bskyed pa dang / ser sna tshar gcod pa dang / slong ba la dga' ba dang / gtong ba la rab tu dga' ba dang / tshul khrims ngan pa can dag sdud cing
112a3(mdo sde): byams pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa la rtag tu dad pa dang / bdag gi tshul khrims yongs su dag pas ngan 'gro dang / 'jigs pa thams cad las rab tu
112a4(mdo sde): 'da' bar dbugs 'byin pa la rab tu dga' ba dang / pha rol ngan du zer ba dang / ngan par 'ongs pa'i tshig gi lam bzod cing rab tu dga' ba dang / lag pa dang /
112a5(mdo sde): rkang pa dang / mig dang / mgo bcad kyang bzod par nus te/ sems mi nyams shing rab tu dga' ba dang / gong ma la 'dud cing zhes byed pa la dga' ba dang / rtag
112a6(mdo sde): tu bzhin 'dzum pa la dga' ba dang / khro gnyer med cing song por smra ba la dga' ba dang / tshul 'chos pa dang / kha gsag dang / gzhog slongs med pa la rab tu
112a7(mdo sde): dga' ba dang / snying po dang ldan pa'i chos la 'jug par rab tu dga' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' la ston pa bzhin du sdug pa dang / chos la bdag bzhin du sdug
112a8(mdo sde): ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la srog bzhin du sdug pa dang / bla ma la pha ma bzhin du sdug pa dang / sems can thams cad la bu bzhin du sdug pa dang / slom
112b1(mdo sde): dpon la mig bzhin du phangs pa dang / nan tan la yan lag gi dam pa mgo bzhin du phangs pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa la lag pa dang rkang pa bzhin du phangs pa dang / chos
112b2(mdo sde): smra ba la rin po che thams cad bzhin du phangs pa dang / chos yongs su tshol ba la sman bzhin du sdug pa dang / skul zhing dran par byed pa la sman bzhin du phangs par sems pa'o//
112b3(mdo sde): gzhon nu 'di ni dga' ba zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' ba de la rab tu gnas nas/ rtag tu chos tshol ba la dga' bar 'gyur te/
112b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa la mi skyo ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi btang snyoms gang zhe na/ btang snyoms pa rnam pa gsum ste/ rnam
112b5(mdo sde): pa gsum gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ nyon mongs pa la btang snyoms pa dang / bdag dang gzhan rjes su srung ba'i btang snyoms pa dang / dus dang dus ma yin par btang
112b6(mdo sde): snyoms pa'o// de la nyon mongs pa'i btang snyoms pa gang zhe na/ gang bkur stis mtho mi sems pa dang / bkur sti ma byas pas rma bar mi sems pa dang / rnyed
112b7(mdo sde): pas snyems pa med pa dang / ma rnyed pas yi mi 'chad pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang / tshul khrims ngan pa la blo mnyam pa dang / grags pa la dga' ba med
112b8(mdo sde): pa dang / ma grags pa la zhum pa med pa dang / smad pa la mi dga' ba med pa dang / stod pa la chos nyid du shin tu gnas pa dang / sdug bsngal ba la so sor rtog pa'i
113a1(mdo sde): stobs dang / bde ba la mi rtag pa so sor rtog pa'i stobs dang / chags pa 'dor ba dang / khro khro ba spang ba dang / mdza'/
113a2(mdo sde): ba dang sems mnyam pa dang / legs par byas pa dang / ngan par byas pa la gnyis su mi byed pa dang / dga' ba dang / mi dga' ba la mi lta ba dang / bsnyen bkur
113a3(mdo sde): byed pa dang / bsnyen bkur mi byed pa la dga' bar bya ba med pa dang / snyan par smra ba dang mi snyen par smra ba la byams pa dang / sdang ba med pa dang / bde ba dang nyes
113a4(mdo sde): pa la mtshungs par sems pa dang / bdag dang sems can gzhan la bsam pa mnyam pa dang / lus dang srog la mi lta ba dang / sems can rab 'bring tha ma la
113a5(mdo sde): 'od zer mnyam pa dang / bsngags pa dang ma bsngags pa la chos nyid mnyam pa dang / bden pa dang mi bden pa la bdag gi bden pa yongs su dag pa ste/ gzhon nu 'di
113a6(mdo sde): ltar gang bdag la gnod par byed pa de la byang chub sems dpa' btang snyoms pa yin no// de la bdag dang / gzhan rjes su srung ba'i btang snyoms gang zhe na/ gang yan
113a7(mdo sde): lag dang nying lag gi sha bcad kyang btang snyoms pa yin no// yan lag dang nying lag gi sha bcad kyang 'dod pa med cing tshol ba med pa de btang snyoms pa yin no// lus kyang mi
113a8(mdo sde): 'gyur dag kyang mi 'gyur te/ gnyi ka bzod pas de'i phyir btang snyoms pa zhes bya'o// mig gi rnam pas ma yin/ gzugs kyi rnam pas ma yin te/ gnyi gas kyang rma mi
113b1(mdo sde): byin pa nas yid kyi rnam pa dang / chos kyi rnam pa'i bar gyis rma mi byin pa'i byor btang snyoms shes bya'o// rmam byin cing ma med pas pa phyir btang snyoms shes bya'o// ma/
113b2(mdo sde): phyung ba la rma mi phyin pas de'i phyir btang snyoms shes bya'o// bdag dang pha rol gnyis ga'i bzod pas de'i phyir btang snyoms shes bya'o// phan 'dogs pa dang phan mi 'dogs
113b3(mdo sde): pa la mnyam par sbyor bas de'i phyir btang snyoms shes bya'o// btang snyoms ni mchog tu rtsod pa med pa'o// btang snyoms ni rang gi sems par rtog pa'o// btang snyoms ni
113b4(mdo sde): bdag la so sor rtog pa'o// btang snyoms ni gzhan la gnod pa med pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi btang snyoms ni mnyam par gzhag pa'i dngos po'o// yang
113b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcos ldan 'das rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la btang snyoms par rjes su ma gnang ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems
113b6(mdo sde): dpas rtag tu spyod par bya'o// rtag par rgyun du dge ba kun tu btsal ba la brtson par bya ste/ dus dus su btang snyoms sgom par bya'o// de la dus dus su btang sgom
113b7(mdo sde): bsgom pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ snod ma yin pa'i sems can la btang snyoms pa dang / bsnyen bkur mi byed pa la btang snyoms pa dang / ma rnyed pa dang rman pa dang /
113b8(mdo sde): ma grags pa dang / sdug bsngal ba la btang snyoms dang / rgan thos kyi theg par mi 'gyur ba zhugs pa la bcang snyoms pa dang / sbyin pa'i dus na tshul khrims
114a1(mdo sde): sde sngo @#brtul ba'i btang snyoms dang / tshul khrims kyi dus na sbyin pa brtul ba'i btang snyoms dang / bzod pa'i dus na sbyin pa dang /
114a2(mdo sde): tshul khrims dang / brtson 'gras brtul ba'i btang snyoms dang / brtson 'grus kyi dus na tshul khrims kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i btang snyoms dang / bsam gtan gyi
114a3(mdo sde): dus na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i brtul ba'i btang snyoms dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dus na pha rol tu phyin pa lnga la dmigs pa brtul ba'i btang snyoms
114a4(mdo sde): te/ 'di ni dus dus kyi btang snyoms shes bya'o// de lta gang mi bya ba'i chos mi byed pa de ni btang snyoms shes bya ste/ de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni mi
114a5(mdo sde): dge ba'i chos thams cad la btang snyoms pa'o// gzhon nu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad la byams pa dang / snying
114a6(mdo sde): rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms shes bya'o// de ltar shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phung po chen po des/ gzhon nu brtson 'grus spyod la byams
114a7(mdo sde): pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms 'dor bstan pa dang bcas/ rgyas par bstan pa dang bcas te/ rgya cher yang dag par bstan pa de/ gzhon nu brtson 'grus
114a8(mdo sde): spyod kyis thos nas/ pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson 'grus rtson par gyur to// // byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyi le'u ste lnga
114b1(mdo sde): pa'o// / de la shA ri'i bu pha rol tu phyin brtson pa gang zhe na/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag nyid yinaH/ gang pha rol tu phyin pa drug
114b2(mdo sde): 'di dag la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'o// drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims
114b3(mdo sde): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
114b4(mdo sde): pa ste/ de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug rnams so// de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang /
114b5(mdo sde): phongs pa rnams kyi sbyin bdag yin te/ 'di lta ste/ zas kyis phongs pa rnams la zas/ skom gyis phongs pa rnams la skom/ bzhon pa dang / gos dang / dri dang / phreng
114b6(mdo sde): ba dang / byug pa dang / gnas dang / yo byad dang / na ba'i sman dang / mar me dang / sil snyan dang / bran po dang / bran mo dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang /
114b7(mdo sde): bai DUr+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / rin po che thams cad dang / rta dang / glang po dang / shing rta dang / skyed mos tshal dang / dka' thub kyi nags tshal dang /
114b8(mdo sde): bu po dang / bu mo dang / chung ma dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bang ba dang / gling bzhi pa'i rgyal po'i longs spyod kyi bde ba thams cad dang / rtse ba dang / dga' ba
115a1(mdo sde): thams cad dang / lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / mig dang / mgo dang / sha dang / khrag dang / nang dang / rus pa
115a2(mdo sde): dang / 'jig rten gyi yo byad gang yang slong ba la yongs su mi gtong ba med do// sbyin pa de rnam pa bcus yongs su dag par sbyin par byed de/ bcu gang zhe na/ byang chub
115a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams dka' ba'i longs spyod kun tu tshol zhing sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can la gnod pa'i sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa'
115a4(mdo sde): rnams 'jigs shing skrag nas sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams yongs su mi gtong ba dang spyan 'dren pa'i sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams gdong du
115a5(mdo sde): lta zhing sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can la tha dad par sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams mdza' bas sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems
115a6(mdo sde): dpa' rnams ldang bas sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams zhing tshol zhing sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can thams cad la sprin gnas ma
115a7(mdo sde): yin zhes nus te sbyin pa med de/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa de rnam pa de bcus yongs su dag par sbyin par byed do// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
115a8(mdo sde): sbyin pa de gzhan rnam pa bcus yongs su dag par sbyin par byed de/ bcu gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams las kyi rnam par smin pa 'dod cing / sbyin pa med/ byang chub
115b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams bsam pa log par sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams yongs su skyo ba'i sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams nye bar bstan nas
115b2(mdo sde): sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams rjes su mi dga' ba'i sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'gyod pa'i sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
115b3(mdo sde): tshul khrims dang ldan pa la bkur te sbyin pa med/ tshul khrims ngan po la rnyas te sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams rnam par smin pa la re ba'i sbyin pa med de/
115b4(mdo sde): ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa de rnam pa de bcus yongs su dag par sbyin po byed do// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa de gzhan rnam pa bcus
115b5(mdo sde): yongs su dag par sbyin par byed de/ bcu gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams smad nas sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams gzhan du phyogs nas sbyin pa med
115b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams nyon mongs shing sbyin pa med/ khro ba dang phrag dog dang gnod sems ston cing sbyin pa med/ ri mor mi byed pa la sbyin pa med/ rang gi lag nas
115b7(mdo sde): ma yin par sbyin pa med/ ci tsam du spyan drangs pa las dbri zhing sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams skye ba 'dod cing sbyin pa med de/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems
115b8(mdo sde): dpa' sbyin pa de rnam pa de bcus yongs su dag par sbyin par byed do// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa de gagan nam pa bcus yongs su dag par sbyin par
116a1(mdo sde): byed de/ bcu gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams mi brtan par sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams chod 'dzin cing sbyin
116a2(mdo sde): pa med/ yongs su 'chad par sbyin pa med/ gzhan gyi dring 'jog ste sbyin pa med/ nyung zhes cung zad tsam sbyin pa med/ gzugs dang / longs spyod dang / dbang po la
116a3(mdo sde): mngon par dad pa'i sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / lhar skyes pa thams cad 'dod pa'i phyir sbyin pa
116a4(mdo sde): med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar bsngo zhing sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams mkhas pas smad pa'i sbyin pa med byang chub
116a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams thams cad mkhyen par ma bsngos pa'i sbyin pa med de/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa de rnam pa de bcus yongs su dag par sbyin par byed do// /
116a6(mdo sde): gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa de gzhan rnam pa bcus yongs su dag par sbyin par byed de/ bcu gang zhe na/ ci tsam 'dus byas las 'byung ba dang / 'dus
116a7(mdo sde): ma byas thob par bya ba'i phyir de ltar sbyin pa byin na/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa'i legs pa bcu 'thob par 'gyur ro// bcu gang zhe na/ bza' ba sbyin pas tshe dang
116a8(mdo sde): thazos dang / bde ba dang spobs dang / 'dog phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thatha za// btung ba byin pas tshon mongs pa dang / srid pa thams cad bskul po phun sum
116b1(mdo sde): tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo// gzhon pa byin pas bde ba thams cad kyi dngos po phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo// 'go ba byin pas 'brel pa dang 'dzem pa dang /
116b2(mdo sde): gser ltar kha dog yongs su dag pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo// dri dang phreng ba byin pas tshul khrims dang thos pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dri dang byug pa phun sum
116b3(mdo sde): tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo// dri rab tu zhim pa'i dri dang phye ma dang byug pa byin pas/ lus kyi nan tan gyi dri zhim po phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo// ro byin pas ro bro bi nang
116b4(mdo sde): na mchog gi ro bro ba'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo// gnas byin pas sems can thams cad kyi gnas dang / rten dang / gling dang / skyabs dang
116b5(mdo sde): dpung gnyen phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo// nad pa la sman byin pas mi dga' mi 'chi ba med pa'i bde ba yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo// yo byad
116b6(mdo sde): sna tshogs byin pas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi yo byad yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob ste/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' byang chub 'dod pas/ de ltar
116b7(mdo sde): sbyin pa byin pa'i legs pa bcu po de dag yongs su bzung ba yin no// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' legs pa gzhan bcu rab tu 'thob bo/ bcu gang zhen
116b8(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ mar me byin pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mig lnga yongs su dag pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo// sil snyan byin pas lnga'i rna ba yongs su dag pa
117a1(mdo sde): sde sna @#phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo// gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUr+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byiru
117a2(mdo sde): dang / rin po che thams cad byin pas skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo// rin po che tha dad pa sna tshogs
117a3(mdo sde): dang / me tog sna tshogs byin pas/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongs su rdzogs pa rab tu 'thob bo// rta dang glang po che dang shing rta byin pas/ rgyas pa dang yangs pa dang /
