370b6(mdo sde): spong bar byed pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa la 'dun pa dran pa bskyed par byed pa dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad la gces pa mi 'dor ba ste/ shA ri'i bu chos
370b7(mdo sde): bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa bsgrub pa yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bde bar gshegs pas
370b8(mdo sde): de skad gsungs nas/ ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad bka' stsal to// de dag sangs rgyas kyis bsngags pa'i// tshul khrims ma nyams ma ral bsrung // tshul
371a1(mdo sde): khrims phung po dag pa la// dga' ba nye bar skye bar 'gyur// chos rnams mang po tshol byed cing // thos pa mngal legs gnas/
371a2(mdo sde): naHrta gang gis the tsom gcod byed pa// de'i shes rab 'phel bar 'gyur// skye dang 'chi ba'i rgyun dag las// 'di dag ci ltar dgrol bya zhes// ltos med phan pa'i
371a3(mdo sde): sems dag gis// dam pa'i chos kyang ston par byed// gnod sems don du mi gnyer bas// byams pa'i sems kyang bsgom par byed// mi 'jigs pa dang
371a4(mdo sde): phan pa'i sems// bdag dang sems can mnyam pa nyid// byang chub la brtan zil gnon pa'i// brtson pa dag kyang legs par brtson// gang dag byang chub la
371a5(mdo sde): brten pa'i// dge ba'i chos rnams tshol ba dang // bsgom par bya ba rnam par spong // ji ltar spang bya spangs pa yis// myur du mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur// dgon pa'i
371a6(mdo sde): gnas la mngon phyogs shing // gnod pa dag la rgyab kyis phyogs// thos pa tshol la brtson pa dag/ go 'phang mchog ni rtogs par 'gyur// dge slong dge slong ma
371a7(mdo sde): rnams dang // dge bsnyen de bzhin dge bsnyen ma// thams cad dang ni de dag gis// 'dris pa rnam par spang bar bya// byis pa'i chos lam la rten pa// rmongs pa kun
371a8(mdo sde): kyang skyabs med de// gang zhig chos la rten pa dang // de dag sangs rgyas mchog tu gzhon// mi gang sems can don dag pa'i// sangs rgyas pa dang ma yin no//
371b1(mdo sde): g.yo med chos la 'dod pa dag/ byang chub la ni rab tu dang // sangs rgyas dag tu mi lta ba'i// mi rnams mtshan nyid gsum gsungs te// g.yo dang chos min/
371b2(mdo sde): 'dod pa dang // snyom las dag rtag dga' ba'o// 'dod chags zhe sdang nga rgyal dang // de bzhin sdig pa rab spangs nas// blo ldan brtson 'grus ldan gyur pa/
371b3(mdo sde): byang chub la ni rab gus 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / lnga dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas
371b4(mdo sde): pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// byang chub sems dpa'i so sor thar pa chos bzhi bsgrub pa zhes bya ba theg pa
371b5(mdo sde): chen po'i mdo rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+hi bang ka ra dang / shri dz+nyA na dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba dge slong shAkya blo gros dang /
371b6(mdo sde): dge slong dge ba'i blo gros kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// / rgya gar skad du/
371b7(mdo sde): Ar+ya ba lo ki te shwa ra pa ri prits+tsha/ sap+ta d+harma ka na na ma ma hA ya na sU tI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gis zhus pa chos bdun pa zhes
371b8(mdo sde): bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das
372a1(mdo sde): rgyal po'i khab bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'
372a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug
372a3(mdo sde): stan las langs nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga pad+ma'i lte ba la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der thal mo sbyar
372a4(mdo sde): bas btud te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub tu sems bskyed ma thag pa'i byang chub sems dpas chos du zhig la
372a5(mdo sde): bslab par bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la
372a6(mdo sde): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu byang chub tu sems bskyed ma thag pa'i byang chub sems dpas chos bdun la bslab par bya ste/ bdun gang zhe na 'di lta ste/
372a7(mdo sde): rnam par rtog pas kyang 'dod pa bsten par mi bya na/ dbang po gnyis kyis sbyor ba lta smos kyang ci dgos pa dang / tha na rmi lam gyi nang du yang mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen
372a8(mdo sde): bsten par mi bya ba dang / bya dang 'dra ba'i sems kyis yongs su 'dzin pa med par bya ba dang / thabs dang shes rab la mkhas pas nga rgyal dang ngar 'dzin pa med par bya ba
372b1(mdo sde): dang / dngos po dang dngos po med par spangs nas/ stong pa nyid kyi rnam par thar pa brtan po dang ldan par bya ba dang / yang dag par bden pa ma yin pa'i kun tu rtog pa zhe
372b2(mdo sde): byas sgyu ma dang / rmi lam dang 'dra ba'i 'khor ba la mngon par dga' bar bya ba ma yin pa dang / rgyu ba dang 'bras bu la bskur pa gdab par mi bya ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub tu
372b3(mdo sde): sems bskyed ma thag pa'i byang chub sems dpas chos bdun po de dag la bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems
372b4(mdo sde): dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la
372b5(mdo sde): mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis zhus pa chos bdun pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs s+ho// /
372b6(mdo sde): rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+hi paM ka ra shri dz+nyA na dang / lo tsa ba dge slong dge ba'i blo gros kyis bsgyur ba'o//
372b7(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du/ sa sti ga thA/ bod skad du/ bde legs kyi tshigs su bcad pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// lba zhig nye bar song nas su/
372b8(mdo sde): lhas mchod pa la rab zhus te// sangs rgyas chen po thub pa che// ci zhig smras na bde legs 'gyur// des ni tshig de gsan gyur nas// 'jig rten rtsa lag bkar
373a1(mdo sde): stsal pa// gang gis rtag tu brjod byed la// nga'i bde legs 'gyur de nyon// 'jig rten 'di dang gzhan yang mtho ris na// rin chen
373a2(mdo sde): rgya chen mchog ni gang yod pa// de ni rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen la// cis kyang grangs bgrang dang char mi phod// ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de// rdzogs
373a3(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'jig rten mchog/ ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na// bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog/ zhi 'gog bdud rtsi shin tu gya nom gang //
373a4(mdo sde): shAkya thub pas mnyam bzhag thugs chud pa// chos de dang ni mtshungs pa yod min te// de mngon byas na phyin chad mya ngan med// ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de// dam pa'i
373a5(mdo sde): chos kyi rin chen 'jig rten mchog/ ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na// bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog/ rgyal bas gang dag gang zag brgyad gsungs pa/
373a6(mdo sde): de dag rnams ni skyes bu zung bzhi ste// sbyin gnas de dag sa steng shin tu dkon// de dag rnams la byin na dpag med 'gyur// ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de// dge
373a7(mdo sde): 'dun rin chen gang zhig 'jig rten mchog/ ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na// bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog/ dam pa mchog sbyin gtso bo gya nom pa// 'od
373a8(mdo sde): mchog dpa' bo dam pa mchog gi gnas// shes rab dam pa'i chos kyi dam pa mchog/ mchog min mchog ma 'di na bcom ldan gcig/ ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de/
373b1(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten rin chen mchog/ ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na// bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog/ ting 'dzin dam pa bar chad med
373b2(mdo sde): pa gang // mtha' yis blo ldan de bzhin gshegs gsungs pa// ting 'dzin brtan pa rdo rje dper byas pa// ting 'dzin de dang mtshungs pa'i ting 'dzin med// ngo mtshar shin
373b3(mdo sde): tu rmad byung dpag med de// ting 'dzin gyi ni rin chen 'jig rten mchog/ ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na// bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog/ ji ltar sgo
373b4(mdo sde): gtan dam zhing rab dam te// stobs chen rlung 'di dag gis mi bskyod pa// de ltar mkhas pa bzhi dag mi bskyod pa// de ltar mkhas pa bzhi mthong bden gnas pa'ang // 'jig
373b5(mdo sde): rten smra ba rnams kyis 'dir mi g.yos// ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de// dge 'dun rin chen gang zhig 'jig rten mchog/ ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog
373b6(mdo sde): na// bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog/ thams cad zil gnon kun mkhyen thams cad gzigs// thams can mkhyen pa'i stobs rnams kun dang ldan/
373b7(mdo sde): kun gyi dam pa 'jigs pa kun dang bral// bsam pa kun mkhyen 'di ni bcom ldan gcig/ ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen
373b8(mdo sde): 'jig rten mchog/ ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na// bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog/ srid pa 'gog cing mi g.yo 'gyur ba med// skyon med 'jig
374a1(mdo sde): pa kun las rnam par grol// shin tu dga' zhing gya nom nyes par byung // shin tu dri med zhi ba glo mi 'phrogs// ngo mtshar shin tu rmad//
374a2(mdo sde): byung dpag med de// dam pa'i chos kyi rin chen 'jig rten mchog/ ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na// bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog/ shin tu sdug
374a3(mdo sde): bsngal ston cing bde sbyin pa'i// bden rnams mthong ste gang dag bag yod cing // bden pa rin chen rnams la dogs bral ba// de dag skye ba brgyad pa phyis mi len// ngo mtshar
374a4(mdo sde): shin tu rmad byung dpag med de// dge 'dun rin chen gang zhig 'jig rten mchog/ ji ltar de'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na// bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog
374a5(mdo sde): dam pa rnams kyi dam pa don dam mkhyen// mchog dang mchog min mkhyen cing don dam brtson// gzhan gyis mi 'phrogs dam pa thugs chung rtogs// shin tu sdug bsngal
374a6(mdo sde): rnams kyi dpung gnyen mchog/ ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'jig rten mchog/ ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na//
374a7(mdo sde): bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog/ 'dun pa skyes nas rnal 'byor ldan gyur cig/ 'go'u tam stan la rtag brtson rab grol zhing // gzhan gyis mi dkri ba dag zhi bder/
374a8(mdo sde): reg/ 'od la der reg grangs su phyir mi 'gyur// ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de// dge 'dun rin chen gang zhig 'jig rten mchog/ ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden
374b1(mdo sde): mchog na// bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog/ bden pa mthong ba brjod pas brgya lam na// gal te sdig pa 'ga' zhig byas gyur kyang // de ni de yi 'chab pa'i 'os/
374b2(mdo sde): min te// chos nyid 'di ni mi g.yo gnas phyir ro// ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de// dge 'dun rin chen gang zhig 'jig rten mchog/ ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin
374b3(mdo sde): bden mchog na// bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad na// sangs rgyas dang ni lhag pa 'am mtshungs pa med// lha dang
374b4(mdo sde): mi'i ston pa bla na med// ston pa ded dpon rmad pa rnams kyi mchog/ ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'jig rten mchog/ ji ltar
374b5(mdo sde): nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na// bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog/ sos ka'i zla ba dang por thub pa yis// nags khrod chos kyi dam par gang brnyes pa/
374b6(mdo sde): chos de dang ni mtshungs pa 'am lhag pa med// 'di la der reg grangs su phyir mi 'gyur// ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de// dam pa'i chos kyi rin chen 'jig rten
374b7(mdo sde): mchog/ ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na// bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog/ sdig pa rnyeng zad gsar du byas med la// rims nad med cing
374b8(mdo sde): 'jigs med mya ngan bral// sred pa 'gags pas rtsa ba mi skyeb// brtan pa mar me bzhin du zhi bar 'gyur// ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de// dge 'dun
375a1(mdo sde): rin chen gang zhig 'jig rten mchog/ ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na// bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog
375a2(mdo sde): bde legs kyi tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzin mi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur zhing
375a3(mdo sde): zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// / @#// rgya gar skad du/ swa sti ya na gA tha/ bod skad du/ bde legs su
375a4(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'i tshigs su bcad pa// thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten 'dren pa'i drung du ni// lha zhig nye bar song nas su// gang gis kun tu bde
375a5(mdo sde): legs pa// bdag gis zhus yis bcom ldan gsungs// dam pas de dag gsan pa dang // 'jig rten 'dren pas lung bstan pa// gang gis kun tu bde leg su//
375a6(mdo sde): 'gyur bar lnga khyod legs par nyon// gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa la// dad pa mi g.yo legs rab brtan// gang zhig dge ba'i tshul khrims can// de dag kun la
375a7(mdo sde): bde legs 'gyur// gang zhig pha dang ma dag dang // bu dang bu mo bran dag la// rtag tu legs par bsnyen bkur ba// de dag kun tu bde legs 'gyur// gang zhig
375a8(mdo sde): dgra bcom grags pa la// legs par rab gnas yon phul dang // lha'i bka' bzhin byed pa dag/ de dag kun tu bde legs 'gyur// gang zhig lus dang ngag dang ni//
375b1(mdo sde): yid la nyes byas med pa dang // gang zhig gnas gsum rnam bsdams pa// de dag kun tu bde legs 'gyur// gang zhig 'byung po thams cad la// tshad med kun tu/
375b2(mdo sde): mi 'khrugs pa'i// byams sems legs par bsgom byed pa// de dag kun tu bde legs 'gyur// gang zhig sdug bsngal kun spangs phyir// 'phags pa'i lam gyi
375b3(mdo sde): yan lag brgyad// bde ba 'dren pa legs bsgoms pa// de dag kun tu bde legs 'gyur// gang gis 'dus byas thams cad kyi// stong nyid rtag tu legs mthong zhing //
375b4(mdo sde): de la sems ni gnas 'gyur ba// de dag kun tu bde legs 'gyur// gang gis lus kyis dri med chos// mngon sum byas nas rgyu ba dang // dgra bcom rnam grol sems
375b5(mdo sde): ldan pa// de dag kun tu bde bar 'gyur// gang gis 'dod chags zhe sdang dang // gti mug rnams las chags bral zhing // ye shes 'khrug med skyes gyur pa// de dag
375b6(mdo sde): kun tu bde legs 'gyur// gang zhig lhar bcas 'jig rten gyi// mgon po yang srid spangs pa yi// sangs rgyas khong du chud gyur pa// de dag kun tu bde legs 'gyur/
375b7(mdo sde): bde legs su 'gyur ba'i tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs s+ho// / dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// lha yi bkra shis don
375b8(mdo sde): sgrub phyir// phyogs rnams bkra shis byed pa des// khyed kyi don rnams grub gyur cig/ thams cad myur du 'thun par shog/ phreng ba mgo la 'dug pa ltar// lag pa
376a1(mdo sde): g.yas na yang dpal yod shog/ g.yon na dpal ni gnas gyur cig/ yan lag kun la'ang dpal yod shog/ tshong pa dag ni nor tshol/
376a2(mdo sde): zhing // phyogs bcu dag tu 'gro ba rnams// rnyed pa chen po rnyed gyur cig/ de dag bde ba bskyed par shog/ dgos pa la la gang gi phyir// shar phyogs su ni 'gro ba na//
376a3(mdo sde): gang dag phyogs der gnas pa yi// rgyu skar byed la skyong gyur cig/ smin drug dang ni snar ma dang // mgo dang lag dang nam so dang // rgyal dang skrag ces bya ba ste// de dag rnam
376a4(mdo sde): ni shar phyogs pa// rgyu skar bdun po de dag ni// 'jig rten skyong ba grags ldan pa// shar phyogs log na yod ces brtan// de dag khyed la kun tu srungs// de dag bdag po/
376a5(mdo sde): rgyal po ni// yul 'khor srung zhes grags pa ste// de ni dri za kun gyi bdag/ nyi ma lhan cig srung bar shog/ de la bu ni mang yod pa// mkhas shing ming yang mthun pa ste//
376a6(mdo sde): bgu bcu rtsa gcig zad par yang // dbang po zhes bya stobs po che// de rnams khyed la nad med cing // shis par lhag par skyong gyur cig/ shar phyogs log kyi phyogs
376a7(mdo sde): chan// lha mo gzhon nu brgyad yod de// rgyal dang rnam par rgyal ma dang // don grub ma dang mi 'pham dang // dga' mchog ma dang dga' sde dang // dga' can ma dang dag
376a8(mdo sde): 'phel ma// de dag khyed la nad med cing // shis par lhag par skyong bar shog/ shar phyogs logs kyi phyogs chan// gzhi 'dzin ces bya'i mchod rten yod// rgyal
376b1(mdo sde): ba skyob pa dgra bcom pa// de rnams kyis ni bzhugs shing mkhyen// de yang khyed la nad med cing // shis par lhag par skyong gyur cig/ phyogs na khyed cag bde bar/
376b2(mdo sde): shog/ khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig/ lha rnams kun gyi rab bsrungs nas// nor rnams rnyed de ldog par shog/ dgos pa la la gang gi phyir// lho phyogs su ni
376b3(mdo sde): 'gro ba na// gang dag phyogs der gnas pa yi// rgyu skar khyed la skyong gyur cig/ mchu dang gre dang dbo dang ni// me bzhi nag pa lnga pa yin// sa ri dang ni sa ga ste// de dag
376b4(mdo sde): rnams ni lho phyogs pa// rgyu skar bdun po de dag ni// 'jig rten skyong ba grags ldan pa// lho phyogs logs na yod ces bstan// de dag khyed la kun tu bsrungs// de dag
376b5(mdo sde): bdag po rgyal po ni// 'phags skyes po zhes bya bar brjod// de ni grul bum kun gyi bdag/ gshin rje lhan cig bsrung bar shog/ de la bu ni mang yod pa// mkhas shing ming
376b6(mdo sde): yang mthun pa ste// dgu bcu rtsa gcig zad par yang // dbang po zhes bya stobs po che// de rnams khyed la nad med cing // shis prar ldar par skyong gyur cig/ lho phyogs
376b7(mdo sde): logs kyi phyogs chan// lha mo gzhon nu brgyad yod de// dpal ldan ma dang grags ldan ma// grags pa thob dang grags 'dzin dang // legs par langs dang rab snga
376b8(mdo sde): dang // legs par sad dang bde bsgrub ma// de dag khyed la nad med cing // shis par lhag par skyong bar shog/ lho phyogs logs kyi phyogs can// pad+ma zhes bya'i
377a1(mdo sde): mchod rten yod// rtag tu gzi brjid kyis kyang 'bar// rtag tu thams cad gsal byed pa// de yang khyed la nad med cing //
377a2(mdo sde): shis par lhag par skyong gyur cig/ phyogs na khyed cag bde bar shog/ khyed chag sdig par ma gyur cig/ lha rnams kun gyi rab bsrungs nas// nor rnams rnyed de ldog
377a3(mdo sde): par shog/ dgos pa la la gang gi phyir// nub phyogs su ni 'gro ba na// gang dag phyogs der gnas pa yi// rgyu skar khyed la skyong gyur cig/ lha 'tshams dang ni snron dang yang //
377a4(mdo sde): brtson 'grus rten ldan sgrub dang ni// chu stod chu smad ji zhun dang // gro bzhin de ni bdun pa yin// rgyu skar bdun po de dag ni// 'jig rten skyong ba grags ldan pa// nub phyogs
377a5(mdo sde): logs na yod ces bstan// de dag khyed la kun tu bsrungs// de dag bdag po rgyal po ni// mig mi bzang zhes bya bar shes// de ni klu rnams kun gyi bdag/ chu lha ldan
377a6(mdo sde): cig bsrung bar shog/ de la bu ni mang yod pa// mkhas shing ming yang mthun pa ste// dgu bcu rtsa gcig zad par yang // dbang po zhes bya stobs po che// de dag khyed la/
377a7(mdo sde): nad med cing // shis par lhag par skyong gyur cig/ nub phyogs logs kyi phyogs chan// lha mo gzhon nu brgyad yod de// rna cha sgra 'dres ma dang ni// pad ma dkar dang
377a8(mdo sde): skya reng dang // cha med gcig dang dgu pa dang // rol dang gnag dang stabs myur sring // de dag khyed la nad med cing // shis pa lhag par skyong bar shog/ nub phyogs
377b1(mdo sde): logs kyi phyogs can// nub ces bya ba'i ri bo yod// sem zla ba rnams kyang gnas/ nub pa'ang byed la nor sbyin gyur// de yang byed la nad med cing // shis par lhag/
377b2(mdo sde): par skyong gyur cig/ phyogs na khyed cag bde bar shog/ khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig/ lha rnams kun gyis rab bsrungs nas// nor rnams rnyed de ldog
377b3(mdo sde): par shog/ dgos pa la la gang gi phyir// byang phyogs su ni 'gro ba na// gang dag phyogs der gnas pa yi// rgyu skar khyed la skyong gyur cig/ mon gru dang
377b4(mdo sde): ni mon gre dang // khrums stod dang ni khrums smad dang // nam dang yang tha skar dang // bra nye de ni bdun pa yin// rgyu skar bdun po de dag ni// 'jig rten skyong ba
377b5(mdo sde): grags ldan pa// byang phyogs logs na yod ces bstan// de dag khyed la kun tu bsrungs// de dag bdag po rgyal po ni// mi la zhon pa lus ngan po// gnod
377b6(mdo sde): sbyin kun gyi bdag po ste// nor bzangs lhan cig bsrung bar shog/ de la bu ni mang yod pa// mkhas shing ming yang mthun pa ste// dgu bcu rtsa gcig zad par lnga/
377b7(mdo sde): dbang po zhes bya stobs po che// de dag khyed la nad med cing // shis par lhag par skyong gyur cig/ byang phyogs logs kyi phyogs chan// lha mo gzhon nu brgyad
377b8(mdo sde): yod de// rab chags lha mo stong lha mo// sa dang de bzhin pad+ma can// rgyal po che la nye gnas dang // re dang khrel yod dpal ldan ma// de dag khyed la nad med cing //
378a1(mdo sde): shis par lhag par skyong bar shog/ byang phyogs logs kyi phyogs can// spos ngad ldan pa'i ri bo yod// gnod sbyin 'byung
378a2(mdo sde): bo rnams kyi gnas// rtse mo sna tshogs blta na sdug/ de yang khyed la nad med cing // shis par lhag par skyong gyur cig/ phyogs na khyed cag bde bar shog
378a3(mdo sde): khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig/ lha rnams kun gyis rab bsrungs nas// nor rnams rnyed de ldog par shog/ rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad po// phyogs bzhi dag
378a4(mdo sde): na bdun bdun gnas// lha'i bu mo sum cu gnyis// phyogs bzhi dag na brgyad brgyad gnas// dge sbyong brgyad dang bram ze brgyad// yul rnams na ni grong rdal
378a5(mdo sde): brgyad// dbang por bcas pa'i lha brgyad rnams// de dag khyed la kun tu bsrungs// khyed cag 'gro ba na'ang bkra shis gyur// ldog pa na yang bkri shog/ gnyen
378a6(mdo sde): la lta ba bkra shis gyur// gnyen gyis lta ba'ang bkra shis shog/ dbang bcas nor sbyin rgyal chen dang // dgra bcom pa dag snying brtse bas// thams cad du ni bkra
378a7(mdo sde): shis dang // bdud rtsi shis pa thob par shog/ tshangs pa dang ni de bzhin nor rgyas dang // zag pa med pa rnam par grol rnams dang // klu dang gnod sbyin rtag tu
378a8(mdo sde): snying rjes bsrungs// ston brgyar mtshungs par tshe ni skyong bar shog/ rnams 'dren zla med 'jig rten mgon po yis// de dag 'thun par sbyin pa'i bsngags pa
378b1(mdo sde): gsungs// khyed rnams kyi ni dge ba'i las 'di yis// sbrang rtsi 'byung zhes bya ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur// 'jig rten rnam par 'dren pa rgyal ba yis// lung bstan
378b2(mdo sde): chags med 'di ni ngang ba yin// phyin chad byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas mang // gang dag lung bstan de dag phyir mi ldog/ rgyal bas lung bstan pa ni 'di
378b3(mdo sde): thos nas// sems ni 'gu zhing mchog tu dga' gyur te// de dag spun dang grogs dang lhan cig tu// de dag sangs rgyas chos la skyabs su dong // shis par
378b4(mdo sde): brjod pa'i le'u zhes bya ba rdzogs s+ho// @#/ rgya gar skad du/ nir pi ka la pa ste/ bod skad du/
378b5(mdo sde): rnam par mi rtog pa'i bstod pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma la phyag 'tshal lo// dpag med shes rab pha rol phyin// rnam par
378b6(mdo sde): mi rtog phyag 'tshal lo// gang sku ston rnams kun med pa// skyon bral rnams kyis nges par mthong // nam mkha' bzhin du gos pa med// spros pa med
378b7(mdo sde): pa mi 'gyur ba'i// ngo bor gang gis mthong gyur pa// de yis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong // 'phags ma yon tan rdzogs khyod dang // 'gro ba'i bla ma
378b8(mdo sde): sangs rgyas la// zla ba dang ni 'od zer bzhin// dam pa rnams kyi dbye ma mthong // sangs rgyas chos kyi sngon 'gro ba/ brtse ba'i bdag nyid khyod brten nas/
379a1(mdo sde): snying rjes phan ston mnyam med pa// bde bas che ba'i bdag nyid 'gyur// bsam pa dag pas lan cig kyang // gang gis cho ga
379a2(mdo sde): bzhin khyod mthong // des kyang nges par 'grub pa ni// 'thob 'gyur mthong ba don yod kyi// gzhan don mthon dga'i bdag nyid can// dpa' bo dag ni thams
379a3(mdo sde): cad kyang // gso dang bskyed par byed pa'i ma// brtse ba'i bdag nyid khyod lags te// 'jig rten bla ma sangs rgyas gang // thugs rje can de khyod kyi sras//
379a4(mdo sde): de phyir kye ma khyod nyid ni// sems can kun gyi phyi mo lags// dri med pha rol phyin pa kun// smad pa med pa khyod nyid la// zla ba'i rjes su skar ma bzhin//
379a5(mdo sde): thams cad du ni rjes su 'brang // 'dul ba'i 'gro ba la brten nas// de bzhin gshegs pas de dang der// khyod nyid gcig pu dngos mang por// du ma'i ming
379a6(mdo sde): gis bstod par mdzad// nyi ma'i 'od ni rnyed gyur nas// khug rnas byas pa'i zil pa bzhin// rtsod pa can gyi rtsod pa'i skyon// khyod la rten nas zad par 'gyur//
379a7(mdo sde): zab mo bstan pas byis pa rnams// khyod nyid kyis ni 'jigs pa bskyob// zhi ba bstan pas mkhas rnams la// rtso dbugs 'byin par mdzad pa yin// gang la
379a8(mdo sde): khyod la'ang chags med pa// khyod mgon gyur pa de dag la// de'i yum ji ltar gzhan dag la// 'dod chags zhe sdang 'byung bar 'gyur// gang nas kyang ni ma
379b1(mdo sde): 'ongs shing // gang du yang ni 'gro med la// thams cad kyi ni gnas dag tu// mkhas pa rnams kyis mthong mi 'gyur// gang gis khyod nyid yang dag tu// mthong /
379b2(mdo sde): ba med kyang grub par byed// bsgrubs pas rnam par grol 'gyur ba// de lta bu yi ngo mtshar che// khyed mthong bas kyang bcings par 'gyur// ma mthong na yang bcings
379b3(mdo sde): par 'gyur// khyod mthong na yang grol bar 'gyur// e ma ngo mtshar gyur pa'i rgyu// grogs ldan ma khyod zab mor gyur// sgyu ma bzhin du rtogs dkar gyur// mthong
379b4(mdo sde): bde mthong ma yin pa// sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas rnams dang // nyan thos rnams kyis ngos bsten pa// thar pa'i lam ni gcig nyid khyod// gzhan dag med
379b5(mdo sde): ces bya bar nges// tha snyad sngon du byas nas ni// lus can rnams la btags pa'i don// 'jig rten mgon pos thugs rje yis// brjod pa med kyang khyod
379b6(mdo sde): nyid brjod// mtshan ma med cing khyad med pa// ngag kun yul las shin tu 'das// gang la'ang rten pa med pa khyod// 'dir ni khyod bstod nus shin tu// de lta
379b7(mdo sde): yin na kun rdzob du// bdag gis 'di 'dra'i dgra lam gyis// khyod ni bstod par mi nus kyang // bstod par 'dod pas shin tu tshim// shes rab pha rol phyin
379b8(mdo sde): bstod pas// bdag gis dge ba gang brtsegs pa// des ni 'gro ba ma lus pa// shes rab pha rol phyin mchog gyur// / rnam par mi rtog pa'i
380a1(mdo sde): bstod pa 'phags pa kru grub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// rgya gar gyi mkhan po shin ti b+ha tra dang /
380a2(mdo sde): lo tsa ba tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// @#/ rgya gar skad du/ pa ra ma ar+tha sta pa/
380a3(mdo sde): bod skad du/ don dam par bstod pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// skye ba med cing gnas med la// 'jig rten dpe las shin tu
380a4(mdo sde): 'das// ngag gi brjod pa'i spyod yul min// mgon khyod ji ltar bskyod par bgyi// de lta na yang gang 'dra bas/ de bzhin nyid don spyod yul gyi// 'jig
380a5(mdo sde): rten btags la la gnas nas// gus pa chen pos bdag gis bstod// skye ba med pa'i ngo bo yis/ khyod la skye ba yong mi mnga'// mgon khyod gshegs
380a6(mdo sde): dang byon mi mnga'// dngos mi mnga' la phyag 'tshal 'dud// dngos med ma lags dngos ma lags// chad pa ma lags rtag ma lags// mi rtag ma
380a7(mdo sde): lags rtag ma lags// gnyis mi mnga' la phyag 'tshal 'dud// dmar dang ljang dang rtsod mdog min// ser dang gnag dang dkar ma lags// khyod
380a8(mdo sde): la kha dog yong mi dmigs// mdog mi mnga' la phyag 'tshal 'dud// chen po mi lags chung ma lags// ring dang zlum pa ma lags la// tshad med pa yi/
380b1(mdo sde): dngos bsnyes pa// tshad mi mnga' la phyag 'tshal 'dud// ring min nye ba ma lags shing // nam mkha' ma lags sa ma lags// 'khor min mya ngan 'das
380b2(mdo sde): ma lags// mi mnga' ba la phyag 'tshal 'dud// chos rnams kun la mi gnas pas// chos kyi dbyings kyi dngos gyur cing // mchog tu zab pa nyid bsnyes
380b3(mdo sde): pa/ zab mo khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// de lta'i bstod pas bstod bgyi ba 'am// yang ni 'dir ni ci zhig bstod// chos rnams thams cad stong pa la// gang
380b4(mdo sde): la bstod cing bdag gis bstod// skye dang 'jig pa rnams spangs shing // gang la mtha' dang dbus med la// gzung dang 'dzin pa mi mnga' ba// 'dir ni khyod
380b5(mdo sde): stong nus pa gang // gshegs dang byon pa mi mnga' zhing // 'gro ba lnga spangs bde bar shegs bstod pas// bsod nams des ni 'jig rten rnams// bde gshegs
380b6(mdo sde): gnasu 'gro bar shog/ ngag du// don dam par bstod pa/ slong dpon klu grub kyi mdzad pa rdzogs so//
380b7(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du/ ni rub ma sta pa/ dpe med par bstod pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// gang zhig lta bas 'phongs pa
380b8(mdo sde): yi// 'jig rten 'di la phan tsom khyod// dngos pa med pa'i dzin rig pas// dpe med khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// gang zhig khyod kyis chung zhig kyang /
381a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas spyan gyis ma gzigs pa// khyod kyis gzigs pa bla med de// nyid kyi don ni rig pa lags// don dam pa yi
381a2(mdo sde): yod pa nyid// rtogs dang rtogs bya mi mnga' zhing // e ma'o mchog tu rtogs dka' ba'i// chos nyid sangs rgyas rnams kyis rtogs// khyod kyis cung
381a3(mdo sde): zad ma bskyed cing // chos rnams bkag pa'ang ma lags// mnyam pa nyid kyi lta ba yis// bla na med pa'i go 'phang bsnyes// 'khor ba spangs par gyur pa yi//
381a4(mdo sde): mya ngan 'das khyod mi bzhed kyi// 'khor ba mi dmigs pa nyid kyi// zhi de mgon po khyod kyis rtogs// khyod kyis kun nas nyon mongs dang // rnam byang ro cig gyur
381a5(mdo sde): rig pas// chos dbyings mngon par dbyer med pa// kun tu rnam par dag par gyur// gtso bo khyod kyis 'ga' zhig tu// yi ge cig kyang ma gsungs la//
381a6(mdo sde): gdul bya'i 'gro ba ma lus la// chos kyi char kyis tshim pa'ang mdzad// mkha' dang mnyam pa'i thugs mnga' khyod// phung po khams dang skye mched la// chags
381a7(mdo sde): par gyur pa mi mnga' bas// chos rnams kun la rten ma lags// mgon khyod sems can 'du shes kyis// 'jig pa kun tu mi mnga' yang // sdug bsngal
381a8(mdo sde): gyur pa'i sems can la// snying rje'i bdag nyid gyur pa'ang khyod// bde dang sdug bsngal de bzhin du// rtag mi rtag stsogs pa rtso khyod// de lta'i rnam rtog
381b1(mdo sde): rna tshogs kyis// thugs ni chags par 'gyur ma lags// chos rnams gang du'ang 'gro 'ong med// de bzhin khyod kyi gshegs pa'ang lags// 'ga'/
381b2(mdo sde): ru spungs pa ma mchis pa// de phyir don dam rig pa'ang lags// kun gyi rjes su zhugs gyur kyang // 'ga' ru 'byung ba'ang ma lags la// skye dang chos
381b3(mdo sde): dang sku rnams kyang // thub chen khyod kyi bsam mi khyab// gcig dang gzhan pa rnam spangs pa'i// brag cha lta bu'i 'gro ba rnams// 'pho dang 'jigs pa rnam
381b4(mdo sde): spangs par// smad pa med par khyod kyis rtogs// rtag dang chad pa dang bral zhing // mtshan nyid mtshon cha rnam spangs par// gtso bos rmi lam sgyu skyogs
381b5(mdo sde): bzhin// 'khor ba nges par rtogs pa lags// bag chags bzhin 'gyur mthar thug pa'i// khyod kyi nyon mongs sdig pa spangs// nyon mongs nyid kyi
381b6(mdo sde): rang bzhin yang // khyod kyis bdud rtsi nyid du bsgrubs// dpa' bo khyod kyis gzugs rnams ni// mtshan ma med mthong gzugs med bzhin// mtshan
381b7(mdo sde): kyis 'bar ba'i sku nyid kyang // gzugs su sgyid yul nyid du mthong // gzugs su mthong bas mthong min yang // mthong ngo zhes ni brjod par byed// chos
381b8(mdo sde): mthong bas ni shin tu mthong // chos nyid mthong ba ma yin no// khong stong khyod kyi sku la med// sha dang rus pa khrag med kyang // nam mkha'i dbang po'i gzhu
382a1(mdo sde): bzhin du// khyod kyi sku ni ston par mdzad// sku la snyun med mi gtsang med// bkres dang skom pa 'byung med kyang // khyod ni 'jig
382a2(mdo sde): rten rjes bzung phyir// 'jig rten spyod pa ston par mdzad// las kyi sgrib pa'i skyon rnams ni// sdig med khyod kyis kun spangs kyang // khyod kyis sems can rjes
382a3(mdo sde): bzung phyir// las spangs pa yang rab tu bstan// chos kyi dbyings la dbyer med phyir// gtso bo theg dbye ma mchis kyang // khyod kyis theg pa gsum brtan pa// sems can
382a4(mdo sde): gzhug pa'i ched du lags// rtag cing brtan la zhi ba yi// chos kyi rang bzhin khyod kyi sku// rgyal bas gdul bya'i 'gro ba'i phyir// khyod nyid mya ngan 'das par bstan// grangs
382a5(mdo sde): med 'jig rten khams rnams su// 'das dang lham dang mngon byang chub// 'khor lo'ang thar par mos rnams kyis// khyod la gus rnams kyi yang mthong // mgon po
382a6(mdo sde): sems g.yo mi mnga' zhing // rnam rtog g.yo ba mi mnga' yang // khyod nyid ngang gis 'jig rten la// sangs rgyas mdzad pa'ang 'jug par gyur// de ltar bde
382a7(mdo sde): gshegs yon tan tshad med bsam mi khyab// me tog gis brgyan pa las bdag gis bsod nams gang thob par// gyur pa 'dis ni sems can ma lus pa// 'di
382a8(mdo sde): dag mchog tu rtogs dka' thub pa'i chos kyi snod gyur cig// dpe med par bstod pa/ slob dpon klu grub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho//
382b1(mdo sde): / rgya gar skad du/ lo ka a ti ta sta pa/ bod skad du// 'jig rten las 'das par bstod pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshalo//
382b2(mdo sde): dben pa'i ye shes rig gyur pa// 'jig rten 'das khyod phyag 'tshal 'dud// gang khyod 'gro la phan pa'i phyir// yun ring thugs rjes dal bar gyur// phung po tsam lnga
382b3(mdo sde): grol ba yi// sems can med par khyod bzhed la// sems can don la'ang mchog gzhol bar// thub pa chen po khyod nyid zhugs/ blo ldan khyod kyis phung po de'ang //
382b4(mdo sde): sgyu ma smig rgyu dri za yi// grong khyer rmi lam ji bzhin du// blo ldan rnams la rab tu bstan// gang dag rgyu las byung ba rnams// de med par ni yod min pas// gzugs
382b5(mdo sde): brnyan nyid dang mtshungs pa ru// gsal bar ci'i phyir de mi 'dod// 'byung ba mig gi gzung min pas// de dngos mig gi ji ltar yin// gzugs nyid gzung bar
382b6(mdo sde): rab bkag pa// gzugs nyid khyod kyis de ltar gsungs// tshor bya med par de med pas// tshor ba nyid ni bdag med pa// tshor ba de'ang rang bzhin gyis// yod
382b7(mdo sde): pa min par khyod nyid bzhed// ming dang don dag tha dad min// me yis kha nyid tshig par 'gyur// gzhan na'ang rtogs pa med 'gyur zhes// bden pa gsung ba khyod
382b8(mdo sde): kyis bstan// byed po rang dbang las nyid kyang // tha snyad du ni khyod kyis bstan// phan tshun ltos pa can nyid du// bsgrub par khyod ni bzhad pa lags// byed
383a1(mdo sde): po yod min spyod po'ang med// bsod nams de min rten 'brel skyes// brten nas skyes gang ma skyes zhes// tshig gi bdag po/
383a2(mdo sde): khyod kyis gsungs// shes pa med par shes bya min// de med rnam pa shes pa'ang med// de phyir shes dang shes bya dag/ rang dngos med ces khyod kyis gsug//
383a3(mdo sde): mtshan nyid mtshon bya gzhan nyid ni// mtshon bya mtshan nyid med par 'gyur// tha dad min mi'ang de med par// khyod kyis gsal po nyid du bstan// mtshan nyid
383a4(mdo sde): mtshon bya rnams bral zhing // tshig gi brjod pa rnam spangs par// khyod kyi ye shes spyan nyid kyis// 'gro ba 'di dag zhi bar mthong // dngos po yod pa nyid
383a5(mdo sde): mi skye// med pa'ang ma yin yod med min// bdag las ma yin gzhan las min// gnyis med skye ba ji lta bu// yod pa gnas par rigs 'gyur gyi//
383a6(mdo sde): 'jigs par 'gyur ba ma yin no// med pa mi gnas par rig pas// 'jig par 'gyur ba ma yin no// re shig zhig pa'i rgyu las kyang // 'bras bu 'byung bar
383a7(mdo sde): mi rigs la// ma zhig mas min rmi lam dang // 'dra ba'i skye ba khyod nyid bzhed// zhig dang ma zhig pa dag gi/ rgyu las 'bras bu 'byung ba dag/ sgyu ma
383a8(mdo sde): 'byung ba bzhin du 'byung // kun kyang de bzhin khyod kyis gsungs// de bzhin khyod kyis 'gro 'di dag/ yongs su brtags pa las 'byung bar// kun tu shes
383b1(mdo sde): bya byung na'ang // skye ba med cing 'gag med gsungs// rtag la'ang 'khor ba yod ma yin// mi rtag pa la 'khor ba med// de nyid rig pa'i mchog khyod
383b2(mdo sde): kyis// 'khor ba rmi lam 'dra bar gsungs// sdug bsngal rang gis byas pa dang // gzhan gyis byas gnyi gas byas// rgyu med par ni rtog ge 'dod//
383b3(mdo sde): khyod kyis ston cing 'byung bar gsungs// rten cing 'brel bar gang byung ba// de nyid khyod ni stong par bzhed// dngos po rang dbang yod min zhes// mnyam
383b4(mdo sde): med khyod kyis seng ge'i sgra// kun rtog thams cad spang ba'i phyir// stong nyid bdud rtsi ston mdzad na// gang zhig de la zhan gyur pa// de nyid khyod kyis
383b5(mdo sde): shin tu smad// bems po gzhan dbang stong pa nyid// sgyu ma bzhin du rkyen byung bar// mgon po khyod kyis chos kun gyi// dngos med goms par
383b6(mdo sde): mdzad pa lags// khyod kyi cung zhig ma bskyed cing // 'ga' yang bkag pa ma mchis la// sngon gyi ji ltar phyis de bzhin// de bzhin nyid ni thugs su chud// 'phags
383b7(mdo sde): pa rnams kyis bsten pa yi// bsgom pa zhugs par mtshan med 'di// rnam par shes pas 'gar 'gyur ram// mtshan ma med la ma zhugs par// thar pa med ces
383b8(mdo sde): gsungs pa'i phyir// de phyir khyod kyis theg chen rnams// ma lus par ni de nyid bstan// bstod pa'i snod khyod bstod pa las// bdag gi bsod nams gang thob pa/
384a1(mdo sde): des ni 'gro ba ma lus rnams// mtshan ma'i 'ching las grol gyur cig/ 'jig rten las 'das par bstod pa// slob dpon/
384a2(mdo sde): klu grub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po kri sna ban bi da dang / lo tsa ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la
384a3(mdo sde): phab pa// rgya gar skad du/ d+harma d+ha du sta ga/ bod skad du// chos kyi dbyings su bstod pa/
384a4(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// gang zhig kun tu ma shes na// srid pa gsum du rnam 'khor la// sems can kun la nges gnas pa'i// chos
384a5(mdo sde): kyi dbyings la phyag 'tshal 'dud// gang zhig 'khor ba'i rgyur gyur pa// de nyid sbyang ba byas pa las// dag pa de nyid mya ngan 'das// chos kyi sku'ang de nyid do// ji
384a6(mdo sde): ltar 'o ma dang 'dres pas// mar gyi snying po mi snang ba// de bzhin nyon mongs dang 'dres pas// chos kyi dbyings kyang mi mthong ngo // ji ltar 'o ma rnam sbyangs pas/
384a7(mdo sde): mar gyi snying po dri med 'gyur// de bzhin nyon mongs rnam sbyangs pas// chos dbyings shin tu dri med 'gyur// ji ltar mar me bum nang gnas// cung zhig snang bar
384a8(mdo sde): mi 'gyur ba// de bzhin nyon mongs bum nang gnas// chos kyi dbyings kyang mi mthong ngo // phyogs ni gang dang gang dag nas// bum pa bug gtod gyur pa'i// deng /
384b1(mdo sde): de'i phyogs nyid nas/ 'od kyi rang bzhin 'byung bar gyur// gang tshe ting 'dzin rdo rje yis// bum pa de ni bcag gyur pa// de tshe de ni nam mkha' yi// mthar thug
384b2(mdo sde): bar du snang bar byed// chos kyi dbyings ni skye ma yin// nam yang 'gag par 'gyur ba med// dus rnams kun tu nyon mongs med// thog ma par mthar dri ma bral//
384b3(mdo sde): ji ltar rin chen bai DUr+ya// dus rnams kun tu 'od gsal yang // rdo'i nang na gnas gyur no// de'i 'od ni gsal ma yin// de bzhin nyon mongs kyis bsgribs pa'i//
384b4(mdo sde): chos dbyings shin du dri med pa'ang // 'khor bar 'od ni gsal ma yin// mya ngan 'das na 'od gsal 'gyur// khams yod pa ni las byas pas// sa le sbram
384b5(mdo sde): dag mthong bar 'gyur// khams med par ni las byas na'ang // nyon mongs 'ba' zhig skyed par byed// ji lta na spun mas g.yogs gyur pas// so ba 'bras bu
384b6(mdo sde): mi 'dod ltar// de bzhin nyon mongs kyis g.yogs pas// de ni sangs rgyas zhes mi brtag/ ji ltar sbran pa las grol na// 'bras nyid snang bar gyur pa ltar/
384b7(mdo sde): de bzhin nyon mongs las grol na// chos kyi sku nyid rab tu gsal// chu shing dngos po med do zhes// 'jig rten na ni dper byed kyang // de'i 'bras bu snying po nyid//
384b8(mdo sde): dngar po za bar byed pa ltar// snying po med pa'i 'khor ba las// nyon mongs gzeb dang bral gyur na// de'i 'bras bu sangs rgyas nyid // lus can kun gyi
385a1(mdo sde): bdud rtsir 'gyur// de bzhin sa bon thams cad las// rgyu dang 'dra ba'i 'bras bu 'byung // sa bon med par 'bras yod par//
385a2(mdo sde): shes ldan gang gis bsgrubs par nus// sa bon 'gyur khams de bzhin nyid// chos rnams kun gyi rten du 'dod// rims kyis spangs par gyur pa las// sangs
385a3(mdo sde): rgyas go 'phang 'thob par 'gyur// dri med nyi ma zla ba yang // sprin dang khug rna du ba dang // sgra gcan gdong dang rdul la stsogs// bsgrib pa lnga yis bsgribs par gyur
385a4(mdo sde): de bzhin 'od gsal ba yi sems// 'dod dang gnod sems le lo dang // rgod pa dang ni the tsom ste// bsgrib pa lnga yis bsgribs par 'gyur// ji ltar me yis dag
385a5(mdo sde): pa'i gos// sna tshogs dri mas dri ma can// ji ltar me yi nang bcug na// dri ma tshig gyur gos min ltar// de bzhin 'od gsal ba yi sems// 'dod chags las skyes
385a6(mdo sde): dri ma can// ye shes me yis dri ma sreg/ de nyid 'od gsal ma yin no// stong pa nyid ni ston pa'i mdo// rgyal bas ci snyed gsungs pa de// de dag kun gyis nyon mong
385a7(mdo sde): ldog/ khams de nyams par byed ma yin// sa yi dkyil na yod pa'i chu// dri ma med par gnas pa ltar// nyon mongs nang na ye shes kyang // de bzhin dri ma med
385a8(mdo sde): par gnas// chos dbyings gang phyir bdag ma yin// bud med ma yin skyes pa min// gzung ba kun las rnam grol ba// ji ltar bdag ces brtag par bya// chags
385b1(mdo sde): pa med pa'i chos sku la// bud med skyes pa dmigs ma yin// 'dod chags kyis mdongs 'dul bya'i phyir// bud med skyes pa zhes rab bstan// mi rtag sdug bsngal
385b2(mdo sde): stong pa zhes// bya ba gsum pos sems sbyong byed// mchog tu sems ni sbyong byed pa'i// chos ni rang bzhin med pa yin// ji ltar sbrum ma'i lto na bu// yod kyang mthong
385b3(mdo sde): ba ma yin pa// de bzhin nyon mongs kyis g.yogs pa'i// chos kyi dbyings kyang mthong ma yin// bdag dang bdag gi rnam rtog dang / ming gi 'du shes rgyu mtshan
385b4(mdo sde): gyis// rnam rtog bzhi po 'byung ba yang // 'byung dang 'byung las gyur las so// sangs rgyas rnams kyi smon las yang // snang ba med cing mtshan nyid med//
385b5(mdo sde): so so rang rig spong ltar nyid// sangs rgyas rtag pa'i chos nyid can// ji ltar ri bong 'go yi rA// brtags pa nyid de med pa ltar// de bzhin chos rnams
385b6(mdo sde): thams cad kyang // brtags pa nyid de yod ma yin// phra rab rdul gyi ngo bo yis// glang gi rwarA yang dmigs ma yin// ji ltar sngon bzhin phyis de bzhin// de la
385b7(mdo sde): ci zhig rtag par bya// brten nas 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang // brten nas 'gag par gyur pas na// gcig kyang yod pa ma yin na// byis pa ji ltar rtog par byed//
385b8(mdo sde): ri bong ba lang rwa mi dpes// ji ltar bde gshegs chos rnams nyid// dbu ma nyid du sgrub par byed// ji ltar nizla skar ma'i gzugs// dang ba'i snod kyi chu nang du/
386a1(mdo sde): gzugs brnyan mthong bar gyur pa ltar// mtshan nyid rdzogs pa'ang de dang 'dra// thog ma bar dang mthar dge ba// slub med
386a2(mdo sde): cing brtan pa yi// gang zhig de ltar bdag med la// ji ltar bdag dang bdag rig brtan// ji ltar sos ga'i dus su chu// dro'o zhes ni brjod par byed// de nyid
386a3(mdo sde): drang ba'i dus su ni// grang ngo zhes ni brjod pa yin// nyon mongs dra bas g.yogs pa na// sems zhes brjod par bya ba yin// de nyid nyon mongs bral gyur na/
386a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas zhes ni brjod par bya// mig dang gzugs la brten nas ni// dri ma med pa'i snang ba 'byung // skye med 'gag pa med nyid las// chos kyi dbyings
386a5(mdo sde): ni rang du shes// sgra dang rna ba la brten nas// rnam par dag pa'i shes pa gsum// mtshan nyid med pa'i chos kyi dbyings// rtog dang bcas pas thos par
386a6(mdo sde): 'gyur// sna dang dri la brten nas snom// de ni gzugs su med pa'i dpes// de bzhin sna'i rnam shes kyis// chos kyi dbyings la rtog par byed// lce'i rang
386a7(mdo sde): bzhin stong pa nyid// ro'i khams kyang bden pa ste// chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo yis// rnam par shes pa gnas med pa// dag pa'i lus kyi ngo bo dang // reg
386a8(mdo sde): bya rkyen gyi mtshan nyid dag/ rkyen dag las ni grol gyur pa// chos kyi dbyings zhes brjod par bya// yid gtsor gyur pa'i chos rnams la// rtog dang brtog
386b1(mdo sde): pa rnam spangs nas// chos rnams rang bzhin med pa nyid// chos kyi dbyings su bsgom par bya// mthong dang thos dang bsnams pa dang // myangs dang reg
386b2(mdo sde): par gyur pa dang // chos rnams de ltar rnal 'byor pas// shes nas mtshan nyid rdzogs pa yin// mig dang rna ba sna dag dang // lce dang lus dang de
386b3(mdo sde): bzhin yid// skye mched drug po rnam dag pa// 'di nyid de nyid mtshan nyid do// sems nyid rnam pa gnyis su mthong // ji ltar 'jig rten 'jig rten
386b4(mdo sde): 'das// bdag tu 'dzin las 'khor ba ste// so sor rig na de nyid de// 'dod chags zad pas mya ngan 'das// zhe sdang gti mug zad pa dang // de
386b5(mdo sde): dag 'gags pas sangs rgyas nyid// lus can kun gyi skyabs nyid do// shes dang mi shes pa dag las// lus 'di nyid la thams cad de// rang
386b6(mdo sde): gi rnam par rtog pas bcings// bdag nyid shes nas grol bar 'gyur// byang chub ring min nye ba min// 'gro min 'ong ba ma yin zhing // nyon mongs gzeb
386b7(mdo sde): gyur pa'i nyid la// mthong ba dang ni ma mthong yin// shes rab mar me la gnas nas// mchog tu zhi bar 'gyur ba yis// bdag la rtags pas gnas bya zhe//
386b8(mdo sde): mdo sde'i tshogs las gsungs pa lags// stobs bcu'i stobs kyis byis pa rnams// byin brlabs zla ba tshos pa bzhin// nyon mongs can gyi sems can gyis/
387a1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa mi mthong ngo // ji ltar yi dwags rnams kyis ni// rgya mtsho skams par mthong ba ltar// de bzhin mi shes/
387a2(mdo sde): pas bsregs pas// sangs rgyas rnams ni med par brtags// dman dang bsod nams dman pa la// bcom ldan 'das kyis ci bgyir mchis// ji ltar
387a3(mdo sde): dmus long lag pa ru// rin chen mchog ni gzhag pa 'dra// sems can bsod nams byas rnams la// 'od kyis gsal zhing dbang ldan pa'i// sum cu
387a4(mdo sde): rtsa gnyis mtshan 'bar ba// sangs rgyas de'i mdun na gnas// mgon po de'i gzugs kyi skus// bskal pa mang por bzhugs nas kyang // gdul bya rnams
387a5(mdo sde): ni gdul ba'i phyir// dbyings nyid tha dad gyur pa lags// sems kyis yul ni nges rtogs nas// des ni shes pa 'jug par 'gyur// so so rang rig rnam dag na// /
387a6(mdo sde): sa rnams de'i bdag nyid gnas// dbang phyug chen po gnas mchog dang // 'og min nyid de rnam mdzes pa// shes pa gsum po cig nyid du// 'dres par gyur pa bdag
387a7(mdo sde): smra'o// byis pa'i nang na yongs mkhyen dang // 'phags pa'i nang na sna tshogs nyid// dbang phyug chen po'i tshe dpag med// bskal pa tshe'i rgyud gang yin// phyi rol
387a8(mdo sde): sems can khams kyi yang // dpag tu med pa'i bskal par ni// tshe yang gang gis bsrung gyur cing // srog chags rnams kyi srog gnas pa'i// rgyu'ang mi zad pa
387b1(mdo sde): de nyid// gang gi 'bras bu mi zad gang // snang ba med pa'i bye brag gis// shes rab don du rab tu 'jug/ byang chub ring bar mi bsam zhing // nye bar yang ni bsam/
387b2(mdo sde): mi bya// yul drug snang ba med par na// yang dag ci bzhin rig gyur pa// ji ltar 'o ma dang 'dres chu// snod cig la ni gnas pa las// ngang pas 'o ma 'thung byed cing //
387b3(mdo sde): tshu ni ma yin de bzhin gnas// de bzhin nyon mongs kyis g.yogs nas// ye shes lus 'dir ci nas kyang // rnal 'byor pa yis ye shes len// mi shes pa ni 'dor
387b4(mdo sde): bar byed// bdag dang bdag gi zhes 'dzin pas// ji srid phyi rol rnams rtags pa// bdag med rnam pa gnyis mthong na// srid pa'i sa bon 'gag par 'gyur//
387b5(mdo sde): gang phyir sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das// gtsang ba rtag pa dge ba'i gzhi// gang phyir gnyis ni byis pas brtags// de'i gnyis med rnal 'byor gnas// dka'
387b6(mdo sde): spyod sna tshogs sbyin pa dang // tshul khrims sems can don bsdud dang // sems can phan byed bzod pa ste// gsum po 'dis ni khams rgyas 'gyur// chos rnams
387b7(mdo sde): kun la brtson 'grus dang // bsam gtan la sems 'jug pa dang // rtag tu shes rab brten pa ste// 'di yang byang chub rgyas byed yin// thabs dang bcas pa'i shes rab
387b8(mdo sde): dang // smon lam rnam par sbyangs pa dang // stobs la nges gnas ye shes de// khams rgyas byed pa'i chos bzhi yi// byang chub sems phyag mi bya zhes// smra ba ngan
388a1(mdo sde): par smra ba ste// byang chub sems dpa' ma byung bar// chos kyi sku ni 'byung ma yin// bur shing sa bon la sdang gang // khar spyad par 'dod/
388a2(mdo sde): pa des// bu shing sa bon med par ni// kha ri 'byung bar 'gyur ma yin// bur shing sa bon gang bsrungs nas// nye bar gnas shing bsrungs pa las// bu ram kha ra
388a3(mdo sde): sa rnams ni// de las 'byung bar 'gyur ba ltar// byang chub sems 'di rab bsrungs nas// nye bar gnas shing bsrungs pa las// dgra bcom rkyen rtogs sangs
388a4(mdo sde): rgyas rnams// de las skye zhing 'byung bar 'gyur// ji ltar sa lu'i sa bon stsogs// zhing las bsrung ba byed pa ltar// de bzhin theg mchog mos rnams la'ang //
388a5(mdo sde): 'dren pa rnams kyis bsrung bar mdzad// ji ltar mar ngo'i bcu bzhi la// zla ba cung zad mthong ba ltar// de bzhin theg mchog mos rnams la'ang // sangs rgyas
388a6(mdo sde): sku ni cung zhig mthong // ji ltar ches pa'i zla ba la// skad cig skad cig rgyas par mthong // de bzhin sa la zhugs rnams kyang // rim gyis rim gyis 'phel
388a7(mdo sde): bar mthong // ji ltar yang ngo'i bco lnga la// zla ba rdzogs par 'gyur ba ltar// de bzhin sa'i mthar thug na// chos kyi sku yang rdzogs shing gsal// sangs
388a8(mdo sde): rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la// rtag tu mos pa brtan po yis// sems de yang dag bskyed byas nas// phyir mi ldog pa yang yang 'byung // nag po'i gzhi ni
388b1(mdo sde): yongs spangs nas// dkar po'i gzhi ni rab bzung bas// de tshe de ni nges rtogs pa// dga' ba zhes ni mngon par brjod// 'dod chags la sogs sna tshog/
388b2(mdo sde): pa'i// dri mas rab tu dri la can// dri ma med pas gang dag pa// dri ma med ces brjod pa yin// nyon mongs dra ba rab 'gags nas// dri med shes rab rab
388b3(mdo sde): gsal bas// tshad med pa yi mun pa dag/ sel bar byed pas 'od byed pa'o// rtag tu dag pa'i 'od kyis gsal// 'du 'dzi rnam par spangs pa yi// ye
388b4(mdo sde): shes 'od kyis rab bskor bas// sa de 'od 'phro can du 'dod// rig dang rgyu rtsal bzo gnas kun// bsam gtan rnam pa sna tshogs nyid// nyon mongs
388b5(mdo sde): shin tu spyad dka' las// rnam par rgyal bas spyadra dkar 'dod// byang chub rnam pa gsum po dang // phun sum tshogs kun bsdu ba dang // skye dang 'jig pa zab
388b6(mdo sde): pa la// sa de mngon du gyur par 'dod// 'khor lo'i bkod pas rnam kun du// 'od kyi dra ba rtse ba dang // 'khor ba'i mtsho'i 'dam rgal bas// de la ring du song zhes/
388b7(mdo sde): bya// sangs rgyas kyis nges 'di bzung zhing // ye shes rgya mtshor zhugs pa dang // 'bad med lhun gyis grub 'gyur bas// bdud kyi 'khor gyis mi g.yos pa'o// so so//
388b8(mdo sde): yang dag rig kun la// chos ston pa yi 'brel pa'i gtam// rnal 'byor pa de mthar song bas// sa de legs pa'i blo gros 'dod// ye shes rang bzhin 'di yi sku// dri/
389a1(mdo sde): med nam mkha' dang mnyam pa// sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'dzin pa las// chos kyi sprin gyi kun tu 'byung // sangs rgyas rnams kyi
389a2(mdo sde): chos kyi gnas// spyod pa'i 'bras bu yongs 'dzin pa// gnas ni yongs su gyur pa de// chos kyi sku zhes brjod pa yin// bag chags las grol bsam mi bya/
389a3(mdo sde): 'khor ba'i bag chags bsam du yod// khyod ni kun tu bsam mi khyab// gang gis khyod ni shes rab nus// gang gi spyod yul kun las 'das// dbang po kun gyi
389a4(mdo sde): spyod yul min// yid kyi shes pas rtogs bya ba// gang yang rung la phyag 'tshal bstod// rim gyis 'jug pa'i lus nyid kyis// sangs rgyas sras po grags
389a5(mdo sde): chen rnams// chos kyi sprin gyi ye shes kyis// chos nyid stong pa mthong gyur nas// gang tshe sems ni rab bkrus pas// 'khor ba'i gzeb las 'das gyur
389a6(mdo sde): nas// pad+ma chen po'i rang bzhin gyi// stan la de ni rab gnas 'gyur// mdab ma rin chen du ma'i 'od// 'dod par bya ba'i ze'u 'bru can// pad+ma bye ba du ma yis//
389a7(mdo sde): rnam pa kun tu yongs su bskor// stobs bcu po yis yongs su gang // mi 'jigs pa yisra yang dag ngoms// bsam mi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas chos// spros med
389a8(mdo sde): rnams las nyams mi mnga'// legs par spyad pa'i las kun gyis// bsod nams ye shes rab bsags pa'i// zla ba nya la skar ma yis// 'khor du rnam pa
389b1(mdo sde): kun gyis bskor// sangs rgyas phyag gi nyi mas der// dri med rin chen 'bar gyur te// sras kyi thu bor dbang skur bas// dbang skur ba ni kun du gsol// rnal
389b2(mdo sde): 'byor chen po der gnas nas// rmongs pas dman pa'i 'jig rten rnams// sdug bsngal gyis g.yengs 'jigs pa la// lha'i spyan gyis gzigs gyur nas// /
389b3(mdo sde): de'i sku las 'od zer rnams// 'bad pa med par 'byung 'gyur te// rmongs pa'i mun par zhugs pa de'i// sgo rnams 'byed par mdzad pa yin// lhag bcas mya
389b4(mdo sde): ngan 'das pa rnams// lhag med mya ngan 'das pa 'dod// 'dir ni mya ngan 'das pa nyid// dri ma med par sems gyur pa'o// sems can kun gyi dngos med pa'i// /
389b5(mdo sde): ngo bo de yang de spyod yul// de mthong byang chub sems dbang po// shin tu dri med chos kyi sku// dri ma med pa'i chos sku la// ye shes rgya mtsho gnas gyur nas//
389b6(mdo sde): sna tshogs nor bu ji bzhin du// de las sems can don rnam mdzad// chos kyi dbyings su bstod pa// / slob dpon klu grub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs sgo// /
389b7(mdo sde): rgya gar gyi mkhan po kri sna pan bi ta dang / lo tsa ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/
389b8(mdo sde): / rgya gar skad du/ a tsin ta sta ba/ bod skad du/ bsam gyis mi khyab par bstod pa// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo//
390a1(mdo sde): gang gis dngos po rten 'byung rnams// ngo bo med pa nyid du gnas// ye shes mnyam med bsam mi khyab// dpe med de la phyag
390a2(mdo sde): 'tshal lo// ji ltar khyod kyis theg chen la// nyid kyis chos la bdag med rtogs// de bzhin blo dang ldan rnams la// thugs rje'i dbang gis bstan pa mdzad//
390a3(mdo sde): rkyen rnams las ni 'brel 'byung ba// ma skyes lags par khyed kyis gsungs// ngo nyid kyis de ma skyes// de phyir stong par rab tu bstan// ji ltar 'di na
390a4(mdo sde): smra sten nas// brag cha kun tu 'byung ba ltar// sgyu ma smig rgyu bzhin du yang // de bzhin srid la kun tu 'byung // sgyu ma dang ni smig rgyu dang // dri za'i grong
390a5(mdo sde): khyer gzugs brnyan dang // rmi lam gal te ma skyes na// mthong ba la sogs de med 'gyur// ji ltar rgyu rkyen las byung ba// de dag byas pa can du bzhed/
390a6(mdo sde): de bzhin rkyen las skyes pa kun// mgon po khyod kyis de ltar gsungs// byis pas gang dag ci brjod pa// bgyis pa zhes bgyi de mchis te// chad pa stong
390a7(mdo sde): pa 'dra ba lags// don bzhin ma lags rab tu bstan// gang tshe byas pa'i dngos ma skyes// de tshe da ltar byung ba yi// gang zhig bas na 'das par gyur// ma
390a8(mdo sde): 'ongs pa yang ji la ltos// rang las dngos po skye ba med// gzhan dang gnyi ga las kyang min// yod min med min yod pa min// de tshe gang las gang zhig 'byung
390b1(mdo sde): ma skyes pa la rang bzhin med// de phyir gang las kun tu byung // rang bzhin dngos po med grub pas// gzhan las kyang ni 'byung ba med// rang nyid yod na gzhan/
390b2(mdo sde): yod 'gyur// gzhan nyid yod na rang yod 'dod// de dag ltos pa can du grub// pha rol tshu rol bzhin du gsungs// gang tshe ci la'ang mi ltos pa// de tshe gang
390b3(mdo sde): las gang zhig 'byung // gang tshe ring las mi ltos pa// de tshe thung sogs ga la mchis// ji ltar gcig sogs ma mchis pa// 'das dang ma 'ongs la
390b4(mdo sde): sogs pa// nyon mongs rnam byang de bzhin te// yang dag log pa'ang rang las ci// dngos rang rang gis ma mchis na// de tshe thams cad ci zhig mchis//
390b5(mdo sde): gzhan zhes brjod pa gang lags te// rang gi rang bzhin med na min// gang tshe gzhan gyi dngos med pa// de tshe dngos rnams rang bzhin med// de tshe gzhan
390b6(mdo sde): dngos dngos 'dzin pa// gdon gyis thebs pa ci zhig mchis// gdod ma nyid nas mnyam gyur pa// rang bzhin gyis kyang mya ngan 'das// yang dag par
390b7(mdo sde): ni ma skyes lags// de skad chos rnams khyod kyis gsungs// blo ldan khyod kyis gzugs la sogs// ngo bo nyid med rab bstan pa// dbu ba chu bur
390b8(mdo sde): sgyu ma sogs// smig rgya chu shing 'dra ba lags// dbang po rnams kyis gang dmigs te// gal te yang dag mchis gyur na// byas pa yang dag rig pa gyur/
391a1(mdo sde): de tshe yang dag shes pas ci// dbang po rnams ni bems po dang // tshad ma nyid kyang ma yin dang // lung du ma bstan nyid dang ni//
391a2(mdo sde): log par yongs shes khyod kyis gsungs// gang gis ci bzhin mi rtogs pa// yang dag ci bzhin thugs chud nas// des na 'jig rten mi shes pas// bsgribs
391a3(mdo sde): pa zhes kyang khyod kyis gsungs// yod ces pa ni rtag par lta// med ces pa ni chad par lta// des na mtha' gnyis bral ba yi// chos de khyod kyis bstan pa mdzad// /
391a4(mdo sde): des ni chos rnams mu bzhi dang // bral bar khyod kyis bka' stsal lags// rnam shes zhes bya'ang ma lags na// tshig gi spyod yul ga la lags// rmi la
391a5(mdo sde): mig 'phrul las byung dang // zla ba gnyis las sogs mthong bzhin// 'gro ba 'byung ba de'i dngos su// ma byung de bzhin khyod kyis gzigs// ji ltar rgyu las
391a6(mdo sde): rmi lam na// 'byung ba mthong ba de bzhin du// dngos po thams cad 'byung ba gzhan// 'jig pa'ang de bzhin bzhed pa lags// de bzhin chags sogs sdug
391a7(mdo sde): bsngal dang // 'khor ba sdug bsngal kun nyon mongs// tshogs rdzogs pa dang thar pa yang // rmi lam 'dra bar khyod kyis gsungs// de bzhin skyes dang ma skyes dang /
391a8(mdo sde): 'ongs pa dang ni song ba yang // de bzhin bcings bkrol ye shes la// gnyis 'dod yang dag rig ma lags// gang la skyes pa yod ma lags// de la mya ngan
391b1(mdo sde): 'das gang yod// sgyu ma'i glang po 'dra bas na// don du bzod nas zhi ba nyid// skyes pa nyid na'ang ma skyes pa// sgyu ma'i glang po ci bzhin bzhed// de bzhin thams
391b2(mdo sde): cad skyes pa yang // yang dag par na ma skyes lags// 'jig rten mgon po dpag med kyis// sems can dpag tu ma mchis pa// so sor mya ngan 'das mdzad
391b3(mdo sde): kyang // de dag gis kyang gang ma bkrol// thub chen gang phyir sems can rnams// rang las ma skyes de'i phyir// gang yang gang gis ma dkrol zhes// de skad
391b4(mdo sde): khyod kyis gsal bar gsungs// ji ltar sgyu ma mkhan gyis byas// dngos po stong pa de bzhin du// byas pa thams cad dngos stong gzhan// khyod gsungs de bzhin
391b5(mdo sde): byed pa po// byed pa po yang gzhan gyis bgyis// byas pa can du'ang 'gyur ba lags// yang na de yi bya byed pa// byed pa por ni thar byar 'gyur// 'di dag thams
391b6(mdo sde): cad ming tsam zhes// khyod kyis gsang ni bstod de gsungs// brjod pa las ni gzhan gyur pa// brjod par bgyi ba yod ma mchis// de phyir chos rnams thams cad/
391b7(mdo sde): ni// rtogs pa tsam zhes khyod kyis gsungs// gang gis stong par rnam rtog pa'i// rtog pa'i yang ni med ces gsungs// dngos dang dngos med gnyis 'das pa'i
391b8(mdo sde): la lar ma 'das pa yang lags// shes pa med cing shes bya'ang med// med min yod min gang lags dang // gang yang gcig min du ma min// gnyi ga ma yin ci
392a1(mdo sde): yang med// gzhi med pa dang mi gsal dang // bsam mi khyab dang dpe med dang // gang yang mi skye mi 'jig dang // chad pa med//
392a2(mdo sde): cing rtag med pa// de ni nam mkha' 'dra ba logs// yi ge ye shes spyod yul min// de ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung // de nyid stong par khyod bzhed lags/
392a3(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos kyang de lta bu// de bzhin gshegs pa'ang de dang mtshungs// de ni de nyid don dam dang // de bzhin nyid dang rdzas su bzhed// de ni yang dag mi
392a4(mdo sde): slu ba// de ba rtogs pas na sangs rgyas brjod// sangs rgyas rnams dang chos kyi dbyings// des na don du tha mi dang // bdag nyid dang ni gzhan rnams kyang // /
392a5(mdo sde): des na mnyam par khyod bzhed lags// dngos po rnams las stong gzhan min// de med par yang dngos po med// de phyir brten cing 'byung ba'i dngos// stong
392a6(mdo sde): pa lags par khyod kyis bstan// rgyu dang rkyen las byung ba'ang lags// gzhan gyi dbang dang kun rdzob ste// gzhan gyi dbang zhes rab tu gsungs// dam pa'i
392a7(mdo sde): don ni bcos ma yin// ngo bo nyid dang rab zhi dang // yang dag rdzas dngos yod pa'ang lags// brtags pa'i dngos po med pa nyid// gzhan gyi dbang ni yod pa
392a8(mdo sde): lags// brtags pa'i dngos po yod ces pa// sgro 'dogs lags par khyod kyis gsungs// byas pa chad pas med ces pa// chad pa lags par khyod
392b1(mdo sde): kyis gsungs// yang dag shes la chad pa med// rtag pa nyid kyang med par bzhed// 'gro ba dngos po ston pa lags// de slad smig rgyu 'dra bar bzhed// rdzi/
392b2(mdo sde): ltar ri dgas skom chu ni// chad med rtag pa yod ma yin// de bzhin 'gro ba thams cad kyang // tshad med rtag pa med par gsungs// gang la rdzas shig skye 'gyur
392b3(mdo sde): ba/ de la chad stsogs 'jigs par 'byung // de la 'jig rten mtha' yod dang // mtha' med par yang 'gyur ba lags// shes pa yod pas shes bya bzhin// shes
392b4(mdo sde): bya yod pas de bzhin shes// gang tshe gnyi ga ma skyes par// rtogs pa de tshe ci zhig yod// de ltar sgyu ma la sogs bdes// sman pa'i mchog gis gsal bstan nas//
392b5(mdo sde): lta ba thams cad gos byed pa// dam pa'i chos ci bstan pa lags// ngo bo med pa nyid bstan pa// de ni yang dag dam pa lags// dngos po'i gdon gyis zin rnams
392b6(mdo sde): kyi// gso ba de ni bla na med// chos kyi mchod sbyin bla med pa// des na chos kyi mchod sbyin la// mchod sbyin rib mar rtag rgyun du// 'jig rten gsum po sbyin sreg
392b7(mdo sde): mdzad// dngos 'dzin 'jigs pa gcod bgyid pa// mu stegs ri dgas 'jigs bgyid pa// bdag med seng ge'i nga ro'i sgra// rmad byung de ni khyod kyis gsungs//
392b8(mdo sde): stong pa nyid dang chos zab pa'i// chos kyi rnga chen brdungs pa lags// ngo bo nyid med sgra bo che'i// chos kyi dung ni bus pa lags// sangs rgyas bstan pa bdud rtsi yi/
393a1(mdo sde): chos kyi rdzas ni gsungs pa lags// chos rnams kyi ni stong pa nyid// nges pa'i don to zhes kyang bstan// gang yang skye dang /
393a2(mdo sde): 'gag la sogs// sems can srog la sogs bstan pa// de ni bkri don de kun rdzob// mgon po khyod kyis bstan pa lags// shes rab pha rol phyin
393a3(mdo sde): mtsho yi// pha rol gang gis rab phyin te// bsod nams yon tan rin ces phyug/ khyod kyi yon tan pha rol phyin// de ltar dpe med bsam mi khyab// 'gro ba'i
393a4(mdo sde): mgon po bstod pa yis// bdag gis bsod nams gang thob des// 'gro ba khyod dang mtshungs par shog/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bstod pa/ slob dpon klu
393a5(mdo sde): grub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// // thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal ba'i yon tan mtha' ma 'tshal bas gal te khyed bsngags
393a6(mdo sde): ma brjod na// 'ga' yang khyod ston mi bgyid khyod kyi 'byor pa 'gro bas rtogs ma mchis// gang slad 'gro 'dis khyod la bla bgyis kyang nongs pa ma mchis pa// de slad don
393a7(mdo sde): 'dir bdag ni blo gros rab tu chung yang brtson pa lags// srid gsum dag la phan brtson blo mnga' ngan song dag na'ang bsngags par 'os// rang don smon pa'i blo gros can ni
393a8(mdo sde): mya ngan 'das kyang ma lags shes// de slad khyod ni 'khor ba'i 'jigs pas mi mdog brtan zhing mi g.yo bas// 'jig rten skye zhing 'chi bas nyam thag yongs
393b1(mdo sde): su bskyab par brtson pa lags// sred pa'i 'gro ba dag tu sdug bsngal rnams kyis smras pa'i sems can la// bdag gi blo gros brtsub pos sdug bsngal rnam mang /
393b2(mdo sde): de dang de bsgrubs pas// de phyir bdag gis de dag rnams la bde ba bskyed phyir bzod bya zhes// de slad khyod la 'gro ba zhi ba'i bde ba bskyed slad brtson pa lags//
393b3(mdo sde): sems can gang ma rig mdongs pas bsam pa rgud pa'i blo gros can// pha dang bur gyur rnams kyis bdag la snyen snyam byams pas phan gtags pa// de dag btang
393b4(mdo sde): nas cig pu thar bar byed pa bdag gi tshul min zhes// de slad khyod kyis 'gro ba mgon med nges thar bgyi slad smon lam btab// sngon chad 'khor bar sdug bsngal
393b5(mdo sde): kun tu myong gyur tshe na bdag la ni// gang dag yun ring ngo zhes byams sems ldan pas lan brgyar grogs byas pas// bde ba thob tshe de dag bkol nas ji ltar yongs
393b6(mdo sde): su spyad bya zhes// de slad khyod ni bdud rtsi'ang sems can kun dang thun mong gsol bar brtson// mchog sbyin 'gro bar sems can rnams dang lhan cig longs spyad 'das
393b7(mdo sde): dgongs na// de dag nges par yongs su mi gtong bas na khyod kyi brtan pa ni// ji ltar khyod nyid ne tsor 'khrungs tshe ljon shing gzhon nu legs spyad pa'i// ljon shing
393b8(mdo sde): rgas par gyur kyang yongs su mi gtong de ltar brtson pa lags// gang slad 'gro ba mya ngan ma zlas mya ngan khyod 'da' blo ma byung // bde gshegs go 'phang brnyes par
394a1(mdo sde): nus pa ma lags de mi mdzad// de slad khyod ni kun mkhyen yon tan gter dag brnyes mdzad slad du brtson// stobs bcu'i
394a2(mdo sde): yon tan dag gis mdzad pa las zhan khyod la phra mi mnga'// gang su la la dag gis bde gshegs go 'phang brnyes pa de dag kyang // 'di bas shin tu rmad pa'i gan
394a3(mdo sde): skabs dag tu lhung ba byung ngo zhes// de srad khyod kyis nyam ngar lhung ba'i tshe yang dag nyid smad ma mdzad// bdag la smod pa mi rung skyes bu dar ba zhum par bgyid pa
394a4(mdo sde): lags// gang slad gal te rang la rag las 'bad pas byang chub thob 'gyur na// sangs rgyas byang chub rnyed dka' ma lags snyam du khyod kyi blo gros byung // de slad
394a5(mdo sde): khyod kyis nyam nga'i dus su'ang kun mkhyen smon lam brten bzlog pa// sman la dga' ba rnams kyi tshig dag khyod kyis khyad du gsad par mdzad// nyon mongs chu bo
394a6(mdo sde): 'khrugs dang ngan 'gro'i kha dag rtag tu gdangs pa dang // so so'i skye bo g.yo dang sdig pa'i grogs po rtag par rgyun du gnas pa dang // thub rnams rnyed par dka'
394a7(mdo sde): zhes de ltar sems zhum 'gro ba gtong ba'i rgyu// gang lags de nyid khyod kyi thugs rje rtag tu skye ba'i rgyur// ji ltar 'gro ba rnams la khyod blo shin tu byams pa skye ba ltar/
394a8(mdo sde): 'jig rten 'di dag rang la'ang byams pa'i blo gros skye bar mi 'gyur la// 'jig rten 'phongs pa'i gnas skabs gyur na bdag nyid gtong bar bgyid// khyod ni shin tu
394b1(mdo sde): nyam nga'i dus su'ang 'gro ba gtong bar bzhed ma mchis// gang zhig skye bo smad dang 'phongs pa re ba'i bsam ldan mthong na yang // rtse med 'bras bu 'dod pas snod gzhan
394b2(mdo sde): yon tan ldan tshol ba// bsam rlag de ni sbyin pa byed kyang slong ba rnams dang mtshungs so zhes// de slad khyod ni thugs rjes slong ba rnams la sbyin par gzhed la zhugs//
394b3(mdo sde): 'ga' zhig rang nyid ma dul bzhin du rig par ldan pa'i tshig smra yang // rang gi tshig dang 'gal bar spyod pas gzhan dag gdul bar mi nus shes// khyod kyis dgongs nas
394b4(mdo sde): de slad 'gro ba mtha' dag thugs la gzhag ma mdzad nas// re shig bdag nyid ma dul ba nyid dul bar mdzad phyir brtson pa lags// gang slad mkhas pa rnams kyi mi dge'i
394b5(mdo sde): las kyang zhi ba'i bde bar 'gyur mod kyi// 'on kyang 'phags pas mi dge ba dag kun tu bsten 'os ma yin zhes// de slad khyod kyi rtag tu rang bzhin yongs su dag pas sdig
394b6(mdo sde): las log/ ngan song 'jigs pas ma lags lha'i bde spyad bzhed pa'i phyir ma lags// gang dag 'gro la mi lta bdag nyid zhi bar 'gro bar bgyi slad spyod bgyid pa/
394b7(mdo sde): des kyang ji ste brtson pa ma rten slan chad bsam rdzogs mi 'gyur na// gang gis 'gro ba ma lus bsgral phyir brtson pa brtsams pas ci smos shes// de slad khyod kyis rang
394b8(mdo sde): gi bde la ma gzigs byang chub srad du brtson// khyod kyis 'byor pa chung ba'i tshe yang sbyin par bzhed pa ma spangs la// bdog pa chung yang spong ba rnams la zhugs mnga' ba'i
395a1(mdo sde): thugs kyis stsal// dbang phyug chen po mnga' yang tshul dang 'gal ba'i tha snyad mi mnga' la// na tshod lang tshor gyur yang 'dod pa rnams
395a2(mdo sde): la thugs ni chags mi mnga'// khyod kyis thos dang blo gros che ba'i tshe na'ang bdag stod ma mdzad la// 'gro ba yon tan chung ba gzhan rnams kyang ni mthon por bkur bar gyur//
395a3(mdo sde): yon tan tshogs la gnas tshe nyid kyi spyod pa nyes par chung ngu'ang bzung // 'gro po dmu rgod rnams la rtsol ba mi mnga' bde bar gnas pas bzhugs// khyod kyi thugs ni srid
395a4(mdo sde): dang nyon mongs skyo bas zhi la bgyes gyur kyang // thugs rje nyid kyis mdzad pa'i yon tan skye ba rnams dang rjes su 'thun// byed pa ma gtogs gzhan gyis 'bras bu mi myong
395a5(mdo sde): bar ni khyod mkhyen kyang // 'on kyang sems can rnams kyi 'byor pa skyed slad bsod nams gter rnams bdar// khyod la shes rab la sogs yon tan gang dag
395a6(mdo sde): rtag tu mnga' gyur pa// de dag khyod kyis 'gro ba dag gi don rnams nyid du nye bar spyad// de las khyod kyi bsod nams 'bras bu gzhan du mchis pa ma lags la//
395a7(mdo sde): de dag 'gro ba'i 'byor srad yongs su bsngos kyang don ma mchis ma lags// khyod la gzhan la sman pa'i thabs dang bral ba'i dus 'ga' 'ang byung ma gyur// thams chung ma
395a8(mdo sde): gyur 'bras bu chung ma lags// bsod nams chung ngu rtsom pa dag la khyod ni mngon dges ma lags la// bsod nams chu bo dag gis ngoms par ma gyur chab kyis/
395b1(mdo sde): rgya mtsho bzhin// mtshan mo ston ka'i zla ba nye ba'i mdangs kyis nyams dgar 'gyur ba dang // rdzing bu ud dpal rgyas pa gnyid bral mig la 'dom brjid byed nams dang /
395b2(mdo sde): ri bo ljon shing me tog rgyas pa brgya yis rtse mo dkris rnams kyis// gzhan la cig pu smad bgyes khyod kyis blo gros 'phrogs par rngo mi thog/ 'jig rten sdug bsngal dag
395b3(mdo sde): gis smas tshe khyod ni gnyid la byams pa yis// yul gyi dga' bsten nyam su blang bya min zhes thugs rje'i blos mkhyen nas// gling bzhi'i dbang phyug mnga' yang yul rnams kyi
395b4(mdo sde): na thugs kyang mi 'phrogs la// khyod kyis gzhan smad lhur ba zhes mdzad pas dus dag shin tu 'das par bgyis// phyug cing 'byor pa slong ba rnams kyis legs par
395b5(mdo sde): spyad par ma byas dang // dur khrod ljon shing me tog rgyas pa'i brjid kyis g.yur za mtshungs so zhes// de slad bsod nams sman pa'i 'byor pa dag la slong rnams mi spyod
395b6(mdo sde): pas// khyod kyi skor nor slong ba ma mchis pa na thugs la gcags par 'gyur// gang zhig rtse med sred pas tshor ba bzhin du 'bras bu'i phyir brtsal nas// des ni 'bras
395b7(mdo sde): bu yang ni slong ba rnams la sbyin par spro ma mchis// gang gi slad du khyod kyi gtong ba rtag tu smin gyur pa// de slad de'i 'bras bu'ang slong ba rnams kyis rang gi legs par
395b8(mdo sde): gzung // ri ngos ljon shing 'bras bu sbyin pa dag tu bya rnams lta bu dang // dgon pa'i rdzing bu skyed shing bzang pos bskor bar ngal rnams ltar// 'dzem med spong bas
396a1(mdo sde): dges pa khyod la bag phebs 'byor pa 'tshal ba yi// slong mo bdag kun nas myur bar sngon du lhags nas sdod cing mchis// dpal/
396a2(mdo sde): 'byor 'bangs dang btsun mo rang gi sha dang srog kyang gtong ba dang // khyod kyis sras gzhon rab sdug ston zla tshes pa dri med gzugs ldan pa'ang // slong ba rnams la
396a3(mdo sde): gtong bar mdzad la brtson par gyur pa ji lta ba la// de ltar gtong la goms pa khyod kyi thugs la brtan pa nyid kyang byung // gang zhig thos par gyur na'ang 'jig rten
396a4(mdo sde): 'di la gnod la skye 'gyur dang // gang yang khyod nyid kyis kyang yun ring sku nyams bzhes par mi spyod pa'i// spyod pa de dag khyod la goms pas dus su rang gi ngang nyid
396a5(mdo sde): 'gyur// de slad yon tan dag ni yongs goms ma bgyis dpel bar dka' ba lags// ji ltar sman pa gdon gyis zin la gdon rnams gsal bar bgyi slad du// rdeg
396a6(mdo sde): cing tshig rtsub smra ba spyod kyang zad pa rdeg mi bgyid// de ltar khyod kyang nyon mongs nyid la rtse dang bral bas sbyor mdzad kyi// 'gro ba nyon mongs gyur pa la ni khyod nyid thugs
396a7(mdo sde): rje mdzad pa lags// khyod kyis rtag tu yon tan nor lhag rnams la gus pas bsags pa mdzad// mnyam pa rnams la yon tan goms par bgyi slad byams pa'i
396a8(mdo sde): thugs kyis spyad// sman la thugs rjes brtson pa mchog gi yon tan rnams bskrun te// 'gro ba rnams la khyod kyis ji ltar rigs par legs par mdzad par zhugs//
396b1(mdo sde): ji ltar ma ma rang lus sna tshogs thabs tshul mang pos 'dzin bgyid kyang // gzhon nu'i nad bsal ched lags dga' bskyed ma lags lus phyir ma lags pa// de slad
396b2(mdo sde): khyod kyang brtson pa chen pos yon tan bdag nyid bskrun mdzad pa// 'gro bas longs spyod che lags grags dang gzhan dag zil mnan chen ma lags// khyod kyis blo gros
396b3(mdo sde): gzhan la sman pa'i thabs mkhyen mdzad slad zhugs gyur pa// 'di ltar khyod nyid thugs rjes rnam pa de dag nyid las zhugs la gda'// khyod ni brtson 'grus 'phags
396b4(mdo sde): pas brtsal ba che yang brnyel bar ma gyur na// de gsum dag gis khyod kyis gzhan sman ma bsgrubs cung zad byung ma gyur// khyod ni 'bad brtsol chen po can gyi 'phrin
396b5(mdo sde): las mnga' bar mi bzhed la// spyod pa shin tu slad du byung ba cig tu bsam yang 'di yang byung // gang slad khyod kyis sems can ma mchis pa 'di thugs su chud gyur kyang // /
396b6(mdo sde): 'di ltar sems can don gyi slad du grangs med dus su'ang srid par zhugs// gang slad shes rab don dam brten cing snying rje kun rdzob bsten mdzad pa// de slad don bzhin
396b7(mdo sde): dgongs mdzad khyod la sems can mchis pa ma lags kyang // gang tshe khyod ni stobs bcu bskyed pa'i thugs rje ngag dang ldan gyur pa// de tshe 'gro ba nyams thag rnams
396b8(mdo sde): la khyod byams bu la pha byams bzhin// 'gro ba btugs dang nyon mongs pas byang chub mchog thob ma mchis la// nyon mongs 'phrogs pas rang la sman pas bgyid pa'ang
397a1(mdo sde): 'thob 'gyur ma lags pa// de slad khyod kyis byang chub skyes slad brtan pa mdzad pa na/ nyon mongs nges par ma bsregs ran gyi dum
397a2(mdo sde): bu bzhin du yang bar mdzad// khyod kyi nyon mongs dran dang mkhyen pas bzung ba yon tan sna tshogs grub// nyon mongs pa dag yang bar gyur pa byang chub rgyur yang nye bar 'gyur
397a3(mdo sde): lags te// 'di ltar de yis khyod blo shul gol yul can du yang ma bgyis la// 'gro ba rnams su skye ba sbyar ba'ang yon tan rnams kyi zhing du mdzad// 'gro ba nyon mongs gyur
397a4(mdo sde): dang sdug bsngal brgyad dag byung bas bcom pa yis// rtsol dang bral zhing mgon ma mchis pas gang dang gang du spyod bgyid pa// 'gro ba der ni nyon mongs dgra thul
397a5(mdo sde): khyod nyid thugs rjes spyod pa na// srid pa len dang gtong dang gnas pa dag la mnga' dbang mchis pa lags// ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi ni yul can phra brgyas rnam
397a6(mdo sde): bcom nas// de dag spangs pa'i thabs tshul gang lags dam pa'i tshogs la yun ring bshad pa mdzad// sa gsum sman pa'i thabs mkhas khyod kyis phyir yang
397a7(mdo sde): drangs nas ni// dud 'gro dag tu'ang smon pa mdzad nas skye ba brgya phrag rnams kyang mdzad// sngon gyi mi dge ba yi 'phrin las rnam par smin par ma nges gang lags pa//
397a8(mdo sde): de dag dud 'gro'i 'gro bar gshegs la gzhol ba khyod la mnga' mchis pas// khyod kyis rnam smin ched du drangs te thugs la dgongs pa'i don bsgrubs pa// drang srong
397b1(mdo sde): gis bshang gsang bsngags zhi bas dug gis shugs dag bzlog pa bzhin/ khyod kyis rten du mi dge ba'i chos dang g.yul dag spyad par gyur pa na// 'gro ba dang
397b2(mdo sde): mdzad mkhas pa khyod kyis 'gro ba de dang der spyod pa'i// tshul khrims ma 'bad brtul zhugs ldan pa bzhin du gyur pa ji lta ba// de ltar dam pa'i spyod lugs byang chub
397b3(mdo sde): bsgrub par dag la goms pa mdzad// ma bzhin re 'ga'ang thugs rje dag dang ma bral mgon ma mchis rnams kyi// sdug bsngal de dang de dag bsal slad 'gro ba sdug
397b4(mdo sde): bsngal can dag tu// brnyengs dang bral bar spyod pa mdzad pa khyod kyi thabs la mkhas pa ni// 'grub par dga' dang rnyes par dga' ba 'ga' yang byung bar ma gyur lags//
397b5(mdo sde): gang slad sna tshogs thabs kyis 'gro ba sdig par bying 'dul khyod la ni// dud 'gro ba dag kyang bde 'gro bzhin du don chen kho nar gyur// ngan song dag tu 'khrungs na'ang legs
397b6(mdo sde): par spyod pa nyams pa mi mnga' ba// de slad khyod kyi sdig pa'ang yon tan gyur pas de dge ba nyid dang mtshungs// khyod la legs rten kha cig byang chub gsum la blo gros ci rigs
397b7(mdo sde): zhugs// de bzhin gzhan dag bsam gtan gzugs med dag la go 'phang gzhag pa mdzad// kha cig gtong la zhugs shing nges tshul mchid kyis 'tshal gyur pas// khyod kyi/
397b8(mdo sde): 'jig rten dag na sman yon ma btags pa ni 'ga' ma mchis// khyod kyis 'jig rten dag ni 'gro ba dgang rnams nges par thar 'tshal ba// bde 'gror nye bar drangs shing dge
398a1(mdo sde): ba yongs su smin pa nyid du mdzad// khyod kyis 'gro bzhi mdzad slad du 'gro ba rnams su spyod pa na// drang srong chen po gzhan dag dus
398a2(mdo sde): bzhin byung bas ji bar mdzad pa bzhin// gang slad khyod ni 'gro ba'i skye ba gcad dang rdzogs sangs rgyas mdzad ma gtogs par// gzhan gyi skye ba zhi bar mi 'gyur snyam du blo
398a3(mdo sde): gros nges gyur pa// de spang byang chub gzhol ba'i thugs mnga' khyod kyis srid rtse man chad kyi// lam rnams tshul bzhin ston par mdzad pas du dag bzla bar gyur pa lags// gang
398a4(mdo sde): zhig rtogs par ma gyur pa yis 'jig rten ma rig mdongs 'gyur la// 'gro ba sdug bsngal mang po rgyu zhing 'chi bdag 'tshams las mi 'da' ba'i// 'phags lam 'jigs
398a5(mdo sde): med sngon gyi drang srong che rnams rjes gshegs gang lags pa// de ni khyod kyis 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal mthar gdug slad du nyid kyis mkhyen// ji ltar dus mtha'i tshe na nyi
398a6(mdo sde): ma du mas chab skams 'jig rten 'di// zhugs chen mched pa 'khros pa lta bus thal ba dag kyang bsreg bgyid pa// de ltar dregs bral khyod kyi nyon mongs bsrabs par
398a7(mdo sde): gyur pa'i bag chags kyang // ye shes zhugs chen 'bar ba dag gis nges par bsregs par gyur pa lags// gang dag sa gsum bla ma rnams la nges par gnas par
398a8(mdo sde): 'tshal ba dag/ mun pa chung ngu dang yang lhan cig gnas par 'gal ba gang lags pa'i// yon tan mtha' yas de dag mngon par sangs rgyas chen dus gcig tu// shing /
398b1(mdo sde): la bya rnams gnas 'cha' bzhin du gyur pa khyod kyis ga la brnyes// nyi ma 'od zer gsal ba ston ldan zla ba sprin dang bral gyur pas// lhag par dga' bar bgyid pa nam/
398b2(mdo sde): mkha'i dkyil na nges par gnas gyur kyang // gang gis khebs pa'i 'gro ba'i srid pa'i dgon pa thibs por 'khyam bgyid pa'i// ma rig mun nag de dag rab tu zhi ba'i thabs
398b3(mdo sde): tshul khyod kyis bstan// sdug bsngal khyab pa 'di yi de rab skye bar 'gyur ba'i kun byung 'di// de thar par gtugs pa 'di yin te rtogs gyur la gzhol ba'i thabs 'di zhes/
398b4(mdo sde): de ltar tshangs pa khyod kyis tshangs pa zla 'od gtsang ma dag kyang stan// de dag rtogs bgyid skye ba stan yang tshangs pa'i go 'phang thob par 'gyur// ji srid nyi ma'i snang ba gang lags
398b5(mdo sde): de ni nub kyi ri dbang gis// nyi ma nub par ma bgyis de srid rab rib rab tu zhi bar bgyid// khyod kyis skye shi mthar gtugs bgyi slad thabs tshul bstan pa gang lags pa// de
398b6(mdo sde): ni khyod nyid zhi bar gshegs kyang snying gi mun nag zhi mdzad lags// de ltar tshangs par gtso bor lha'i bla mar gyur pa tshangs gter gyis// bstod par 'os pa bde gshegs/
398b7(mdo sde): mngon gsum bzhugs bzhin bstod bgyid pas// bdag gis bsod nams gter dag bstsogs pa gang lags de yis 'gro ba rnams// drang srong chen po rnams kyis dgon
398b8(mdo sde): pa legs pa gang legs der gyur cig// yon tan mtha' yas la bstod pa// / slob dpon dkon mchog 'bangs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho//
399a1(mdo sde): rgya gar gyi mkhan po sarbad nyede ba dang / lo tshab ban de rin chen mchog gis bsgyur/ zhu chen gyi lo tshab ban de dpal brtsegs kyis/
399a2(mdo sde): zhus te gtan la phab pa// @#rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya man dz+re shri ba ha ka ka ru sto tram/ bod skad du/ rje btsun
399a3(mdo sde): 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi snying rje la bstod pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// nges pa ma lus pa ni rnam bsal cing // thub pa'i grags pas
399a4(mdo sde): 'gro ba ma lus khyab// dpal ldan rab tu brtan pa'i sku mnga' ba// 'jam dpal khyod la rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo// bos shing bos shing 'gro ba ma lus pa// 'di dag
399a5(mdo sde): 'phongs pa kun las khyod skyob mdzad// bdag ni sdug bsngal gyur kyang dman khyed ces// ci'i phyir na nges par sel mi mdzad// bcom ldan khyod ni rtag par thams cad la//
399a6(mdo sde): rnam pa kun tu thams cad stsol grags na// bdag la mthong ba tsam stsal bas// de phyir bdag ni shin tu skal dman lags// yon tan ldan zhing nyes pa sel mdzad pa/
399a7(mdo sde): blo bzang 'gro kun skyob par brtson gyur na// bdag blo khyod la mngon du zhen na yang // 'phongs pas gdungs pa nyid du ci phyir gyur// thugs rje'i bdag nyid ldan pa khyod kyi ni//
399a8(mdo sde): pad ma lta bu'i lha'i spyan gnyis kyis// 'gro la phan par mdzad kyang bdag sdug par// ma gzigs pa ni kye ma sdug bsngal lo// khyod kyi 'jigs pa dbugs 'byin
399b1(mdo sde): mdzad pa yi// phyag gi pad ma ring du rtag skyong yang // bdag skal nyes pa'i tshabs de yang ni// thag ring du ni mi snang nyid du gyur// khyod kyi snyan ni ma nyams gtsang ba
399b2(mdo sde): dag/ gnyis kyis kyang ni lus la sdug bsngal gyis// gzir te spyan sngar 'o dod 'bod 'gyur ba// dman pa bdag ni ci phyir gsan ma gyur// rnam pa kun tu rjes drangs
399b3(mdo sde): khyod kyis ni// dmyal bar song ba'i 'gro ba'ang bde mdzad na// sdig can bdag la bcom ldan 'das kyis ni// thugs rjed yang brtse ba mi mang gyur// 'jig rten dman
399b4(mdo sde): la phan par mdzad pa yi// khyod la gzhon nu'i rol pa 'di mnga' na// gang 'di bdag ni sdug bsngal gyis gzir kyang // bskyob par mi mdzad sdig can bsam pa'i nyes/
399b5(mdo sde): 'di na sdug bsngal skal chen gang yin zhing // klan gang gi phun sum tshogs zad gyur ces// de ltar rnam par rgyu zhing skyob mdzad kyang // bdag 'phongs ma gzigs skye
399b6(mdo sde): ma'o ngo mtshar che// gang zhig la ni tshig sbyin gang zhig la// 'phral du phun tshogs rgya chen sbyin bya zhes// de ltar rtson pa'i khyod kyi mkhyen rab kyis// ci'i phyir na bdag la
399b7(mdo sde): skyob mi mdzad// khyod la dad par gyur pa su mi bde// khyod dang bsod nams dman pa gang zhig mchis// bdag ni khyod la dad kyang sdug bsngal bar// ci phyir gyur ces ngo
399b8(mdo sde): mtshar rnam par 'khrungs// sdug bsngal gcad mdzad sman pa chen po ni// gal te khyod kyang bdag la spong mdzad na// bsod nams bcom pa dag ni gzhan su la// skyabs/
400a1(mdo sde): su mchi bar bgyi ba khyod kyis gsungs// 'gro la rtag tu bu cig 'dra ba yi// brtse ba'i thugs rje mnga' zhing bsgrol spyod pa// khyod/
400a2(mdo sde): kyang gal te bdag gnod mi sel na// de tshe bdag ni mgon med bcom pa lags// bcom khyod ni dran pa tsam gyis kyang // 'gro la 'bras bu mnyam med kun stsol na//
400a3(mdo sde): bdag gi bsnyen bkur bgyid cing brgyab phyogs shing // rnam pa kun tu phyir shol ci phyir mdzad// de ltar smre gsol ba yis khyod yon tan// cha tsam brjod las bdag gi
