400a4(mdo sde): dge ba bsags// gang yin des ni bsod nams ye shes dag/ rgya chen rang bzhin grub pa'i bum pa bzang // brlan yid bzhin grub pa lta bu dang // zhabs gnyis
400a5(mdo sde): rgya ba'i dpag bsam shing 'dra ba'i// khyod kyi gzhon nu'i gzugs su bdag gyur cing // skye ba kun tu bdag po nyid gyur cig/ rje btsun 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi snying
400a6(mdo sde): rje la bstod pa rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po pan ding d+h+wa dza rA da na da dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsha ba ban de rin bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab
400a7(mdo sde): pa'o// @#// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya lo gi shwa ra s+ya b+hu pa tra ya sta ba/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
400a8(mdo sde): gi sa gsum gyis bstod pa// mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten bla ma sa gsum gyis phyag byas// lha dbang tshangs pa mchog gis bstod pa ste//
400b1(mdo sde): thub mchog rgyal po myur du dngos grub stsol// spyan ras gzigs mgon mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// bde gshegs rang bzhin bdud rtsi'i ngo bo 'chang // sna tshogs
400b2(mdo sde): mtshan gyis spras pa'i sku lus mchog/ bde gshegs 'od dpag med pa'i dbu rgyan can// gser gyi pad mas g.yon pa'i phyag brgyan pa// dri med ral pa 'phyir nag
400b3(mdo sde): cung zad ser// zla ba'i dbyings 'dra gsal zhing rdzogs pa'i zhal// pad ma ltar yangs mchog tu mdzes pa'i spyan// 'khur ba gangs kyi dum bu lta bur dkar// ri dgas
400b4(mdo sde): rgyal po dag bzhin zhal sgros dmar// nyi ma 'char kha ltar dmar rtsod kyi mdog/ pad ma gzhon nu lta bur mchu dmar la// ston ka'i sprin tshogs lta bu'i sgra sgrogs pa/
400b5(mdo sde): dpung gnyis sna tshogs mtshan gyis mdzes pa ste// phyag 'thil pad ma gzhon nu lta bur 'jam// ri dgas lpags pa sku'i stod na mnabs// snyan gnyis rna brgyan g.yo zhing
400b6(mdo sde): mdzes pa mnga'// phyag ni yangs shing lte ba zab pa ste// pad+ma dri ma med pa lta bu lags// gser mchog sku regs nor bu'i rgyan ldan pa// na bza' mdzes pas sku'i smad
400b7(mdo sde): brgyan pa// rgyal ba'i ye shes rgya mtsho'i pha rol byon// bsod nams du ma las ni 'khrungs pa'i mchog/ rims dang nad 'joms bde ba mchog bskyed pa// srid pa
400b8(mdo sde): thar mdzad mkha' la rgyu ba dang // kun tu rgyu bas sku mchog la bstod pa// bdud ris sna tshogs stobs ni nges par 'joms// zhabs mchog rkang gdub mchog gi
401a1(mdo sde): sgra sgrogs la// glang po dregs dang ngang pa'i stabs su gshegs// bdud rtsi chen po thugs chud yongs rdzogs brnyes/
401a2(mdo sde): gser bzhin rtag tu dgyes pa'i brgyan mnga' ba// ri bo gru 'dzin na ni dgyes par bzhugs// / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la sa gsum gyis
401a3(mdo sde): bstod pa/ dge slong mas mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// @#// rgya gar skad du/ ba ra trar ha pa ra Ne b+ha ga ba te bud+d+ha stad te/ mur
401a4(mdo sde): d+ha a bi she ko na ma/ bod skad du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa/ bsngags par 'os pa bsngags pa las phyag 'tshal ba zhes bya ba// bcom ldan khyod ni
401a5(mdo sde): zhal bzhugs tshe// bdag ni dad dbang gzhol gyur pa// gang slad thugs rjes brlan pa yi// sangs rgyas spyan gyis gzigs mdzad pa// khyod kyis thugs rje de nyid ni//
401a6(mdo sde): yid la mchis mngon bgyis nas// phyag bgyi 'os pa khyod la bdag/ mngon sum bzhin du phyag 'tshal lo// kun mkhyen ma lags gang gis kyang // kun mkhyen khyod sku
401a7(mdo sde): ji ltar rtogs// bdag nyid tshe rgyas bdag nyid kyis// mkhyen pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di lags 'di 'dra'o zhes bgyir khyod// bdag 'dra ba yi yum ma lags//
401a8(mdo sde): gang lags gang 'dra'ang mi sngo ste// khyod 'dra ba la phyag 'tshal lo// mgon po khyod ni nyid dang 'dra// rgyal rnams ci 'dra khyod dang 'dra// gang 'dra gzhan 'ga' 'ang ma
401b1(mdo sde): mchis pa// de 'dra'ang khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// ji ltar khyod ni nyid kyis mkhyen// ji ltar khyod ni khyod 'dras mkhyen// ji ltar khyod gzhan ma 'tshal ba// de 'dra/
401b2(mdo sde): khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// ji ltar khyod ni bdag nyid kyis// thugs rje stobs bcu la sogs kyi// yon tan rnams kyis bsgrags mdzad pa// de 'dra khyod la phyag 'tsha'o//
401b3(mdo sde): 'di las bzung ste khyod kyi ni// yon tan 'byung gnas snying po dag/ de nyid las ni mngon btul nas// ci nus khyod la phyag 'tshal bgyi'o// dgra bcom khyod la phyag
401b4(mdo sde): 'tshal 'dud// mchod 'os khyod la phyag 'tshal 'dud// rigs pa khyod la phyag 'tshal 'dud// khyod la 'dud cing phyag 'tshal lo// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen
401b5(mdo sde): te// rin chen chos kyi rang bzhin lags// dge 'dun rin chen 'byung gnas te// rin chen gsum tshogs khyod la 'dud// sku'i gzugs ni rin chen te// thugs kyi
401b6(mdo sde): dgongs pa'ang rin chen lags// dam chos rin chen 'byung gnas te// kun nas rin chen khyod la 'dud// rin chen kun gyi mchog gyur pas// rin chen thams cad
401b7(mdo sde): zil gyis gnon// rin chen kun gyi 'byung gnas pa// yang dag rin chen khyod la 'dud// phyag 'tshal rin chen sku khyod la// phyag 'tshal rin chen thugs khyod la/
401b8(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal rin chen chos khyod lo// phyag 'tshal thams cad rin chen la// sred med sgom pa goms mdzad pa// thub pa kun gyi mchog gyur pa/ phyag 'gyir 'os pa
402a1(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa// khyod la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// 'gal bar bgyis pa ma lags pa// yang dag mtha' la gnas pa'o// dge/
402a2(mdo sde): sbyong gi ni mthar phyin pa// bla med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rnam pa thams cad phun tshogs pas// mdzes pa gzhan kun zil gnon cing // dus rnams kun tu dga' mdzad
402a3(mdo sde): bas// sangs rgyas pad+ma khyod la 'dud// kha dog bzang la dri zhim zhing // blta na sdug la mi nI ba// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma dkar// kha bye khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//
402a4(mdo sde): bde ba'i snying ku rab sbyangs pa// bzhed dgur reg pa brnyes pa po// skyid par bskrun pa'i dge sbyong ni// rab gzhon khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// 'o brgyal 'bras bu mchis
402a5(mdo sde): gyur pa// mthar phyin mtha' dag brnyes nas ni// dam pa bzung bar dam bcas pa'i// dge sbyong khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// tshangs spyod rten cing rig byed dang // rig
402a6(mdo sde): byed kun gyi yan lag mkhyen// rig dang zhabs kyis bsangs pa yi// tshangs pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa'i chos ni mi 'phrogs shing // 'phags pa'i
402a7(mdo sde): 'phrin las phul du byung // 'jig rten slob dpon bya ba mdzad// 'phags pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// thugs ni dka' thub brtul zhugs dang // yang dag blangs
402a8(mdo sde): khas gtsang mar mdzad// sdig pa thams cad bkrus gyur pa// khrus mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// mnga' bdag mchog ni brnyes gyur cing // sems can
402b1(mdo sde): thams cad zil gyis gnon// seng ge'i nga ro sgrogs mdzad pa// seng ge khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rtogs pa brjod pa'i rjen shul che// dam chos spong la brten
402b2(mdo sde): pa mdzad// chos gzhan thams cad 'jig pa po// glang chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// chos nyid shin tu dkar ba'i lam// khyod min gzhan gyi min bzod pa// gsal
402b3(mdo sde): mdzad gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi// las gyur khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// des na shin du dul gyur bzod// shugs dang mdog bzang stobs dang ldan// yan lag rdzogs
402b4(mdo sde): pa'i sku mnga' ba// cang mkhyen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// phyogs dang 'bab stegs spyod yul mkhyen// brtan la gya gyur gzhud mi mngar// khyu mchog gnas ni brnyes pa yi//
402b5(mdo sde): khyu mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// gdul ba'i thabs ni mtha' dag la// mkhas shing le lo mi mnga' ba// skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur// mchog rab khyod la phyag 'tshal
402b6(mdo sde): lo// gang slad khyod brten ma mchis na// skal ba can yang don ma mchis// de slad kun gyi tshangs spyod du// gyur pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// yon tan phun sum ldan pa kun//
402b7(mdo sde): yang dag shin tu yongs rdzogs pas// dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa kun// rgyan bcad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// nyid kyi don ni ring rdzogs shing // gzhan gyi don mngon brtson pa//
402b8(mdo sde): dam chos bdud rtsi gsol ba po// tshim par mdzad pa khyod la 'dud// 'jigs pa du mas 'jigs gyur pa// pha rol min pa'i mun spangs nas// chu bo chen po las rgal cing //
403a1(mdo sde): pha rol gshegs pa khyod la 'dud// nyon mongs nad ni kun sel cing // zug rngu thams cad 'byin mdzad pa// rig sngags 'chang /
403a2(mdo sde): ba grub pa po// sman pa'i gtso bo khyod la 'dud// mchog dang mchog min lam mkhyen cing // zhi ba'i phyogs ni ston par mdzad// grub dang bde bskyed pa yi// ded
403a3(mdo sde): dpon khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rtag tu mun pa sel mdzad cing // rtag tu spyan ni 'byed par mdzad// rtag tu mi brnyel chos mnga' ba// shin tu bzhengs pa khyod la 'dud//
403a4(mdo sde): dri ma'i 'dam ni nges bkrus nas// dam chos dri ma med pa'i chu// mchog tu rnam par byang ba po// shin tu rnam dag khyod la 'dud// sdig dang bsod nams spangs gyur cing //
403a5(mdo sde): stong pa nyid kyis bgos pa'i bdag/ phan dang gnod pa bgyid sgom pa// shin tu chags bral khyod la 'dud// kun nas nyon mongs bag chags kun// des pas stsal
403a6(mdo sde): bas dri med thugs// rnam thar sgrib pa mi mnga' ba// shin tu rnam grol khyod la 'dud// blta bas mi ngoms gzugs mnga' zhing // sku ni 'od kyi lhag ger mdzes/
403a7(mdo sde): blta bya kun gyi nang na ni// blta na sdug mchog khyod la 'dud// skyes bu chen po'i mtshan rnams ni// dpe byad bzang po'i tshogs bcas pa// sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa la/
403a8(mdo sde): blta bar 'os pa khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas chos ni bla med pa// mi 'jigs dang stobs bstsogs kyis// 'gro ba'i nang du sgra sgrogs pa// dga' bar 'os pa khyod la
403b1(mdo sde): 'dud// 'phags chos dkar po la med pa// goms par bya ba rnams kyis ni// sku gnyis po dag bsgom gyur pa// bsgom par bya ba khyod la 'dud// sku gsung thugs kyi/
403b2(mdo sde): 'phrin las rnams// shin tu rnam par byang gyur pas// tshul khrims bsrung ba las 'das pa// gtsang sbra dag pa khyod la 'dud// nyon mongs pa yi brjod pa spangs// zhi
403b3(mdo sde): ba'i las kyi mtha' la dgongs// mi gsung dang du bzhes mdzad pa// thub pa zhi ba khyod la 'dud// bde ba dang ni sdug bsngal gyis// thugs mi phyogs pa brtan pa'i thug/
403b4(mdo sde): thams cad zil gnon sems can gyi// snying po mchog gyur khyod la 'dud// kun la rnam pa thams cad dang // rten gyis blo dang dgongs pa dang // legs par gnas phyir
403b5(mdo sde): mi rnyel ba'i// chos can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten 'das kyi yon tan phyug/ 'jig rten zang zing rnam par 'jig/ 'jig rten snang bar mdzad pa po// 'jig
403b6(mdo sde): rten mgon po khyod la 'dud// bshes dang dgra dang pha mA snyoms// sems can kun la phan dgongs pas// rjes su brtse bar mdzad pa po// thugs rje chen po khyod la 'dud//
403b7(mdo sde): chos kyi 'du shes kun rdzogs pa// skyob pa mngon shes chen po mnga'// byas mkhyen ma byas mkhyen pa po// thams cad mkhyen pa khyod la 'dud// glags kyi skabs ni kun
403b8(mdo sde): spangs shing // kun nas 'ching ba bcad gyur pa// shes rab gsal bar mdzad pa bo// sred pa bsal ba khyod la 'dud// mnyes par bgyi 'os phyag bgyis 'os//
404a1(mdo sde): rgal bar 'os min nongs mi mnga'// 'bad de mchod par bgyi 'os pa// rig pa gsum ldan khyod la 'dud// phan pa ma lags sel
404a2(mdo sde): mkhas shing // phan pa bskyed par mngon rtson pa// cig pu rtse bar gzhol ba yi// bshes gnyen dam pa khyod la 'dud// skye dgu lam log zhugs pa rnams// rtag tu
404a3(mdo sde): dam pa'i lam la ni// mngon phyogs mdzad par mngon rtson pa/ rtsa lag dam pa khyod la 'dud// go 'phang mkhyen pa rnams kyi phul// khyod kyis go 'phang gang brnyes
404a4(mdo sde): nas// rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog gyur pa// de las go 'phang 'phags ma mchis// go 'phang bla na med brnyes nas// sdug bsngal thams cad sel mdzad cing /
404a5(mdo sde): ma chags nye bar len mi mnga'// rkang gnyis mchog gyur khyod la 'dud// khyod kyi brtan la ma brten par// 'gas kyang de nyid mi mthong bas// 'jig rten long ba lta bu
404a6(mdo sde): yi/ mig tu gyur pa khyod la 'dud// sa steng gdugs ni ma mchis na// zhugs mchis mar me'ang mchis gyur la// rgyu skar nor bu zla ba dag/ mchis kyang gsal ba rdzogs
404a7(mdo sde): mi 'gyur// snang ba de dang gzhan dang ni// de bas khyad par ches 'phags pa// mchis kyang khyod ni mi bzhugs na// 'gro ba snang ba mchis ma lags// de ltas 'jig
404a8(mdo sde): rten ma rig pa'i// mun nag 'thibs pa'i ling tog gis// bsgribs pa'i sems ldan smag gyur pa'i// sgron mar gyur pa khyod la 'dud// chos blo gros ma byung ba/
404b1(mdo sde): phan pa'ang phan par ma 'tshal zhing // gnod pa'ang gnod par ma 'tshal ba// byang ba'ang khyod la rten nas 'gyur// byis pa phal cher gnod pa dag/ dor bar 'tshal ba phan//
404b2(mdo sde): pa spong // phan pa gnyer yang ma 'tshal bas// gnod pa so so sten par bgyid// de dag thabs ni ston mdzad phyir// khyod la brten nas gnyi ga yang // yang dag ji
404b3(mdo sde): bzhin rtogs 'gyur bas// sman par gyur pa khyod la 'dud// gtso khyod gang gi slar gyur pa// de yang 'jig rten bla ma lags// de slad bla ma rnams kyi yang // blar
404b4(mdo sde): gyur bla ma khyod la 'dud// 'jig rten mkhas pas mchod pa yang // yid ches ngo bo khyod la mchod// mchod 'os rnams kyis mchod bya ba// mchod 'os dam pa khyod la
404b5(mdo sde): 'dud// bsngags 'os bsngags pa gang lags pa'i// skye bo des kyang khyod bsngags te// bsngags par 'os pa rnams kyis kyang // bsngags par bgyi ba khyod la 'dud//
404b6(mdo sde): lha rnams kyang ni khyod la 'dud// khyod la drang srong rnams kyang 'dud// phyag bgyir 'os pa rnams kyis kyang // gdud par bgyi ba khyod la 'dud// sems can dang bcas
404b7(mdo sde): su zhig ni// bsod nams zhing ni dpag med pa// bdud 'os khyod la phyag bgyid pa// nam zhig na ni ngom par 'gyur// de ltas khyod la phyag 'tshal 'dud// gdung pa
404b8(mdo sde): 'os pa khyod la 'dud// phyag gi rgyun ni mi chad par// rtag tu khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rtag tu dam pa'i spyod pa mdzad pa lam dang ldan// byas dang ma byas thob pa
405a1(mdo sde): yang dag rig pa mkhyen// mchod pa che mnga' phyag bgyir 'os pa mtshungs med pa// gdud par 'os pa'i dgra bcom khyod la
405a2(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo// dpe byad yid 'ong sku mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// mchog tu gsung snyan mngon sgrogs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// dri med rnam dag thugs mnga' khyod
405a3(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal lo// yon tan tshogs bsgoms bdag nyid khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// zhing shis bsam pas sangs rgyas la 'dud pa// dri ma med la bkra shis thams cad kyis//
405a4(mdo sde): char yang mi phod mchod sbyin kun gyi min// dka' thub brtul zhugs min te khrus kun min// thub pa'i dbang po la rab 'dud pa// snyan pa grags shing dpal du byed// sdig
405a5(mdo sde): pa thams cad drungs nas 'byin// gzi brjid dag kyang rnam par 'phel// dgra rnams thams cad sel bar byed// 'jig rten dag na mi rnams kyi// rgyud ni bde 'gror
405a6(mdo sde): nges byed cing // nges mthar zhi ba'i 'bras bur sbyin// de ltar yon tan mang bsams shing // lus kyang 'jig pa'i ngang bsams na// mkhas gang sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal
405a7(mdo sde): las// lus kyi lus gzhan spyod par byed// 'chi bdag sel bar byed pa yi// bstan pa 'di ni nub gyur cing // kun nas mun pas khebs gyur na// gang zhig la ni
405a8(mdo sde): bkur bsti bya// de lta bas na mtshungs med pa'i// mchod pa bya ba myur te bgyi// ma 'ongs pa'i 'jigs pa dag/ da lta nyid nas byung zin to//
405b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa bsngags pa/ bsngags par 'os pa bsngags pa las/ phyag 'tshal ba zhes bya ba rdzogs s+ho//
405b2(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du// ba ra Na ra ha bar ne b+ha ga ba to bud+d+ha stad te/ sar rbad nya ta sid d+hi ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
405b3(mdo sde): la bstod pa/ bsngags par 'os pa bsngags pa las/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid grub pa zhes bya ba// nyi ma'i gnyen gyur nyi ma yi// 'od pas shin tu 'od gsal ba//
405b4(mdo sde): phyag pa kun gyi rab dang mchog/ phyag 'os phyag bgyis khyod la 'dud// stobs chen dpa' bo chen po pa// mngon shes che la mthu yang che// g.yul cher mda' chen 'phen
405b5(mdo sde): mdzad pa// dga' ston chen po khyod la 'dud// 'jig rten na khyod mchod 'os mchog/ mchod pa'i snod ni bla med pa// mchod par 'os pa khyod la mchod// mchod dang
405b6(mdo sde): mkhyen pas rtogs pa brnyes// dgongs pa nga rgyal bag mi mnga'// brjed 'os khyod la nga rgyal gyi// sems bor nas ni brjed par bgyi// gus bgyid ma bgyid la btang
405b7(mdo sde): snyoms// 'jig rten bkur bas mchod bgyis pa// khyod la bkur bstir gzhol ba yi// dbang pos gus par bkur bsti bgyid// khyod dang 'dra ba 'ga' ma mchis//
405b8(mdo sde): lhag pa ma byung 'byung mi 'gyur// de slad sems can kun la khyod// dgra zun snyoms pa'i mnyam med lags// ma 'dres 'phags pa'i bdud las byung // sangs rgyas
406a1(mdo sde): kun dang bskal ba mnyam// mdog dang shes rab snang ba yis// phyogs rnams snang bar mdzad de 'khrungs// sum cu rtsa gnyis
406a2(mdo sde): mtshan dang ldan// 'dom gang 'od kyi 'od zer sla// mtshan dang 'thun pa'i dpe byad bzang // brgyad cus 'bar ba'i gzi brjid can// rgya chen dpal dang ldan pa'i
406a3(mdo sde): sku/ kun gyis mdzes pa'i zil gnon pa// 'jig rten snang bar mdzad nas ni// nyi ma gzhan zhig lta bur bzhugs// bcom ldan dus kun rtogs pa'i chos/
406a4(mdo sde): rnam kun 'byung gnas thams can ni// phyag mthil skyu ru ra lta bur// khyod kyi thugs kyi spyod yul 'gyur// chos rnams g.yo dang mi g.yor bcas// gcig dang sna
406a5(mdo sde): tshogs so so la// mkha' la rlung dag rgyu ba bzhin// khyod kyi thugs ni thogs mi mnga'// bya ba mdzad pa khyod kyis ni// ji ltar thugs bskyed tsam gyis su// khyod la
406a6(mdo sde): bzhed dgur kun 'grub pa// de ltar chos dbyings legs thugs chud// dge mthar phyin pa khyod la ni// sbyor byung dge ba mga' mi mnga'// khyod ni gang zhig
406a7(mdo sde): bzhed na yang // bzhed pa tsam la rag las so// chos rnams kyi ni chos yod dang // chos nyid dang ni chos kyi mthu// so sor rgyud dang bcas gnas shing // rkyen
406a8(mdo sde): dang 'bras bu bcas pa dag/ khams dang dbye ba tha dad bcas// skye dang 'jig bcas rgyas pa de// thams cad so sor rnam kun tu// kun mkhyen khyod kyis
406b1(mdo sde): mkhyen gang min// khyod la shin tu bsgrubs pa'ang mngon// shin tu ring ba'ang mngon// shin tu ring ba'ang nye ba ste// shin tu 'dzings pa'ang sal gyis dag/
406b2(mdo sde): shin tu 'thon po'ang dma' ba lags// shin tu mnan pa'ang snang bar bcas// shin tu the tsom gnas kyang nges// shes bya shin tu zab mo yang // khyod la sa
406b3(mdo sde): ler gda' ba lags// dbang po che'i glang chen gyi// rkyed chings gser las bgyis pa ltar// chos nyid shin tu zab mos kyang // khyod 'o brgyal 'gyur ma lags//
406b4(mdo sde): chos kyi nang na chags bral ltar// nges 'byin nang na drang po ltar// phun tshogs nang na sangs rgyas ltar// khyod ni sems can kun gyi mchog/ rnam grol nang na
406b5(mdo sde): mi g.yo ltar// rigs pa'i nang na chos nyid ltar// shes rab nang na ka na mkhyen ltar// khyod ni lus can kun gyi mchog/ dag pa'i nang na rnam grol ltar// de nyid
406b6(mdo sde): nang na stong pa ltar// dka' thub nang na bzod pa ltar// khyod ni srog chags kun gyi mchog/ gzugs kyi nang na khyod skra ltar// sems can nang na khyod thugs ltar
406b7(mdo sde): chos kyi nang na khyod chos ltar// khyod ni srog chags kun gyi mchog// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa/ bsngags par 'os pa bsngags pa las/
406b8(mdo sde): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid grub pa zhes bya ba rdzogs s+ho// / @#// rgya gar skad du/ bar Na ra \u0f7f bar tshebla ga brko
407a1(mdo sde): bud+d+ha s+yAd tre pa la bai sha rad d+ya ska pa na ma/ bod skad du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa/ bsngags par 'os/
407a2(mdo sde): pa bsngags pa las/ stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la bstod pa zhes bya ba// bde bar gshegs pa khyod cig pu// chos gcig chos kun snang mdzad pa/
407a3(mdo sde): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa yis// de dang ldan gyi gzhan ma lags// khyod 'ba' shig gi ye shes kyis// shes bya mtha' dag khyab lags kyis//
407a4(mdo sde): khyod las gzhan pa thams cad ni// shes bya khyod ni lhag pa lags// rgyu rkyen 'di las 'bras bu 'di// 'di las 'di ni ma yin zhes// gnas dang gnas
407a5(mdo sde): min nges pa kun// khyod kyis mkhyen gyi gzhan gyis min// las chos yang dag blangs pa yi// rnam smin dus ni thams cad pa// sa kun rtogs pa thams
407a6(mdo sde): cad ni// rnam kun khyod mkhyen gzhan gyis min// rnam 'byor sa ni ma lus sa// kun nas nyon mongs rnam gzhag dang // rnam par byang bcas zab mor
407a7(mdo sde): bcas// khyod cig kho nar thugs su chud// dbang po mchog dang mchog min pa// chung dang 'bring dang chen po dag/ rma shas dbye bas mtha' yas pa// khyod
407a8(mdo sde): las gzhan gyis rtogs ma mchis// 'thun par gyur pa gang lags dang // mi 'thun gyur pa gang lags pa// mi'i mos pa sna tshogs kun// khyod cig kho
407b1(mdo sde): nas thugs su chud// 'jig rten 'di khams sna tshogs te// sna tshogs khams nyid mtha' dag ni// sna tshogs khams dbye khyod cig pus// mkhyen gyi
407b2(mdo sde): gzhan gyis ma lags so// rgyu dang rkyen ni sna tshogs las// sna tshogs mngon par 'grub pa ni// kun tu 'gro ba'i lam stobs kyi// thams cad khyod kyis
407b3(mdo sde): thugs su chud// bzod med srid par byung ba dang // tha ma med pa 'byung 'gyur gang // de la khyod kyi ye shes ni// mngon sum bzhin du gzigs pa 'jug/
407b4(mdo sde): sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha'// 'jig rten yang dag 'grub pa dang // de bzhin nying mtshams sbyor ba ni/ mtha' yi bar bzhin khyod kyis gzigs/
407b5(mdo sde): nye 'am yang na ring yang dag/ ji ltar khyod la mngon sum pa// de ltar sgrib pa bag chags dang // bcas te khyod kyis spangs pa lags// dngos 'di yod/
407b6(mdo sde): su ma mkhyen cing // nyon mongs pa'i bag chags ni// lhag ma lus shes mi snyan pa'i// go 'phang de ni khyod kyis brnyes// khyod kyis bar du gcod gsungs
407b7(mdo sde): gang // nges par de dag bar du gcod// khyod kyis lam bstan gang lags pa// de cig kho nar nges par 'byin// de yis par gcod mi nus she 'am// de
407b8(mdo sde): yis nges 'byin mi 'gyur zhes// gzhan gyi sran ka cha shas kyang // de la srid pa ma mchis so// khyod kyis rgyal 'gyi ma rgyal min// shes bya ma snang bgyis/
408a1(mdo sde): ma mchis/ dbang phyug khyod nyid kun mkhyen cing // kun rgyal lags kyi gzhan ma lags// stobs ldan 'jigs mi
408a2(mdo sde): 'gyur bas khyod// mi bsnyengs gang lags rigs lags na// mthu mnga' bzhin du 'ga' la yang // khyad du mi gsod gang de rmad// log pa'i nga rgyal can 'ga'
408a3(mdo sde): zhig/ dregs dang bral bar mdzad pa gang // gdul ba yi ni thabs tsam ste// de na stobs skems yod ma lags// 'jig rten dag na stobs ldan pas// kun las
408a4(mdo sde): rgyal zhes gang brjod pa// de ni gzhan la bstod pa bas// go 'phang de ni khyod la rdzogs// 'dren pas khyod la chos 'thun par// 'gas kyang brgal bar nus ma
408a5(mdo sde): legs// klan ka btsal 'os ma lags te// nongs mi mnga' ba'i bde ba brnyes// nongs ni mnga' bas gang las kyang // bzhi ni bsrung bar bgyi mi 'tshal// bzhi po
408a6(mdo sde): yongs su rdzogs slad du// khyod la sus kyang grags mi thod// kun la mi thogs blo gros can// dgongs pa kun tu nye bar gnas// kun las thugs rjes snyoms pa po// /
408a7(mdo sde): thugs ni kun la chags mi mnga'// shes bya'i rgya mtsho kun dgal ba// bag chags thams cad gtan nas blangs// bar chad kun gyi khyad par mkhyen//
408a8(mdo sde): nges par 'byin pa kun la mkhas// kun gyi bsam pa mkhyen pa po// gdul thabs kun gyi pha rol gshegs// nyon mongs sna tshogs thams cad kyi// gnyen
408b1(mdo sde): bo la yang snyengs mi mnga'// khyod la rten nas smrab po// byis pa shed bye ma gyur gang // de ni ma rig mun pa yi// tshang tshing mi zad mthu lags so// khyod kyi/
408b2(mdo sde): bka' la rten nas kyang // bral bar ma gyur gang lags pa// de dang de sgrib mi zad lags// // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa/ bsngags
408b3(mdo sde): par 'os pa bsngags pa las/ stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la bstod pa zhes bya ba rdzogs s+ho//
408b4(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du/ ba ra Na ra ha ba ra Ne b+ha ga ba to bud+d+ha stod tre pa ga bi shud+d+hi sto pa nA ma/ bod skad du// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa/ bsngags
408b5(mdo sde): par 'os pa bsngags pa las/ gsung rnam par dag pa la bstod pa zhes bya ba// ji ltar thub pa khyod kyi bka'// nye migs brjod ldan thos pa ltar// 'khor ba'i
408b6(mdo sde): sdug bsngal mi bzad pa'i// me yis kun tu sbar kyang ni// 'gro ba mi shes go bgos pa// de ltar skyo bar 'gyur ma lags// de ltas mgon po khyod kyi bka'/
408b7(mdo sde): mngon sum pas kyang don bsal bar// chos nyid zab mo gting yas pa// bshad pas sa ler gyur lags pas// khyod kyi bka' ni bsgyel zhi yi// cho 'phrul dag kyang
408b8(mdo sde): mdzad pa lags// tshig gi mtha' ni mi mthong zhing // don gyi gting yang mi dpogs la// phan tshun rjes su zhugs pa ni// de las la mtshan che ci mchis// smra ba'i
409a1(mdo sde): dam pa khyod kyi bka'// rnam grangs du nyid ma mchis shing // zlos bu yang ni ma mchis la// sbyar ba'i lugs kyang rig pa lags/
409a2(mdo sde): smra ba'i dam pa khyod kyi bka'// gnas pa bzhi'i yon tan ldan// lung bstan bzhi'i rten gyur kyang // don du gnyis su gyur ma mchis// gnang ba dang ni dgas pa la//
409a3(mdo sde): khyod bka' la lar gcig tu nges// la lar nges pa ma lags la// phan tshun 'gal ba'ang ma mchis so// chos kyi de nyid ston slad du// rtsod pa med pa'i go 'phang bzhi//
409a4(mdo sde): rigs 'thad yon tan bzang po yis// ngan smra thams cad sun 'byin pa// gcig tu don dam la gzhol la// kun rdzob la yang skyon ma mchis// bden pa gnyis
409a5(mdo sde): kyang mi 'gal bas// khyod kyi bka' ni rigs par 'byung // nyon mongs med la cig pu 'jam// nyon mongs can la nges brlang yang // khyod kyi bka' ni bsnyen
409a6(mdo sde): pa dang // bsring ba'i skyon dang ldan ma lags// rnam par byang ba'i rjes 'thun la// de'i phyogs su lhung mi mnga'// kun nas nyon mongs dgrar gyur la// mi
409a7(mdo sde): bzod mi mnga' khyod kyi bka'// smon pa'i tshig ni rgyas gang yang // phyar ka gtong ba'i skyon ldan min// rab tu bsngags pa'i tshig phyud kyang // mga' la'ang
409a8(mdo sde): brten pa mnga' ma lags// bsnan dang dor ba mi mnga' la// bsdus dang rgyas pa dang yang ldan// rtag cing 'thad par 'gyur lags la// dang po nas kyang mi
409b1(mdo sde): bzang min// shin tu snyan gsung chags mi 'gyur// mang la snying po ma mchis min// sna tshogs pa la don ma 'khrugs// bka' ni ngo mtshar mang po lags
409b2(mdo sde): gsung gi bdag po khyod kyi bka'// yid 'phrog mdzad la zhen mi mnga'// gzi byin can la gnod mi 'gyur// khyad la ngan pas rdzogs ma lags// ba spu
409b3(mdo sde): ngag kyang ldang bgyid cing // rdul yang kun tu 'thon par bgyid// lus rnams dag ni ston bgyid cing // 'dar ba dag kyang skyed par bgyid// lha'i 'jig rten
409b4(mdo sde): skyo bgyid cing // sgra yang kun tu sgrogs par bgyid// sa ni rnal mar gnas pa yang // rnam pa drug tu g.yo bar bgyid// bzod med dus nas goms pa yi//
409b5(mdo sde): lus can rang bzhin bzlog mdzad cing // rang bzhin 'dris pa ma lags pa// gzhan ni snying la 'jog par mdzad// rang gi nyes pas mi 'ga' la// yid ni
409b6(mdo sde): gdung bar bgyid dang 'dra// rigs par zhugs pa mkhas rnams la// bdud rtsi'i char pa bab pa bzhin// khyod kyi bka' ni thog ma dang // bar dang tha mar dge
409b7(mdo sde): ba dag/ thos dang bsam dang sgom pa ni// de sgrub pa la bdud rtsir gyur// mos pa du ma dang ldan pa// mang po 'khod par gyur pa la// gsung gcig bka' ni
409b8(mdo sde): stsal pa las// du ma lta bur snang gyur te// kun gyis 'di ni bdag gi ched// kho na'i sum du go ba gang // de las ya mtshan che ci mchis// chos nyid 'dor
410a1(mdo sde): bar mi mdzad la// 'jig rten kun rdzob dang yang 'thun// rjes su sgrogs par mdzad bzhin du// cig shos rnam pa sgom
410a2(mdo sde): pa mdzad// kun nas nyon mongs rnam byang mchis// las dang las kyi 'bras bu'ang mchis// de ldan byed du 'jug pa dang // byed po ma mchis khyod kyi bka'// /
410a3(mdo sde): de ni lha dang mir bcas pa'i// 'jig rten dag gis sngon thos nas// nu'i zla ba g.yo ba bzhin// so sor rab tu g.yos par gyur// bzang dang ngan pa nyid du ni//
410a4(mdo sde): 'byung bar 'gyur ba tha dad pa// thams cad rkyen la rag las na// byed po cig mchis gyur ram// 'ga' la rang dbang nyid mchis na// byed por gyur na
410a5(mdo sde): de mi rigs// de lta lags pas chos kun la// byed pa med par khyod kyis gsungs// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la// chos 'di stong pa nyid kyi ni//
410a6(mdo sde): seng ge'i sgra yis brda brdungs na// mtshams gcad bgyis te gnas pa lags// de'i nyi ma'i 'od bzhin du// 'jig rten snang bar bgyis pas na// de las
410a7(mdo sde): gzhan pa'i tshig kun ni// shin tu ci yang ma rung gyur// // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa// bsngags par 'os pa bsngags pa las/
410a8(mdo sde): gsung rnam par dag pa la bstod pa zhes bya ba rdzogs s+ho// / @#// rgya gar skad du/ bar NAr

410b2(mdo sde): rtsod pa mi mnga' bar bstod pa zhes bya ba// chos rnams thams cad bdag med par// 'dus byas thams cad skad cig ma// mya ngan mda' zhi zhes bgyi ba//
410b3(mdo sde): mtshan nyid 'di gsum chos kyi rgya// smra ba kun gyi yul min pa// mi byed khyed kyis gzhag pa mdzad// ji skad brjod kyang 'jig rten na// rang bzhin
410b4(mdo sde): las ni gang zhig 'da'// gal 'dzin pa'i shags la ni// goms par bgyis kyang su zhig gis// me nyid grang ba lta bur ni// de nyid gzhan du bgyi bar
410b5(mdo sde): nus// nam mkha' thogs pa med pa la// 'ga' yi rma phyin 'gyur srid kyi// chos kyi phyag rgya 'di la ni// chos dang 'thun par 'gas ma lags// chos
410b6(mdo sde): kyi de nyid mkhyen khyod kyi// bka' la nag po chen po dag/ bstan pas 'di ni mchis grags kyi// smra ba gzhan la mchis ma lags// tha dad lta la rten pa yis//
410b7(mdo sde): 'jig rten rnams ni rtsod par lhung // khyod ni gcig pu rtsod med pa'i// gnas kyi go 'phang thugs su chud// long ba rnams ni rtsod gyur kyang // mig can
410b8(mdo sde): gzugs rnams mthong ba ni// ji ltar rtsod par mi 'gyur ba// de nyid khyod dang byis pa'i dpe// chos bzhin gsung ba khyod la ni// 'ga' dang ldan cig rtsod
411a1(mdo sde): mi mnga'// legs par smra phyir mkhas dang min// khyad du gsad phyir mi mkhas min// 'dod pa rnams ni mi snang gyur//
411a2(mdo sde): lta ba'i dra ba rab tu bcom// gzhi ma mchis na ci slad khyod// gzhi ma mchis pa'i rtsod par gyur// rgyal thabs rnyes pa khyod lta bu'i// brtan pa ci zhig rtsod pa
411a3(mdo sde): mdzad/ 'od zer stong ldan ro lta bu'i// mun dang lhan cig ci zhig 'gyed// mkha' la lcags gis 'ju ba bzhin// brtsad pas khyod la rdzi mi 'gyur// rlung gi
411a4(mdo sde): bzlog phyogs gtor ba'i rdul// 'tho ba nyid la 'bab cing 'go/ 'jig rten rnams ni brtags par lhung // yang dag ji bzhin spyod yul khyod// de slad phyin ci
411a5(mdo sde): log gyur pa// mang po rnams dang khyod mi mtshungs// dper na lcags dang gser bzhin du// log par mngon par zhen rnams dang // mngon zhen mi mnga' khyod du ni//

411a7(mdo sde): par bas// bdag gis bdag nyid me 'bar ba'i// phreng ba 'khrigs par bor mi bsngo'i// rgyal ba thub pa med pa yi// gzi byin can la rdo mi rung // khyod la
411a8(mdo sde): 'dir brgal dus btab nas// khyod kyis slar gzhan dus btab pa// brtod pa dam pos btags pa bzhin// stan las ldang bar nus ma mchis// khyod kyis
411b1(mdo sde): tshogs par bden smra ba'i// rgol ba'i mche ba bcag pas na// pha rol rgol ba thams cad kyi// rwa yang bcag pa nyid du gyur// pha rol rgol ba kha cig ni// khyod
411b2(mdo sde): dang phrad nas 'dud par bgyid// kha cig thag ring slar ldog ste// gzhan dag spyan sngar zhum nas mchis// kha cig khyod kyis dam pa chos// bdud rtsi'i rgyun
411b3(mdo sde): gyi char phab pas// yang dag bsgrub pa phun sum gyis// dam pa'i chos la brten par bgyid// kye ma mgon po thugs rje'i bdag/ kyi hud gti mug nyon mongs ngam//
411b4(mdo sde): kyi hud sred pa rnam par 'phro// kye hud nga rgyal phung byed pa// dam chos ma yin 'di gsum gyis// skye bo 'di ni kun dkrugs te// mi bzang rgyun gyis bdas pa bzhin// /
411b5(mdo sde): khyod kyi gzhung dang 'gal bar bgyi// 'di'i gzhi yis lta ba dang // the tsom la sogs nye nyon mongs// so sor lam gyi bar gcod pa// kun nas nyon mongs
411b6(mdo sde): thams cad 'phel// ka la ping ka'i skad thos nas// khA ta'i sgra la chags med ltar// khyod kyi chos kyi ro myong nas// gzhan gyi tshig la chags mi 'gyur//
411b7(mdo sde): gang dag chos la rgyu bshams nas// khyod kyi bka' la zhugs gyur pa// ngan ngon thos pa de la'ang de// rnga mos sbrang rtsi bzhin du 'gyur// bden zhing 'gro
411b8(mdo sde): slang don dang ldan// bsam pa dang 'thun cho 'phrul bcas// zad mi shes la mdor bdus la// gcig tu mthu ni chen por ldan// snying po dang ldan ro mchog
412a1(mdo sde): ldan/ rnam grangs ldan zhing thabs dang ldan// yongs su rdzogs la ma 'dres pa// gzi brjid dang ldan grags dang ldan//

412a3(mdo sde): bde yang rung // don dang mi 'gal gang yin pa// de ni yongs su spang bya zhing // bzlog pa brten par bya bar gsungs// 'dod dang mi 'dod bsten pa la// de

412a7(mdo sde): bkus te bor ba'ang min// de ni tshig tsam snying po ste// 'di ni tshig dang tshig don ldan// de yis khyod kyi bka' dang ni// gzhan gyi tshig gi khyad par bshad// bde
412a8(mdo sde): bar gshegs pa khyod dang ni// smra de rnams kyi khyad par gang // de nyid khyod kyi bka' dang ni// gzhan gyi tshig gi 'thon dman lags// ji ltar srid dang thar pa'i

415a1(mdo sde): 'jug pa'i bde ba'i rgyu chos bstan// de nas byang chub brnyes nas ni// phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyang bstan// sangs rgyas
415a2(mdo sde): nas kyang dge ba'i chos// zag bcas de dag ma bshad min// phal cher mya ngan 'das pa yi// rgyu 'thun nyid du yongs su bsngos// khyod kyis gang las
415a3(mdo sde): 'gro ba dag/ ma grangs rgud pa de dag mchis// gang dang 'jig rten ma sprad pa'i// phun tshogs de yang gang zhig mchis// khyod kyis yid gnyis mdud
415a4(mdo sde): pa bcad// lta ba ngan pa'i tsher ma bkrugs// sred pa'i dug gi lug ma bsregs// khro ba'i dug kyang thams cad bcom// ma rig pa yi ling tog bsal//
415a5(mdo sde): nga rgyal gyi ni rgyal mtshan bsgyel// sems can tha ba rnams kyang bcom// rnam par 'ching ba rnam par btubs// mdud pa thams cad rnam par bkrol// chu bo
415a6(mdo sde): la ni gzings kyang bcas// khyod kyang chu bo rnams kyi gzhi// mtsho chen gang lags de yang skams// skyon dang snyings ma yon po dag/ sems la mi mngon
415a7(mdo sde): 'khras bgyid pa// kun nas nyon mongs dug shing gi/ rtsa ba khyod kyis drungs nas phyung // phyin ci log gis 'tshal ba yi// ngan pa'i lam ni thams cad
415a8(mdo sde): bcad// 'chi med bgrod pa cig pa yi// dpal ldan lam ni drang po phye// gzhan dag gdul bgyi ba yi// skyon brgyad las ni nges drangs nas// 'dod pa'i
415b1(mdo sde): yan lag brgyad ldan pa/ cang shes bzang po'i gnas su bkod// kun nas nyon mongs srin 'khrugs pa'i// mi gtsang rgyan nas drangs nas kyang / nyon
415b2(mdo sde): mongs min pa'i yan lag can// dri med chul 'phyo ru stsal// 'chal pa'i tshul khrims skyon bsal nas// tshul khrims kyi ni byug pas byugs// ngo
415b3(mdo sde): tsha shes dang khrel yod pa'i// dri med gos kyis dgab pa mdzad// dam pa chos rgyan dkar po ni// sba ba dag gis rgyan mdzad nas// de dag bsam
415b4(mdo sde): gtan seng ge'i khri// chen po'i rkyen du 'bab la gzhag/ byang chub yan lag me tog ni// zag med dri zhim rnams kyis gtor// chos kyi dga' ba
415b5(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i ros// zang zing med pa'i tshim par mdzad// sred pa'i zan ni 'tshe mang ba// thog ma med pa las bston nas// nyid kyi sras po gtan du ni//
415b6(mdo sde): nyams pa med pa kho nar mdzad// gzhan dag ma 'ongs dus na ni// rang rgyal ba yi snod du mdzad// gzhan dag theg pa chen po yi// rgyal tshab mchog tu
415b7(mdo sde): dbang yang bskur// chos kun gyi ni tshig mkhyen cing // don rnams kun gyi gzhi la mkhas// skad kyi dbye ba kun mkhyen cing // phyogs rnams kun tu spobs
415b8(mdo sde): dang ldan// nga ni mgon med khyed rnams kyi// grogs su gyur pa zhes sgrogs shing // thugs rje chen pos 'gro ba ni// mtha' dag 'khrung pa bzhin du bzhugs//
416a1(mdo sde): ston pa thugs rje rje mnga' ga/ rtse bar ldan zhing thugs rtser mdzad// dad brtson le lo mi mnga' ba// khyod dang 'dra ba
416a2(mdo sde): gzhan su mchis// khyod ni sems can kun gyi mgon// spyi'i rtsa lag bzang po lags// mgon du khyod bzhugs ma 'tshal bas// de slad skye ba bying bar gyur//
416a3(mdo sde): gang zhig yang dag blangs nas ni// tha shal bas kyang grogs nus pa// grogs byed pa'i chos dag ni// khyod las gzhan pa 'gas mi rtogs// phyi'i
416a4(mdo sde): yan lag stobs kun ni// khyod kyis yang dag bsgrubs lags te// nang gi stobs dag ma tshangs pas// byis pa rnams ni sdug bsngal bsten// 'jig
416a5(mdo sde): rten spyod pa med dang sbyar// chos nyid zab pa dang yang sbyar// dman la mos pa nyid dang sbyar// lam ni ngan pa mang dang sbyar// thog med dus nas goms
416a6(mdo sde): pa yi// brel ba ngang gis byung dang sbyar// bsgom pa 'bad pa chen pos kyang // thob par dka' ba dang sbyar na// 'jig rten du ni khyod lta bu// chos dkar
416a7(mdo sde): yang dag blang ba yi// dngos po gsal bar ston pa'i rtsa// bzang po gal te ma byung na// 'gro kun mun par gyur lags te// mi 'dod tshor ba
416a8(mdo sde): 'byung ba yis// nyams thag 'o dod cher 'bod pa'i// ngan song rang bzhin kho nar 'gyur// khyod la gang gis 'gro rnam gsum// de ni gzhan gyis
416b1(mdo sde): sgrub pa bas// khyod ni dgra ba shes par ma la// bshes mchog bzhin du brtse bar mdzad// / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la

416b5(mdo sde): mnga' yi// gzhan la phan gdags bgyi ba la// skye bo gzhan ni 'tshegs shing mchis// khyod kyi slob ma bsdu ba yi// dngos la mkhas par gda'
416b6(mdo sde): ba gang // de yang rdzogs par mi mkhas pas// khyod kyi cha shas rjes su 'brang // bcom ldan khyod kyi zang zing gi/ bgo bsha' srog gi bar lags
416b7(mdo sde): te// dam pa'i chos kyi bgo bsha' ni// slob dpon dpe mkhyud bral ba lags// khyod ni bsha' bgyi ba'i las// bla na med pa'i mdzad pa po// phun
416b8(mdo sde): sum thams cad rdzogs mnga' bas// khyod ni btang bas bgyi ma lags// 'gro ba phal cher mi bzad pa// gzhan la gnod par bgyi bar dga'/ khyod
417a1(mdo sde): ni 'jig rten rang bzhin te// rgyu las bzlog pa'i phyogs su 'jug/ byas pa bzo gang de dag nyung // phan 'dogs
417a2(mdo sde): bgyid pa 'ga' tsam ste// de yang phan cher re ba can// khyod cig dag pa'i chos can lags// phan btags pa yis khyod mi 'jug/ gnod pa bgyis
417a3(mdo sde): pas log ma lags// skal ba mchis shes thams cad la// khyod ni mnyam pa nyid du 'jug/ mtshan mo me tog ku mu ta// kha 'bye 'gyur zhing pad+ma zums/
417a4(mdo sde): nyin par pad+ma kha 'bye zhing // cig shos zums par 'gyur mod kyi// 'on kyang nyi ma zla ba yi// 'od la phyogs su lhung ma mchis// de nyid khyod kyis byis pa
417a5(mdo sde): dang // mkhas pa dag la bstan pa'i dpe// gang tshe mgon khyod mdzad pa ni// thams cad gzhan don kho na pas// dpag med phan pa mdzad pa po// khyod
417a6(mdo sde): la lan cig lon par 'gyur// sems can dar bar mi 'gyur ba'i// sgrub pa khyod la 'ga' mi mnga'// khyod kyi dbugs phyung tsam yang ni// 'gro la phan
417a7(mdo sde): dang bde ba bskyed// sangs rgyas dbugs ni phyung ba'i ngar// dri kun zil gyis gnon mdzad pa// tshor na zhe 'gras gyur pa yang // khyod la dang bskyed par
417a8(mdo sde): bgyi// sangs rgyas dbugs kyi ngad bab ni// bag med pa yi lha rnams kyang // lha'i yul yang spangs nas ni// 'dul ba dag la mngon phyogs 'gyur//
417b1(mdo sde): khyod las dam pa'i chos mnyan pas// thams cad tshim par 'gyur ma 'tshal// de slad dam pa'i don du na// khyod nyid ngoms gyur tshim mdzad lags
417b2(mdo sde): skye dgu rnams la char bzhin du// khyod ni mkhas pa kun gyi gsol// 'di ltar khyod kyi gsos 'gyur gang // de dang de ni mchis ma lags// dgongs
417b3(mdo sde): par 'tshal ba rnams la yang // khyod kyi phan dgongs ci 'dra ba// de blo ma sbyangs byis pa yis// yid ches bgyi bar nus ma lags// khyod ni ldang
417b4(mdo sde): ba rnams la yang // legs pa ci 'dra bsgrub mdzad pa// sa de yid la smon pa'i yang // yul las 'das par gyur pa legs// la las phan 'dogs
417b5(mdo sde): mdzad pa yi// ro mchog rtogs pa de dag kyang // khyod kyi chos kyi bgo skal la// spyod par 'gyur ba'i gnyen lags so// gal te sems can 'di dag gis//
417b6(mdo sde): khyod mnga' thugs rje'i dgongs pa 'tshal// khyod kyi bstan pas 'tsho bzhin du// kun tu 'bar ba'i mer yang 'jug/ gang slad bdud kyi dgras thebs pas//
417b7(mdo sde): rtogs par mi 'gyur de slad du// khyod kyi bstan las 'gal bgyid pa'i// byis pa rnams ni bdag nyid 'gums// khyod kyi bstan las gzhan phyogs pa/
417b8(mdo sde): g.yangs chen po'i mun pa dang // yongs su gdung ba myong ba rnams// kye ma yun ring 'khyam par 'gyur// khyod kyi chos la mi phyogs pa'i// skye bo gti mug
417'a1(mdo sde): gis ldongs pa// srid rtse'i bar du son nas kyang // sdug bsngal rab 'byung srid pa sgrub// khyod kyi bstan pa'i rjes
417'a2(mdo sde): 'gro ba/ bsam gtan dngos gzhi ma thob kyang // bdud kyi mig ras bco bzhin du// srid pa dag ni zlog par bgyid// khyod kyi dang por lha'i bu'i// bdud
417'a3(mdo sde): kyi me tog rgyal mtshan rnal// de nas nyon mongs bdud kyi ni// nga rgyal rgyal mtshan 'thon po brtag/ khyod kyis byang chub ma rnyes par// 'dod khams dbang
417'a4(mdo sde): phyug las rgyal te// byang chub bar chad med lam la// khams gsum dbang phyug las rgyal lo// dbang phyug khyod nyid 'jig rten 'dir// dpa' ba rnams
417'a5(mdo sde): kyi dpa' bar ste// nyon mongs dbang 'gyur skye bo la// dpa' ba'i rab tu gang zhig rtsi// khyod kyis rang gzhan gnyi ga yi// rgyud las nyon mongs bde bcom pa//

417'b1(mdo sde): cig bstod pa zhes bya ba// spyan gyi yon tan mthon mthing dang // dkar gnag gsum po gang lags pa// de la gtsor bcas 'jig rten gyi// yon tan
417'b2(mdo sde): rnams kyis khyad mi 'khor// sgros gong dpal gyis bla na med// 'og ma dpal mnga' gnyi ga yang // 'byung dang 'byung ba las gyur pa'i// phun sum tshogs
417'b3(mdo sde): pa bla na med// de dag 'ga' zhig ma mchis na// zla 'thun 'ga' yang ma mchis pas// gong ma gang gis lhag gnas 'gyur// 'og ma'ang gang ga gzhi
417'b4(mdo sde): por 'gyur// khyod kyi sgros ni dpal gyi gnas// phan tshun 'tshal bar gyur pa 'di// e ma'o legs par zung du 'brel// e ma'o 'phrog pa bla na med// ston
417'b5(mdo sde): pa'i dus na g.yo 'gyur zhing // gsal ba nyid la g.yo mi mnga'// tshems kyi zla ba shar ba'i dpal// nang nas bag tsam dga' 'gyur ba// nyid kyi gnas
417'b6(mdo sde): nas 'byung ba'i sgra// me tog bzhin du 'grems mdzad cing // gzhan gyis nye bar bskyed rnams kyi// 'gro ba'i lam la phan 'dogs pa// zangs bzhud
417'b7(mdo sde): 'od 'dra 'di dag gi/ dpal 'bar 'di'i thad na ni// bim pa'i 'bras bu mtshams sprin dang // ud dpal dmar mdzes ro dang 'dra// khyod kyi sgros ni mdzes
417'b8(mdo sde): bskyod pa// gang gis mthong ba de dag gis// legs par mig rnyed de dag gi/ mthong ba'ang 'bras bu mchis pa lags// mgon po mu tig 'phreng bas min/
418a1(mdo sde): kun da ku mu da 'phreng min// gangs can rtse mo sbrengs pa'i lus// zla ba'i dad kyis bab pa min// ston ka'i chu bo sun 'byin
418a2(mdo sde): pa/ mkha' 'gro dkar pos phreng bas min// sprin med mkha' la lhag ge ba// ston ka'i zla ba tshes pas min// dul ba khyod kyi tshems rnams kyi// phreng ba 'od
418a3(mdo sde): gsal dkar 'di la// mar me'i 'od kyis nyi 'od bzhin// cha shas su yang phod ma lags// rdo rje myu gu'i phreng ba la// 'phags par chos kyi bdud rtsi'i ros//

418a6(mdo sde): pAHdri ma can dang 'dra bar gyur// khyod kyi ljags dang spros par na// 'di dag thags bzang gnas pa ni// rtogs dang zhi ba'i bar dag na// rnam par grol

418a8(mdo sde): ba bsgreng // khyod kyi mche ba mnyam la zlum// mdzes shing rtse mo rno dkar ba// dpe kun thibs kyis mnan nas ni// 'bar ba bzhin du gnas pa lags// zla ba
418b1(mdo sde): tshes pa 'jig rten na// yon por gsal gyur gang legs te// khyod kyi mche ba mi g.yo zhing // mdzes pa'i lus can rnams kyis bgyis// tshes pa'i gan
418b2(mdo sde): skabs mche ba yis// nya pa zhal ras bzang po yis// kham pa 'phral bas khyims pa ni// gdog gang 'od kyis zil mnan te// thub pa zla ba khyod kyi ni//

418b7(mdo sde): lta bur gnas pa lags// rang gi dbyibs ni mdzes pa yis// cang shes gtso bo thams cad kyi// skyes kyi mtshan pa'i mdzes pa dag/ zil gyis mnan te

420a1(mdo sde): can bzang po de yi ni// shin tu 'jam pa nyid dang ni// mnyam pa nyid kyi mthu lags so// khyod zhal 'brug sgra sgrogs

420a3(mdo sde): thabs lta bu brnyes nas ni// khyod kyi zhal nas bag yangs su// gnas gzhan dag tu ro cig spyod// gang gi dri zhim tshor nas 'di// me tog gsung ba zhes
420a4(mdo sde): sgrogs pa// gsung gi me tog skyon med pa// de dag 'dis ni 'grems par mdzad// de nyid slad du rgyal khyod las// mchog tu snyan pa'i gsung snyan 'byung //

420a6(mdo sde): ston pa de// 'di nyid la ni rag las so// gang gis lhar bcas 'jig rten du// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba de// nyid kyi 'o brgya la mi gzigs pa// dge ba 'di
420a7(mdo sde): yis bgyis pa lags// gang gis rin chen bkram pa ltar// legs par bshad pa rgyas gang nas// 'jig rten 'di ni snang bgyis pa// 'di ni 'di'i mthu lag
420a8(mdo sde): so/ rigs dang phyed par mngon brjod pa// chos kun gsung ba'i 'phags pa ste// dpag bsam ljon pa'i lcug ma ltar// rin chen sna tshogs 'bras bu stsol//
420b1(mdo sde): ljags yangs med par 'jig rten na// kun mkhyen nyid ldan spobs pa ni// so so yang dag rig pa yi// spobs pa'i khur ni su yis bkur// khyod kyis
420b2(mdo sde): dgongs te 'di la ni// chos ni gang dang gang gtad pa// 'di ni snyom las mi mnga' bar// me tog bzhin du phreng bar rgyud// gal te 'di yis ma bstan na//
420b3(mdo sde): khyod la kun mkhyen mngar sus 'tshal// thugs rje chen po mnga' bar sus// yon tan gzhan yang sngar sus 'tshal// bstan pa dag ni ma mchis na// khyod
420b4(mdo sde): 'dra'i mkhas pa mngon mi 'gyur// bstan pa yang ni ljags yangs la// bzhin la dngos grub bzhin du rten// rnam pa sna tshogs chos gsung zhing // rnam pa sna
420b5(mdo sde): tshogs ro btar yang // 'dam rdzab kyis ni nam mkha' bzhin// ro la chags pas gos mi mnga'// mi gsung bzhugs pa'i rjes su 'thun// gsung ba la
420b6(mdo sde): yang skyo mi mnga'// mi 'thun chos ni gnyi ga la// cig tu yang ni 'thun pa lags// mi gsung bzhugs na spro mi mdzad// ston pas mdzad la skyo mi mnga'/
420b7(mdo sde): cang mkhyen nyid kyi dge ba ste// thams cad la ni snyoms par 'jug/ 'di ltar thams cad gsung spyod la// chos rnams 'ba' zhig bka' stsol pa// spyod pa
420b8(mdo sde): la ni 'jug par 'tshar// rigs pa la yang gzhol bar 'tshar// 'byung ba las gyur bsod nams dang // chos gsung ba yi rang bzhin gyis// sangs rgyas pa'i
421a1(mdo sde): dri zhim pa// gnyis kyis rten tu bsgoms pa lags// mig gi spyod yul dag pa dang // bsod nams snyan pa'i rang bzhin
421a2(mdo sde): gyis// shin tu rnam par grags pa yi// snyan pa gnyis kyis phyogs su grags// gang gis skyon kun med pa 'di// zhal nas phyung ba mthong gyur pa// skye
421a3(mdo sde): ba de dag mig dang ldan// mig de dag kyang dpal dang ldan// gang gis de yi gsung snyan pa// mngon sum rna ba'i snyim pa yis// bdud rtsi'i rgyun dang 'drar
421a4(mdo sde): 'thungs pa// mkhas pa de dag ches dpal ldan// sgra rnams brgyan par mdzad pa bzhin// sgra yis rnam pa brgyan pa bzhin// bshad pa mdzad na khyod kyi
421a5(mdo sde): zhalaHshin tu sba bar mdzad pa bzhin// 'di ni nyid mdzes yon tan gyis// thub pa khyod kyi zla zhal ni// 'jig rten brgyan du gyur pa yang // lhag pa'i rgyan
421a6(mdo sde): du gyur par gda'// mdog dang dbyibs dang sman gsung dang // shin tu 'jam pa nyid dang mthus// ljags yangs lta bu'i gzugs can gyi// rdzas ni 'ga'
421a7(mdo sde): yang ma mthong ngo // gal te lha mo dbyangs ldan ma// de ni gzugs can 'ga' mchis na// skyon kun med pa'i yan lag can// ljags yangs de ni de lags
421a8(mdo sde): grang // yangs pa'i ljags kyis chos kyi rnga// kun tu rdung bar zhugs pa'i tshe// lha dang mi'i sgra rnams ni// thams cad ro bro med par 'gyur// ston par
421b1(mdo sde): khyod dang ljags 'di dang // bla na med pa'i bka' 'di ni// nyon mongs dug kun 'joms pa yi// yan lag gsum ldan sman gyi mchog/
421b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa/ bsngags par 'os pa bsngags pa las// ljags la bstod pa zhes bya ba rdzogs s+ho//
421b3(mdo sde): @#// rgya gar skad du/ bar na ra ha ba ra Ne b+ha ga ba to bud+d+ha stod b+ha ba ud be dza no nA ma/ bod skad du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa/ bsngags
421b4(mdo sde): par 'os pa bsngags pa las/ srid pa la skyo bar bstod pa zhes bya ba// khyod dang 'dra ba'i zhing dag ni// 'jig rten gsum na ma mchis te// khyod ni sbyin gnas
421b5(mdo sde): rnams kyi mchog/ gral gtsang mdzad pa'i gtsang ma lags// nam mkha'i mtha' thug ma mchis pa'i// chu dang zheng dag ji lta bar// khyod la sman gnod
421b6(mdo sde): bgyid pa yi// rnam par smin pa thug ma mchis// gang dag khyod la bar mar gnas// de yang re zhig tshad med pa'i// mun pas bsgos pas ma rung na// skye
421b7(mdo sde): bo log bgyid smos ci 'tshal// ji ltar bla med yon gyi gnas// khyod la yang dag bsgrub bgyid pa// las gang lags pa de yi ni// dar ba'i mtha' thug
421b8(mdo sde): mi mthong ba// yang dag bsgrub pa'i mthar byon pa// khyod la log par bzhugs pa gang // las de'i rgud pa'i mtha' yang ni// de bzhin thug pa ma
423a1(mdo sde): mchis so// gang gis rnam pa thams cad du// stobs ldan khyod la'ang ma brtsams pa// rab tu mtshams ni mi zin pa'i// /
423a2(mdo sde): ma rabs mi rtag nyid re ngan// kye ma'o 'khor ba'i bdag nyid ngan// e ma'o mya ngan 'das pa zhi// khyod 'dra thugs rje'i bdag nyid can// mnga' mchis
423a3(mdo sde): pa yang de ru gshegs// ma 'ongs 'jigs pa rnams kyang gsung // chos kyi tshul yang bshad pa mdzad// 'khor ni rnam pa bzhi po yang // mi 'jigs
423a4(mdo sde): pa dag thob pa mdzad// lam bzang 'di ni bsrung slad du// blo gros sbyang ba bgyis gyur pa// 'di srung che dang kun dga' dang // de la sogs pa'ang sgom mod
423a5(mdo sde): kyid+harta'ajig rten gyi ni mig cig pa// dri ma med pa khyod zums ni// snang ba mchis kyang 'jig rten 'di// mun pas khyeb dang 'dra ba lags// bde bar
423a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa bde gshegs kyi// bka' 'di'ang mchis la khyod kyis sras// sras kyi dam pa slob pa dang // mi slob 'di yang mchis mod kyi// 'gro ba'i
423a7(mdo sde): mgon khyod mi bzhugs pas// gza' skar lags pas mtshan ma yi// nam mkha' zla bas stong pa bzhin// shin tu brlag gis ma mchis so// khyod
423a8(mdo sde): mi bzhugs na gsung rabs 'di// klu 'phos pa yi mtsho'i dpal// ring po mi thogs 'jigs pa ltar// 'tsham pa'i snying po dang bral bas// yon tan
423b1(mdo sde): gzi yang mi sba la// cho ga gzhan dang lugs gzhan gyis// 'phar dang rma dag phyung lags pas// lugs gi brjid kyang yang du cha// sangs rgyas mnga'
423b2(mdo sde): dbang sgyur ba rnams// yongs su mya ngan 'da' bsams nas// srid pa ral gri 'bar 'dra la// su zhig 'jigs par mi bgyid lags// // sangs rgyas
423b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa/ bsngags par 'os pa bsngags pa las/ srid pa la skyo bar bstod pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon ma ti rtse tas mdzad pa rdzogs te/ rgya gar
423b4(mdo sde): gyi mkhan po sarbad nya de ba dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsha ba ban de dpal brtsegs rag shi tas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// @#/ rgya gar skad du/
423b5(mdo sde): pra sa da pra ti b+hod b+ha ga ba ta bud+d+ha s+ya sto tre nA ma/ bod skad du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa/ dad pa las spobs skyes pa zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs
423b6(mdo sde): pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// gang zhig la ni nyes pa kun// btan nas yong ye mi mnga' zhing // gang la rnam pa thams cad du// yon tan thams cad gnas gyur
423b7(mdo sde): pa/ gal te sems shig yod na ni// de nyid la ni skyabs 'gro zhing // de bstod de ni bkur ba dang // de'i gtan la gnas pa'i rigs// thams cad mkhyen la yon
423b8(mdo sde): tan kun// mnga' ba de yang rnams mi mnga'// nyes pa bag chags bcas de yang // skyob pacig pu la mi mnga'// bcom ldan 'das kyi su dang ni// gsung dang
424a1(mdo sde): thugs kyi 'phrin las la// zhe 'gras gyur pa gang gis kyang // chos dang ldan par glags mi rnyed// rgya mtshor gnya' shing bu gung du/
424a2(mdo sde): rus sbal mgrin pa chud pa ltar// dam chos dga' ston cher bcas pa'i// mi nyid bdag gis thob nas ni// mi rtag nyid dang rjes 'brel cing // las kyi klags
424a3(mdo sde): la dogs bcas pa// bdag gi lce nyi nyid kyis ko// snying pa ci yang blang mi bya// de ltas thub pa yon tan gyi// yul lha grags med shes mod kyi// rang gi don

424a7(mdo sde): spyod dam mi spyod snyam pa yi// rnam par rtog pa rnams spangs nas// 'gro ba 'di ni nyam thag ces// khyod bdag nyid kyis zhal gyis bzhes// khyod ni ma bcol las
424a8(mdo sde): leg mdzad pa// khyod ni rgyu med bzhin du byams// khyod ni ma 'dris mdza' bshes te// 'brel pa med pa'i gnyen gdun lags// nyid kyi sha yang stsol mdzad na//

424b3(mdo sde): dgongs pa dag pa 'ba' zhig gis// khyod kyi tshul khrims goms par mdzad// rtag tu gya gyu rnams spangs shing // drang brtan rnams ni yongs su dag/ yongs su dag

425a1(mdo sde): lhod 'ga' ma byung // de slad khyod kyi khyad par rnams// thog drung rim pa dbyer ma mchis// thugs ni thugs rje chen po dang // rtag

429a2(mdo sde): mdzad cing // lha dang mi rnams dbugs kyang 'byin// 'chi bdag bstan la khams gsum gyi// sa chen dag na spyod bgyid pa// mi thogs thogs pa ma mchis
429a3(mdo sde): pa'ang // khyod kyi bstan pas zil gyis mnan// khyod kyi bstan pa'i lugs 'tshal ba// dka' na bskal par gnas la// gang du bdud kyis mi rdzi ba// der yang
429a4(mdo sde): dga' mgur rab tu mchi// lung gi don ni bsam pa dang // bsgom dang gus par mnyan pa yi// dus gsum cha dbye khyod kyis ni// bstan las gzhan la mchis ma
429a5(mdo sde): lags// drang srong skyes mchog khyod kyi bstan// de ltar legs pas khyab 'di la// mi gus gang lags de las ni// sdug bsngal chen po'ang ci zhig mchis//
429a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa/ dad pa las spobs pa skyes pa zhes bya ba las/ bstan pa la bstod pa ste le'u brgyad pa'o// // khyod
429a7(mdo sde): thos pas ni spro ba skye// mthong bas dad pa skye bar 'gyur// khyod gsung thos pas dga' 'gyur te// snyan pas rnam par grol bar bgyid// khyod kyi sras kyi mgu bar
429a8(mdo sde): 'gyur// 'brel pas skye dgu rnams kyang dga'/ gshegs pa na ni phan 'dogs mdzad// ldog pa na ni rgud par gyur// bsgrags pas sdig pa 'phrog par mdzad//
429b1(mdo sde): khyod dran pas ni rangs par 'gyur// btsal bas blo gros skye 'gyur te// yongs su shes pas rnam par dag khyod la ba bcus pas dpal tu che// brten pas blo gros
429b2(mdo sde): mchog tu 'gyur// brten na 'jigs pa med par mdzad// bsnyen bskur bgyis pa bde bar 'gyur// tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pas dag/ bsam gtan phun sum
429b3(mdo sde): tshogs pa dang // shes rab phun tshogs mi 'khrugs pas// khyod ni bsod nams mtshon chen lags// khyod sku bltar 'os rin chen ste// legs gsungs bstan
429b4(mdo sde): 'os rin chen lags// chos ni spyad 'os rin chen pas// khyod ni rin chen 'byung gnas lags// khyod ni chu bos 'das pa'i gling // smras pa'i bdag nyid skyob pa ste// /
429b5(mdo sde): srid pa'i 'jigs pas nyan pa'i skyabs// thar 'tshal rnams kyi 'dran pa lags// tshul khrims dag phyir snod kyi mchog/ zhing gshin 'bras bu phun sum tshogs//
429b6(mdo sde): srog chags kun la phan mdzad phyir// grogs kyi phul yang khyod lags so// phan 'dogs mdzad pas mdza' bshes te// 'grogs na bde phyir snying du sdug/ gzhi
429b7(mdo sde): phyir cig tu yid du 'ong // yon tan kun mnga' mchod 'os khyod// sdig pa med pas yid dang 'thad// sku gsung bzang bas dga' bar mdzad// don kun grub phyir
429b8(mdo sde): dpal yangs te// yon tan legs brten dgra shis lags// / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa/ dad pa las spobs pa skyes pa zhes bya ba las/
430a1(mdo sde): smon lam gyi bstod pa ste le'u dgu pa'o// khyod ni dang then bgyid la bskul// chom rkun bgyid pa tshar yA gcod/
430a2(mdo sde): gya gyu can rnams rnal du 'god// dal bus bgyid la bzhin skul 'debs// dul ba rnams ni lam sbyor// dmu rgod rnams la btang snyoms mdzad// de slad skyes
430a3(mdo sde): bu 'dul ba yi// kha lo bsgyur ba bla med mchog/ khyod ni nyams thag rnams brtse// bde bar gnas la phan par dgyes// 'phongs pa gnas la thugs rjebs/
430a4(mdo sde): kun la phan par bzhed pa lags// khyod ni dgra bo rnams la'ang byams// nyams par gyur la phan 'dogs mdzad// gtum po rnams la thugs brtse bas// khyod
430a5(mdo sde): ni ya rabs smad cig lags// phan 'dogs bgyid srad pa ma dag/ gal te bla mar 'tshal na go/ khyod ni lhag par phan 'dogs pas// bla ma nyid gyur smos ci 'tshal//
430a6(mdo sde): rang gi don la mi lta bas// nyid kyi dgra ba ltar gyur cig/ g.yang sa'i mun na gnas rnams la// ra ba lta bur gyur pa'ang khyod// 'jig rten gnyi gar sman gdags dang //
430a7(mdo sde): 'jig rten las ni bzla slad du// mun par gyur pa'i 'jig rten la// khyod kyi shes rab snang ba mdzad// yul la nye bar spyod pa mdzad// lha ma'i spyad pa tha dad kyi// chos
430a8(mdo sde): kyi longs spyod thun mong pas// khyod la dbye ba mi mnga' 'o// bcom ldan khyod kyis skye ba dang // na tshod rigs dang yul dang ni// dus kyi skyon med chos rnams kyis//
430b1(mdo sde): 'di dag kun la sman yon btags// khyod kyi nyan thos sred bral zhing // ya mtshan 'dzin med rnams la'ang // lha rnams thal sbyor smon bgyid cing // ya mtshan che//
430b2(mdo sde): ba lta bur mchod// e ma'o sangs rgyas 'khor ba yi// snying rkun gyur pa byung ba brjid// de na mi yang lha rnams kyis// smon par bya ba nyid du gyur// / sangs
430b3(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa/ dad pa las spobs pa skyes pa zhes bya las/ lam la bstod pa ste le'u bcu pa'o// // bsnyel dang zhi bde
430b4(mdo sde): nyams 'gyur dang // skye bo ngan dang 'grogs pa dang // mi 'thun pa dang mang ba yi// skyon yang yon tan bzhin dgongs shing // 'gro ba'i don slad ma chags pa'i// /
430b5(mdo sde): thugs kyis brtson pa mdzad pa gang // sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi// chos nyid bcom ldan des smad do// mgon khyod gtso bor gyur lags kyang // gdul
430b6(mdo sde): ba rnams la byams slad du// bshes kyang phal pa gsol mdzad cing // res 'ga' sbyar ba dag kyang mdzad// nyam nga'i shul du'ang gshegs mdzad cing // rang rod
430b7(mdo sde): can du'ang stsal ba mdzad// sku ngas rdo dang lcam tshul dang // skad dang cha lug bsgyur ba mdzad// kun gyis dga' mgur rang don phyir// bran bzhin bgo bar bgyid pa las//
430b8(mdo sde): mgon khyod rtag tu bdag nyid la/ mnga' mchis pa yang ma lugs so// khyod la gang dang gang du yang / ji skad skul yang mi bsngo ste// nyid kyi bsgrub pa bzang po las//
431a1(mdo sde): 'da' bar gyur pa ma mchis so// ji ltar khyod ni gnod bgyid la// phan pa lhur mdzad de lta bur// skye bo dag ni phan bgyid la'ang // na
431a2(mdo sde): pa de ltar lhur mi bgyid// khyod ni gnod bgyid dgra bo la// phan pa mdzad pa'i bshes lags te// rtag tu skyon dag tshol ba la// yon tan 'ba' zhig tshol ba'ang lags//
431a3(mdo sde): khyod ni gang nas dug bcas shing // zhugs dang bcas par spyan drangs pa// der ni rtser bcas gshegs pa dang // khyod la bdud rtsi chen du gyur// bzod pas mi snyan
431a4(mdo sde): brjod pa dang // khu ba dag ni bde legs kyis// mi snyan smra la bden pa ste// khyod kyis sdang ba byams pas btul// thog ma med dus goms pa yi// mi'i rang
431a5(mdo sde): bzhin mang po yang // khyod kyis ngan song rnams bzlog nas// skad cig nyid la yongs su bskur// // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa/ dad
431a6(mdo sde): pa las spobs pa skyes pa zhes bya ba las/ bka' ba mdzad pa la bstod pa ste le'u bcu gcig pa'o// // rtsub po dang 'jam bgyis pa dang // 'jungs pa
431a7(mdo sde): rnams ni gtong phod dang // gtum po nges par bgyis pa gang // de ni khyod kyi thabs mkhas lags// dga' ba'i dbang po nyer bzhi dang // nga rgyal khengs pa
431a8(mdo sde): 'dud pa dang // sor mo'i phreng ba'ang zhi bgyis na// su zhig ngo mtshar skyed mi bgyid// khyod kyi chos kyi ros tshim pa// gser las bgyis pa'i mal spangs nas//
431b1(mdo sde): ran mang gting ba'i gnas mal du// brtan rnams bsod nyams nyal bar bgyid// khyod kyis dus dang bsam mkhyen pas// res 'ga' zhus na'ang mi gsung
431b2(mdo sde): lang+ga spro gyur gzhan la bstan pa dang // drung du gshegs nas bshad pa'ang mdzad// dri med go sa la tshon bzhin du// thog mar sbyin sogs gtam dag gis/
431b3(mdo sde): sems la spro ba bskyed nas ni// phyi nas chos ni bstan par mdzad// 'khor ba mi bzang gting nas ni// 'gro ba nyon mongs drang slad du// khyod kyis gang gis ma bstsal
431b4(mdo sde): pa'i// thabs dang spyod pa de ma mchis// sku'i cha lugs rnam mang dang // gsung gis so so'i skad du ni// gdul ba'i bsam pa tha dad pa// de dang der ni khyod kyis
431b5(mdo sde): mdzad// de dag kun kyang dag pa dang // mi 'gal ba dang mchod 'os dang // rjid dang lha mi rnams la ni// sman 'dogs bskur ba sha stag lags// smra dang bgyid
431b6(mdo sde): pa phal cher ni// legs par rngo thog ma lags kyi// bden par gsung ba khyod la ni// de gnyis gzhan du gda' ba lags// bdag nyid dga' ba 'ba' zhig gis//
431b7(mdo sde): khyod kyis 'gro ba'i dpal zhing mdzad// 'di ltar rnam pa 'di 'dra'i zhing // 'jig rten gzhan la mchis ma lags// thog med srid pa nyam nga bar// snga nas cig
431b8(mdo sde): tu nyams pa yi// sems can rnams la sman slad du// khyod ni de ltar rtson pa lags// gang gis khyod drin lan lon pa'i// sgrub de mchis sum mi bgyid de// skye bo
432a1(mdo sde): gang dag mya ngan 'das// de dag gis kyang lan ma lon// khyod kyi chos la gnas de dag/ rang don kho na bgyid pa bas// de'i slad
432a2(mdo sde): du'o brgyal gang // de la lan go ci zhig yod// khyod ni sems can gnyid log pa'i// rgyud la gzigs pa'i zhugs rtse ba// bag med gyur pa rnams kyi ni//
432a3(mdo sde): grogs bzang bag dang bcas pa lags// // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa/ dad pa las spobs pa skyes pa zhes bya ba las/ mkhas par bstod
432a4(mdo sde): pa ste le'u bcu gnyis pa'o// // khyod kyis nyon mongs gzhom pa bshad// bdud kyi g.yo dag bstan pa mdzad// 'khor ba'i rang bzhin mi bzod brjod//
432a5(mdo sde): 'jigs pa med pa'i phyogs kyang bstan// phan dgongs thugs rje can gyis ni// sems can rnams la bgyi 'tshal ba// gang zhig khyod kyis ma mdzad pa// gzhan
432a6(mdo sde): go ci zhig mchis lags kye// gal te chos ni 'di dag kyang // spo ba zhig tu rtsub na ni// gnod mi 'tshal bar khyod kyis ni// lha sbyin la sogs kun stsal pa// de slad
432a7(mdo sde): 'gro la brda sprod pa// 'gro ba'i mgon po khyod kyis ni// 'di na phan tshun byed pa po// med pa skad du nges par gsungs// 'jig rten rnams la thugs brtse bas// yun
432a8(mdo sde): rings steng dam chos bshad// 'jig rten gsum phan 'dogs nus pa'i// slob na dam pa'ang mang du bskrun// mngon du gdul ba'i tshogs kyang ni// mdzes bzang yan
432b1(mdo sde): chad btul lags pas// dgo khyod la sems can gyi// bu lon lhag ma ci mchis na// 'jug du'ang khyod kyis shin du ni// dka' spyad yal bar ma bor te// 'a
432b2(mdo sde): ltar rdo rje'i ting 'dzin gyis// sku gdung til 'bru bzhin du blags// gzugs kyi sku dang chos 'di dag/ gzhan don kho nar zad do zhes// 'jig rten yid ches dka'
432b3(mdo sde): 'di la// khyod kyis mya ngan 'das pa bstan// de slad chos sku ma lus pa// sras kyi mchog la gtad mdzad de// gzugs sku gtil 'bru ltar bshig nas// khyod
432b4(mdo sde): ni yongs su mya ngan 'das// e ma'o gnas pa e ma'o tshul// e ma'o yon tan e ma'o sku// sangs rgyas kyi ni chos rnams la// ya mtshan mi che 'ga' ma mchis//
432b5(mdo sde): phan 'dogs mdzad cing blta na sdug/ sku gsung 'phrin las zhing gyur pa// khyod la'ang sdang bar bgyid pa yi// rmongs pa mi mdzad pa la gzigs// bsod nams
432b6(mdo sde): rgya mtsho'i rin chen gter// yon tan 'byung gnas chos kyi tshogs// khyod la sems can gang 'dud pa// de dag la yang phyag 'tshal legs// mgon khyod yon tan
432b7(mdo sde): mi bas kyang // bdag gi zho sha bas 'tshal bas// des na 'dzem pa bgyid slad du// blo ba la ni lcags bzhin mchis// khyod kyi rang gi ngo bo nyid// tshad ma mchis
432b8(mdo sde): la bsam mi khyab// brtan min grangs kyang ma mchis pa// khyod bdag nyid kyis mkhyen lags gang // mtsho chen chab ni bas par ma gyur kyang // skye bo'i gdung ba
433a1(mdo sde): rab tu zhi bgyid ltar// khyod kyi yon tan cha tsam ma sgrogs kyang // bdag ni mchog tu blo ba dga' zhing mchis// bdag gis//
433a2(mdo sde): thub la dad pas spobs skyes pa'i// dge ba'i las 'di'i 'bras bu 'khrungs pa yis// ngan rtog rlung dmar 'tshub pas dkrugs pa yi// 'gro ba'i sems ni rnal du
433a3(mdo sde): gnas par shog/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa/ dad pa las spobs pa skyes pa zhes bya ba las/ bu lon med par bstod pa'i len sa
433a4(mdo sde): gsum pa'o// // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa/ dad pa las spobs pa skyes pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon ma gol gyis mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// /
433a5(mdo sde): rgya gar gyi mkhan po sa rbad nyide ba dang / lo tsha ba ban de rin chen mchog gis bsgyur cing / zhu chen gyi lo tsha ba ban de dpal brtsegs kyis zhus te gtan la phab pa//
433a6(mdo sde): / rgya gar skad du/ bi she sha sta pa/ bod skad du/ khyad par du 'phags par bstod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag
433a7(mdo sde): ni bstod pa gzhan spangs nas// bcom ldan khyod la skyabs mchis pa// de ci'i slad du zhe na khyod// skyon mi mnga' la yon tan ldan// gang phyir 'jig rten skyon la dga'/
433a8(mdo sde): yon tan 'dzin la zhan pas na// skyon yang yon tan ltar brtsis nas// gzhan la skyabs su mchi bar gyur// khyab 'jug dbang phyug la sogs pa// de la skye bo
433b1(mdo sde): dga' dad pas// de'i yon tan gang bsgrags pa// khyod kyi bstan la de dag bskyon// lha chen khros pa'i mda' cig gis// grong khyer gsum brtsegs bsregs shes
433b2(mdo sde): gda'// khyod kyi ye shes mda' chen gyis// khro ba'i me nyid nges par bsregs// lha chen gyis ni 'dod pa dag/ bsregs nyes pas na phyir yang drangs// khyod kyi ye
433b3(mdo sde): shes zhugs kyis ni// 'dod pa rtsar bcas bsregs nas bton// lha chen thig le mchog ma la// chags pa skyes pas gdong bzhi byung // bdud kyi bu mo bskyegs pa
433b4(mdo sde): yis// khyod kyi ba spu'i rtse mi g.yos// lha chen phyed ni chung ma bas// dur pa yis kyang thug ma lags// khyod ni bde bar bgyid pa yi// 'dod pa nyid kyis rmongs ma gyur// /
433b5(mdo sde): 'khor mdung thub can dag gis// bdud stobs de las rgyal mi nus// khyod ni 'khor lo mdung med par// byams pa'i mtshon gang lags pas rgyal// mgon pos
433b6(mdo sde): khyab 'jug mnga' yis bsnun// lha chen 'grin pa sngon gyur pas// lha 'di gnyis la gnod bgyid mchis// mgon khyod gnod bgyid bral ba lags// khyab 'jug
433b7(mdo sde): mi'u thung gzugs bsgyur nas// g.yo thabs kyis ni stobs ldan bslus// khyod ni g.yo yang ngo zin la// gzhan dag la yang sru mi mdzad// mgon khyod rdzu
433b8(mdo sde): 'phrul tsam rlang gyi// slad byung gang gis mthong ba des// khyab 'jug 'jig rten gsum rgal ba// 'phye bo mchi ba bzhin du mthong // gzhon du tshangs par spyod
434a1(mdo sde): pa na/ drug ldan ma dang lhan cig spyod// khyod kyis 'khrig pa'i sbyar ba bdun// thal ba bzhin du bgyis par gyur// tshangs
434a2(mdo sde): stsol 'jig rten 'byin pa po// bdag cag yin par smra zhes grag/ de nyid gzigs khyod 'jig rten dang // de yang las las skyes zhes bstan// brgya byin gyis ni
434a3(mdo sde): gshol med ma// mthon na 'dod pas rmongs zhes grag/ dpa' khyod 'dod pa nyid kyis na// ma rmongs slad du btsun mo btang // sgra can lags pas zla ba yang /
434a4(mdo sde): dbang med par ni mid pa lags// mnga' brnyes khyod la sems can gang // dbang med bgyid pa de ma mchis// mi dbang dga' byed gos sred sogs// nags tshel
434a5(mdo sde): nas ni phyir yang mchis// bde gshegs khyod ni dben pa yi// bdud rtsis ngoms pas phyir mi byon// mchod sbyin la ni phyugs dgum par// drang srong rnams ni smra zhes
434a6(mdo sde): grag/ sdig med khyod kyis grog ma la'ang // gnod pa bgyid par rjes ma snang // gzhan dag rang don mchod sbyin la// gzhan srog mar gyi sbyin sreg bgyid// gzhan
434a7(mdo sde): gyi don du khyod cig pu// rang gi srog gi sbyin sregs mdzad// drang srong smod pa grub pa las// dka' thub grub par rjes su dpag/ lha chen 'dod pa can gyi mtshan/
434a8(mdo sde): drang srong rnams kyi smod pas lhung // khyod kyi phung khrol ba dag gi/ rtsa ba 'dod pa nyid lhung bgyis// drang srong dmod pa mi bzad pas// skye bo phal pa bsregs par
434b1(mdo sde): 'gyur// khyod kyi ye shes me yis ni// skye bo rnams kyi skye rgyu bsregs// rgyas pa dran pa'i mthu chungs pas// mang po bgyis pa'i tshig dag ni// lta 'og 'gal bA/
434b2(mdo sde): gyur ces thos// thub pa khyod kyi kun kyang min// gling las skye sogs phal cher ni// gzhan gyis gang smras smra bar bgyid// khyod kyis thun mong ma yin chos// rang
434b3(mdo sde): gis thugs su chud nas bstan// mu stegs can gyi rig byed tshig/ dben pa kho nar smra bar bgyid// khyod kyi bsgrags nas seng ge yi// sgra yis chos dag bstan
434b4(mdo sde): pa mdzad// grangs can b+ha ra dwa dza ni// de nyid mthong yang dpyid ldan la// yongs su chags kyi gtso khyod kyi// slob ma'ang bud med nyid ma chags// 'ug pa bas ni
434b5(mdo sde): sar pa las// khyad par can la sbyin zhes bstan// mgon po khyod ni thugs rje yis// kyi la'ang sbyin par bya zhes gsungs// lus kyi dka' thub bgyis pa yis//
434b6(mdo sde): mdud pa 'jig par gcer bu 'tshal// khyod ni thug kyi dka' thub kyis// mdud pa 'jig par bzhed pa lags// rto ge ba dag dngos po rnams// ltos pa med par
434b7(mdo sde): 'grub par 'tshal// tshig dbang khyod kyis cung zad kyang // mi ltos med ces legs par gsungs// ne tsos nyi ma brtol nas ni// thar par mchis par bshad ces
434b8(mdo sde): grag/ khyod ni mya ngan 'das rjes la// gang du yang ni gshegs ma mchis// thar pa gzhan gyur pa dang ni// ne tse'ang lam gzhan song bar gyur// khyod nyid lam gang
435a1(mdo sde): nas gshegs pa// de nyid nas ni slob ma'ang mchi// khyab 'jug gis bud med dag/ stong phrag bcu drug yongs bzung gyur//
435a2(mdo sde): ston pa 'jig rten 'das khyod la// bdag gi med cing yongs 'dzin med// ka shi mdzes dga' mo la ni// rgyas pa yongs chags rnam par bsgyur// khyod khab bzhugs
435a3(mdo sde): na'ang phung khrol ba'i// don gyis dbang po rmongs ma gyur// rgyas pa 'dod gdungs g.yen spyo ba// bud med kyis ni brdog pas bsnan// khyod ni khyim par gyur pa na'ang //
435a4(mdo sde): phyir zhing 'khrug par gyur pa med// dga' byed chung ma'i don gyi phyir// rgya mtsho'i pha rol song zhes grag/ khyod kyis bud med stong phrag ni// brgyad cu spangs nas nags su
435a5(mdo sde): gshegs// rna can thab dka' la sogs la// khyab 'jug gis ni gnod pa bsams// sems can rnams la phan bzhed pa// khyod kyis srog kyang btang bar mdzad// /
435a6(mdo sde): khyab 'jug gis sgra byas nas// gom gsum gyis phrog gang yin pa'i// sa de nges par thar bzhed pa// khyod kyis rtsa bzhin gtad par gyur// dga' byed srog gcod byed
435a7(mdo sde): pa'i mangs// 'jig rten rgyal rigs med byas pas// grags pa thob pa gang yin te// khyod kyis stan la grags pa min// sgra ngan dang ni skya seng dag/ gang gi phyir
435a8(mdo sde): ni g.yul bkye ba'i// dpal de khyod kyis 'khri shing ni// gdug pa bzhin du spangs nas gshegs// khyod kyi bstan pa brnyed pa na// thang shing nags ni lha chen po//
435b1(mdo sde): rnal 'byor dbang phyug spyod pa gang // de ni mi shes spyod pa rabs// dbang po bshol med byi bo zhes// bram ze da dung rab tu sgrogs// khyod kyis 'bras bu mchog
435b2(mdo sde): brnyes pa'i// grags pa brgya byin sgrogs par gyur// khyab 'jug gis ni nag bkra bo// bred 'thoms gyur nas kun da gtong // khri'i 'og tu zhugs par
435b3(mdo sde): gyur/ gtso khyod kun tu snyengs mi mnga'// skye dgu'i bdag po rang nyid kyi// bu mo dang ni 'khri zhes thos// thub pa khyod kyi slob ma yang // tshangs par spyod la skyon ma
435b4(mdo sde): mchis// bram ze rnams ni dge sdig dag/ sbyin pa len bzhin 'pho bar smra// khyod kyis byas chud mi za dang // ma byas pa dang phrad med gsungs// ser skyes bdag gi
435b5(mdo sde): mtshan nyid ni// shes dang ldan par yongs su brtags// khyod kyi de lta yin na bdag/ mi rtag nyid dang ldan zhes bstan// gzegs zan gis ni shes las bdag
435b6(mdo sde): bzhan dang khyad par yongs su brjod// khyod kyis de ni shes med na// shing dang 'dra bar thal 'gyur gsungs// gcer bu lus kyi tshad bzhin du// srog ni zhum dang
435b7(mdo sde): rgyas par smra// khyod kyis de ni phyogs cig phyir// rnam par 'jig par 'gyur zhes gsungs// bram zes 'gro ba rnams kyi rgyu// skyes bu brtag pa yin zhes brtags/
435b8(mdo sde): khyod kyis brtag pa zhes bya ba'i// rgyun ni ci yang med ces gsungs// bdag nyid chen po dug can pa'i// sras po stong phrag drug cu dag/ ser skyas bltas pa tsam/
436a1(mdo sde): gyis bsregs// de la rang khyod ni thugs rje mdzad// seng skya la sogs thar pa yi// bdag ni srid pa'i rgyu zhes mchi// khyod ni zhi ba
436a2(mdo sde): gshegs gyur nas// bzhugs gum lta bur bgrang du med// mu stegs byed pa kha cig ni// thar pa 'gro dang ldan zhes smra// gang la 'gro yod de 'khor bar// khyod
436a3(mdo sde): kyis thugs su chud nas bstan// gcer bu kun dga' ra ba sogs// brtsigs pa sdig pa'i rgyu zhes zer// thams cad mkhyen pa'i khyod kyis ni// de nyid bsod
436a4(mdo sde): nams rgyu zhes gsungs// lus las lus gzhan dag tu ni// rtag pa'i srog ni 'pho zhes grag/ khyod kyis lus las gzhan gyur pa'i// srog yod pa ni min
436a5(mdo sde): zhes gsungs// khros pas g.yul ngor bsad na ni// bde 'gror 'gyur bar rgyas pa zer// mgon po khyod kyis gnas bskabs de'i// sems ni ngan 'gro yin
436a6(mdo sde): zhes gsungs// skye ba seng bu ni brjod byas na// bsod nams 'gyur zhes so so smra// gang zhig bgrod min 'gro byed pa// de dag khyod kyis bstan la smad//
436a7(mdo sde): skem byed dbang po nye dbang po// drag po la sogs 'jigs pa dang // bsdigs phyir mtshon cha rtag tu thogs// khyod ni brnangs bral bsdigs mi mdzadaka khyod
436a8(mdo sde): ni sus kyang mi bsnyengs la// su la'ang bsdigs par mi mdzad pas// khyod nyid cig pu mtshon mi bsdams// des na 'gro ba rnams las spags// sma'o
436b1(mdo sde): nyon mongs brlas pa'i tshig/ rig byed la sogs tshig dag ni// phal cher lta 'og 'gal ba lags// khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa gsung // gzhan gyi/
436b2(mdo sde): bstan chos gzhan dag ni// phal cher snga phyir 'gal ba lags// khyod nyid kyi ni gzhung lugs dag/ thogs ma bar mthar skyon ma mchis// chos 'don pa dag dmang
436b3(mdo sde): rigs la// blo gros sbyin par bya min zer// khyod ni gdol pa rnams la yang // thugs rjes dam chos ston par mdzad// ljon shing bzang po rnam spangs nas// ngan pa
436b4(mdo sde): la ni su zhig rten// 'dod chags bral brnyes khyod bzhugs na// mkhas pa su zhig ston gzhan 'dud// ser skya yul rnams la bkod bzhin// ye shes 'gyur
436b5(mdo sde): 'phyi sdig bral ba// khyod kyis kun nas nyon mongs la// thar pa ga la yod ces gsungs// bsod nams byas pa'i tshogs dag ni// sems can rnams la
436b6(mdo sde): yongs su bsngo// bcom ldan khyod kyis gang gsungs pa// de bzhin bstan chos la ma bshad// lha rten dang ni mchod sprin la// sems can gsod par byed pa
436b7(mdo sde): dag/ 'jig rten pa ni chos su 'tshal// khyod kyi stan la de smad lags// gang zhig srog chags la rtag gnod// de la chos nyid ga la yod// gtso bo
436b8(mdo sde): khyod kyis rang nyid kyis// srog gis sems can legs par gsungs// shAkya'i rgyal rigs 'khrungs khyod kyis// gang zhig bden dang mi sru dang // tshangs
437a1(mdo sde): par spyod dang dul ba dang // brtser ldan dam chos legs par dgongs// rigs byed thal khyam pas kyang // g.yul ngor dgra
437a2(mdo sde): mngon 'ongs gsod ces// 'jig rten smra'i khyod kyis ni// dgra la'ang snying rje bya zhes gsungs// gzhon nus rang gi zhang po la// bas gis snun ces bka
437a3(mdo sde): mchid gda'// dpa' bo khyod kyis nyon mongs pa'i// dra ba shes rab mtshon gyis dral// khyab 'jug gis ni rang nyid kyi// lhas kyang yongs su bskyab ma nus//
437a4(mdo sde): gtso bo khyod ni sems can kun// bskyab pa'i slad du brtson pa lags// rgan pos 'jigs pas 'phrigs nas su// khyab 'jug gis ni bcom brlag btang /
437a5(mdo sde): thub pa khyod la brnyengs bgyid pa'i// sems can de ni 'ga' ma mchis// khyab 'jug gi ni gnyen 'dun dag/ le lan gis ni gdugs par gyur// khyod
437a6(mdo sde): kyis gnyen 'dun thams cad ni// 'khor ba las ni rnam pa bkrol// ser skya de nyid rig pas ni// gtso las 'gro ba skye bar bshad// khyod kyis 'gro ba skye
437a7(mdo sde): ba ni// nyon mongs las las byung bar bsgrags// mu stegs gzhan gyi gzhung lugs la// ji lta ji ltar rnam bsams pa// de lta de ltar mgon khyod la/
437a8(mdo sde): bdag gi sems ni dad par gyur// de ltar thams cad mkhyen min pa'i// grub mtha'i skyon gyis rlag sems ldan// bsam rlag rnams kyis skyon med pa'i//
437b1(mdo sde): ston pa khyod kyang mi mthong ngo // 'jig rten lha dang bram ze dang // rig byed shAkya 'di dag ces// sdang bas smra ba rang skyon nyid// ci phyir sems par mi byed kye//
437b2(mdo sde): gang slad khyod kyi bstan pa ni// bde bas bde nyid thob bgyid pa// de slad smra ba'i stag khyod kyi// gzhung lugs la ni 'gro 'di dga'// khyod kyi yon tan yang dag
437b3(mdo sde): pad+d+harnam pa 'di ltar rab brjod pas// bdag gis bsod nams gang thob des// 'gro ba'i 'jig rten khyod 'drar shog/ mgon po khyad par 'phags bstod pa/
437b4(mdo sde): bsam pas bdag gis dge bsags pa// gang yin des na 'gro ba kun// byang chub la ni gzhol gyur cig/ khyad par 'phags par bstod pa// slob dpon
437b5(mdo sde): thos brtson khyad par rjes mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po sarbad nya de ba dang / lo tsha ba ban de rin mchog gis bsgyur cing / zhu chen gyi
437b6(mdo sde): lo tsa ba ban de dpal brtsegs kyis gtan la phab pa// rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzin na mi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur zhus te
437b7(mdo sde): gtan la phab pa// @rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sarba d+harma pa prid ti nir de sha na ma ma hA ya na sU tra// bod skad du/ 'phags
437b8(mdo sde): pa chos thams cad 'byung ba med pa bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag
438a1(mdo sde): gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi bya rgod 'phungs po'i ri la/ dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyis dge slong
438a2(mdo sde): gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bcu gnyis 'dus pa yang 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
438a3(mdo sde): dpa' chen po bkod pa rab tu brgyan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis 'gro ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
438a4(mdo sde): po 'od gzer thog ma med par shin tu sbyangs pa'i 'od kyi gzi brjid 'bar ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ri reb zom la rnam par spyod pa'i rgyal
438a5(mdo sde): po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' bas rab tu 'dzum pa'i 'od dri ma med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i 'od zil
438a6(mdo sde): gyis gnon pa'i 'od 'phro dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go 'phang dri ma med pa thob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzi brjid
438a7(mdo sde): 'gro ba la 'phro ba'i pad+ma rab tu rgyas pa'i lus dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs kyi skad sgrog pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sem/
438a8(mdo sde): dpa' chen po seng ge'i rgyal po 'gro bar rnam par rol pa'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gser mdog gzi brjid dri ma med pa rnam par
438b1(mdo sde): dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po reg na 'jam zhing gzhon pa'i lus dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gser gyi rgyan
438b2(mdo sde): ltar mtshan rab tu rgyas pa'i lus dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer bcus bdud rab tu btul ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
438b3(mdo sde): chen po spyod lam zhi bas nye bar zhi bar 'gro ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs 'dzin mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems
438b4(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i sgra dbyangs skad sgrogs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad la gang dbang phyug gi dbang gi rtsal gyis
438b5(mdo sde): spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzi brjid dri ma med pa'i lus dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur
438b6(mdo sde): gyur pa dang / de dag la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis dang yang thabs gcig go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
438b7(mdo sde): chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis 'gro bas/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs de lta bu de mthong nas stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas
438b8(mdo sde): pa'i lhang sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas tshigs su bcad de zhu ba zhus pa// gso med srog med bdag med
439a1(mdo sde): med chos kyi rnams// mgon po mtha' yas grags mangs bshad du gsol// 'khor 'di 'di 'dra dam pa mchog lags te// zhi ba//
439a2(mdo sde): rtog zhi rtag tu nye bar zhi// lta ba'i rnam pa ji ltar byang chub lags// khro dang phrag dog nga rgyal bral ba dang // 'dod chags dngos bral ji ltar byang chub lags// mgon
439a3(mdo sde): po mtha' yas grags mangs bshad du gsol// skyon bral thar pa gang la ma mchis pa'i// 'du byed khams kyang ji ltar byang chub lags// ji ltar chos rnams gnyis
439a4(mdo sde): su ma mchis pa// rgyal ba thugs rje mnga' bas bshad du gsol// chos rnams shin tu rnam par grol 'gyur cing // mya ngan 'das dang grol mnyam ji ltar lags/
439a5(mdo sde): chags pa ma chags nam mkha'i tshul 'dra zhing // 'ching bar mi 'gyur gang lags mgon pos gsungs// ka la ping ka tshangs pa lha'i gsung // 'od la dri med gser gyi mdog
439a6(mdo sde): mnga' ba// yid 'ong 'od gsal yon tan mchog mnga' bas// chos nyid rtag par tshul gcig bka' stsal gsol// sgrib pa ji ltar byang chub mnyam pa lags// byang chub
439a7(mdo sde): rang bzhin ji ltar chos rnams lags// chos dang chos min ji ltar 'dra ba lags// de gnyis ji ltar nam mkha' mtshungs pa lags// chos rnams grangs dang bgrang ba ma
439a8(mdo sde): mchis shing // zhing dang mnyam par de dag ji ltar 'gyur// skyon bral byang chub de la ma mchis shing // de la kun mkhyen ma mchis ji ltar lags// bgyi dang bgyid dang bgyi ba'i
439b1(mdo sde): rang bzhin dang // bzung dang 'dzin pa nam yang ma mchis shing // sems can rnams kyang rtag par ma mchis shing // de la chos spyod ji ltar ma mchis 'gyur// de la tshul khrims/
